GSP30abhiprvu:12: vṛttyā tātparyaṃ ṭīkayā tadvicāraḥ sūtreṣveteṣu granthakāreṇa dṛbdham /
GSP30abhiprvu:21: iha prameśvaraṃ prati yā iyaṃ kāyavāṅmanasāṃ tadekaviṣayatāniyojanālakṣaṇā prahvatā sā namaskārasya arthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:22: sā ca tathā kartum ucitā prāmāṇikasya bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:24: anyathā yuktim aparāmṛśataḥ aparamārthe 'pi namaskārodyatasya sāṃsārikajanamadhyapātitvameva / yathoktam @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:27: itarāpekṣayā tu katipayādhvottīrṇatayā samutkarṣo 'pi syāt / taduktam @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:34: na tu atra svātmīyaḥ puruṣakāraḥ ko 'pi nirvahati,
GSP30abhiprvu:35: sarvasya tasya māyāmayatvenāndhatamasaprakhyasyāmāyīyaṃ śuddhaprakāśaṃ svapratidvandvinaṃ prati upāyat/
GSP30abhiprvu:39: jayapadodīraṇe 'pi tādṛśasamutkarṣātiśayaśālini svātmānamaprahvīkurvāṇasya taṭasthasya paramanātmopakāritvam iti samutkarṣaviśeṣākṣipta eva namaskāro 'vaśyamabhyantarīkāryaḥ,
GSP30abhiprvu:40: ityanayā yuktyā jaya-namaskāraikataraprakrame anyatarasya arthākṣiptatā avaśyamaṅgīkartavyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:50: abhiprāyeṇa prasiddhajaya-namaḥ prabhṛtiśabdaśaṭyānāśleṣeṇa imāṃ saraṇim anusarasi sma granthakāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:53: tatra tu upāyopeyabhāvaprabhṛtiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi yathāprakāśaṃ paramārthabhūta eva,
GSP30abhiprvu:59: ityantam / tatra tu kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi kvacit paripūrṇasvātantryalakṣaṇamāheśvaryanāntarīyakatākroḍīkṛtānantaśakticakracumbitabhāvabhāvitaprathāntaravyacadhānaṃ cakāsti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:65: eṣa ca anugrahalakṣaṇo 'ntyaḥ pañcamaḥ pārameśvaraḥ kṛtyaviśeṣaḥ parapuruṣārthaprāpakaḥ,
GSP30abhiprvu:68: na sarvata iti niḥśreyasābhāsa iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:75: iti / 'āsādya'; iti ā samantāt paripūrṇarūpatayā sādayitvā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:77: iyatā viditavedyatvena parārthe śāstrakaraṇe adhikāro darśitaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:80: anyathā tu āsādanatāratamyaprāptau māyīyamalakalāpasaṃskāraprakṣaye kathaṃ paropadeśaḥ śakyakriyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:84: te tu yadīyaiśvaryavipruḍbhirīśvarībhūtāḥ sa bhagavān anavacchinnaprakāśānandarūpasvātantryaparamārtho maheśvaraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:87: dīyate asmai svāminā sarvaṃ yathābhilaṣitam iti dāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:91: ityanena adhikāriviṣayo nātra kaścinniyama iti darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:92: yasya yasya hi idaṃ svarūpaprathanaṃ tasya tasya mahāphalam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:101: karaṇena nāsti kṛtyaṃ kvāpi bhāvanayāpi vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:104: iti / janasya anavaratajananamaraṇapīḍitasya ityanena kṛpāspadatayā upakaraṇīyatvamāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:105: apiśabdaḥ svātmanaḥ tadabhinnatām āviṣkurvan pūrṇatvena svātmani parārthasaṃpattyatiriktaprayojanāntarāvakāśaṃ parākaroti /
GSP30abhiprvu:107: na hi ayaṃ daivaśāpaḥ svārtha eva prayojanaṃ na parārtha iti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:109: saṃpādyatvena abhisaṃhitaṃ yat mukhyatayā tata eva kriyāsu prayojakaṃ tatprayojanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:110: ata eva bhedāde 'pi īśvarasya sṛṣṭyādikaraṇe parārtha eva prayojanam iti darśayituṃ nyāyanirmāṇavedhasā nirūpitam @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:112: iti / icchan iti icchāviṣayīkṛtasya phalasya pravṛtto hetutvaṃ śatrā darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:113: icchāśaktiśca uttarottaram ucchūnasvabhāvatayā kriyāśaktiparyantībhavati ---- iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:117: parameśvaratālābhe hi samastāḥ saṃpadaḥ tanniḥṣyandamayyaḥ saṃpannā eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:126: samastasya bhāvābhāvarūpasya bāhyābhyantarasya nīlasukhādeḥ yā saṃpat saṃpattiḥ siddhiḥ tathātvaprakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:137: iti / iyatā ca upāye atidurghaṭatvāśaṅkā parākṛtā /
GSP30abhiprvu:140: iti / tamya maheśvarasya pratyabhijñā pratīpamātmābhimukhyena jñānaṃ prakāśaḥ pratyabhijñā /
GSP30abhiprvu:141: pratīpam iti ---- svātmāvabhāso hi na ananubhūtapūrvo'vicchinnaprakāśatvāt tasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:142: sa tu tacchaktyaiva vicchinna iva vikalpita iva lakṣyate ---- iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:144: sa evāyaṃ caitra ---- iti pratisaṃdhānena abhimukhībhūte vastuni jñānam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:145: loke'pi etatputra evaṃguṇa evaṃrūpaka ityevaṃ vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:146: antato'pi sāmānyātmanā vā jñātasya punarabhimukhībhāvāvasare pratisaṃdhiprāṇitameva jñānaṃ pratyabhijñā ---- iti vyavahriyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:148: ihāpi prasiddhapurāṇasiddhāntāgamānumānādividitapūrṇaśaktisvabhāve īśvare sati svātmanyabhimukhībhūte tatpratisaṃdhānena jñānam udeti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:156: pratyabhijñopapattau svaparavibhāgābhāve tadapekṣaṃ kartrabhiprāyādi asaṃbhāvyam iti parasmaipadaprayogaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:163: iyati ca vyākhyāne vṛttikṛtā bharo na kṛtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:166: iti / ṭīkākāreṇāpi vṛttimātraṃ vyākhyātumudyatena nedaṃ spṛṣṭam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:167: asmākaṃ tu sūtravyākhyāna eva udyama -- iti vibhajya vyākhyātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:175: tathā hi ---- samastasaṃpallakṣaṇo vyākhyāto yo'rthaḥ pūrvaṃ puṇyapāpādau saṃsāramūlakāraṇe hetuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:176: sa eva pratyabhijñāyate anayā ---- iti karaṇavyutpattyā upāyaḥ iha lokottaramārgaṃ prati nirṇītaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:179: iti śākhānte nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ sūcayatā upāyaḥ darśitaḥ abhidheyatvena / ata eva
GSP30abhiprvu:189: pahlepsavo ye punaratra teṣāṃ mūḍhā sthitiḥ syādanavasthayaiva //}
GSP30abhiprvu:197: iti / evaṃ pratyabhijñātavyasamastavastusaṃgrahaṇena idaṃ vākyamuddeśarūpaṃ pratijñāpiṇḍātmakaṃ ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:200: iti ca antyaśloko nigamanagranthaḥ -- ityevaṃ pañcāvayavātmakamidaṃ śāstraṃ paravyutpattiphalam /
GSP30abhiprvu:202: ityādiṣu uddeśeṣu prakaṭībhaviṣyati -- iti tāvad granthasya tātparyam sujanaśca laukikeśvaraparicita īśvaraviṣaye janam anujīviguṇasaṃpannaṃ prakāśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:203: janaviṣaye ca abhigāmikādiguṇasaṃpannam īśvaraṃ prakāśayati - iti
GSP30abhiprvu:204: iyānarthaḥ sāmānyena ṣaṣṭhosamāsena darśitaḥ tasya pratyabhijñā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:205: etacchlokākarṇanasamaye ca śiṣyāṇām etadarthasaṃkramaṇakrameṇa parameśvaratādātmyameva upajāyate tāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:206: tathā hi ---- janasya ityākarṇanāt vayaṃ te jananamaraṇapīḍitā aparyupastavṛttayaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:211: itītthameva hi adhikāriṇi śāstrārthasya bimbapratibimbavat saṃkrāntiḥ loḍliṅādīnāṃ viṣayībhavati prathamapuruṣārtha uttamapuruṣārthe paryasyati
GSP30abhiprvu:214: ārogyakāmāḥ śivāṃ sevantāṃ sevadhvam ---- iti vā vākyārthasya sevāmahai -- ityevaṃrūpeṇa adhikāriṇi dvitīyā kakṣyā saṃkrāntau ,
GSP30abhiprvu:215: tṛṭīyakakṣyāmeva bhāvikoṭipatitāmapi puruṣārthasaṃpattim akālakalitasvarūpānupraveśena svātmīkṛtām abhimanyamāne ,
GSP30abhiprvu:217: anyasya tu anevaṃrūpatvenaiva anadhikāritā tāṭasthyaprāṇā ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:218: tadāstām avāntarametat atigahanaṃ ca ---- iti sthitametat /
GSP30abhiprvu:219: etena ślokena īśvarasāṃmukhyaṃ vineyānāṃ prayojanādipratipādanaṃ ca kriyate ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:221: upoddhātāyate yasya taṃ stumaḥ sarvadā śivam //} //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:231: svaprakāśe'pi vā īśvare pramātḥṇāṃ kiṃ vṛttaṃ yena teṣāṃ pramāṇavyāpārānupayoga ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:233: ajaḍātmā niṣedhaṃ vā siddhiṃ vā vidadhīta kaḥ // Ipk_1,1.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:234: iha ka īśvare kīdṛśe kīdṛśena pramāṇena asti iti jñānalakṣaṇāṃ siddhim ,
GSP30abhiprvu:236: pramātā iti cet , sa eva kaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:237: dehādirjaḍaḥ uta tadanyo vā kaścit ātmādiśabdavācyaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:240: sa eva svātmani asiddhaḥ paratra kāṃ siddhiṃ kuryāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:246: bheditānāṃ ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanaṃ na syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:248: bheditānāṃ ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanaṃ na syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:251: kartṛjñātṛsvabhāvam iti cet nanu sa pramātaiva tathābhūtaḥ iti ko'nyaḥ saḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:253: na khalu sarvaśabdārtho jñātṛkartṛtvayoḥ svarūpaṃ bhinatti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:257: prakāśamānasvabhāvatve viṣayo'pi sarvātmanā prakāśa eva nimagna iti prakāśaḥ prakāśate ---- ityetāvanmātraparamārthatve kaḥ sarvajñāsarvajñavibhāgaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:260: tasmāt viṣayābhimataṃ vastu śarīratayā gṛhītvā tāvat nirbhāsamāna ātmaiva prakāśate vicchedaśūnyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:268: bhedite ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanam ---- iti bahuprakāraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:269: etadeva asya pārameśvaryaṃ mukhyamānandamayaṃ rūpam ---- iti pūrvamupāttaṃ kartari iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:270: tadeva tu svātantryaṃ vibhajya vaktuṃ jñātari iti pañcānnirdiṣṭam /
GSP30abhiprvu:272: tena sarvakriyāsvatantre sarvaśaktike ---- iti yāvad uktaṃ bhavet tāvadeva kartari jñātari iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:274: saṃviditi tu ucyamānā vikalpyatvena prameyatāṃ spṛśanto sṛṣṭatvāt na paramārthasaṃvit ---- iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:275: kartā jñātā ca maheśvara ---- ityabhidhāne'pi sa eva prakāra āpatet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:276: iti yathā yathā prameyabhūmikāpādananyakkārakalaṅkaparihāraḥ śakyaḥ tathā tathā yāvadgati yatitavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:278: upadeśāvasare hi sarvātmanā tāvat sā prameyatā asya parihartum aśakyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:287: yasya tu vaiśeṣikāderjaḍa ātmā sa siddhiṃ karotu īśvaraviṣayām ;
GSP30abhiprvu:289: sāṃkhyo'pi viṣayāvabhāsanarūpaṃ jñānaṃ buddhidharmamicchan ātmānaṃ vastuto jaḍameva upaiti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:290: na ca jaḍātmā svātmanyapi durlabhaprakāśasvātantryaleśaḥ kiṃcit sādhayituṃ niṣeddhuṃ vā prabhaviṣṇuḥ pāṣāṇa iva ;
GSP30abhiprvu:292: tathā hi ---- sa svātmani siddhimitthaṃ kuryāt ---- yadi asya so'bhinavatvena bhāsamānaḥ pūrvaṃ na bhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:294: niṣedhaṃ ca itthaṃ vidadhyāt ---- yadi sa na prakāśate tathā ca jaḍaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:295: na ca jaḍasya etat yuktam ityuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:300: tat na tatra kārakavyāpāravat pramāṇavyāpāro'pi nityatvavat svaprakāśatvasyāpi tatra bhāvāt //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:301: nanu kārakavyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyāpāraśca yadi īśvare na saṃbhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:302: tarhi pratyabhijñāpayāmi ---- iti yo vyāpāra uktaḥ sa katamo vyāpāraḥ @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:307: tatra ca asya svātantryam iti na kenacidvapuṣā na prakāśate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:309: tatrāpi prakāśātmani sarvathā prakāśātmanā prakāśo bhāgaśo vā ;
GSP30abhiprvu:310: bhāgaśaḥ prakāśane sarvasya vyatirekeṇa avyatirekeṇa vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:317: saiva bhagavato māyā vimohinī nāma śaktiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:318: tadvaśāt prakāśātmatayā satatam avabhāsamāne'pi ātmani bhāgena aprakāśanavaśād anupalakṣite sarvathā hṛdayaṃgamībhāvamaprāpte ata eva pūrṇatāvabhāsanasādhyām arthakriyām akurvati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:326: iti / etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- na kārakavyāpāro bhagavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:330: ghaṭo'yamagragaḥ pratyakṣatvāt ---- ityanena hi ghaṭo na jñāpyate pratyakṣeṇaiva prakāśamānatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:335: na tu adhikaṃ kiṃcit ---- ityuktaṃ vakṣyate ca //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:336: nanu paridṛśyamāne bhāvarāśau kimīyā śaktirāviṣkriyate kaṃ ca prati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:339: tathā ca ratho gacchati ---- ityādau upacāraṃ kecana pratipannāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:342: tarhi sarvasya svātmā maheśvara ---- iti dūrataraṃ viprakarṣitā pratyāśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:345: jñānaṃ kriyā ca bhūtānāṃ jīvatāṃ jīvanaṃ matam // Ipk_1,1.4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:352: tata eva smaryamāṇena granthena varṇayiṣyamāṇena prakāreṇa yasmāt sarvametad yuktam iti tathā hi iti śabdasya vārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:353: iha tāvat bhāvarāśiryathā vimṛśyate tathā asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:354: astitvasya prakāśaṃ śaraṇīkurvataḥ prakāśaprāṇitadeśīyaṃ āśritya samunmevāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:355: avimṛṣṭaṃ hi yadi vastu tanna nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na sat na asaditi kuta iti paryanuyoge kimuttaraṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:356: tena yad yathā yāvat avādhitaṃ vimṛśyate tat tathā tāvat asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:357: tat eva deśakālākāravitatātmāno 'pi dravyakriyāsaṃbandhādayaḥ ekatvena paramārthasanta iti vakṣyate
GSP30abhiprvu:358: ityādinā , tataśca vitatamapi idaṃ viśvaṃ saṃkṣepavimarśadaśādhirohe jaḍaṃ jīvacca ---- ityetāvatā dvayarūpeṇa asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:359: tatra jaḍā vimṛśyamānā na svatantrā bhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:360: vimṛśyamānatā hi teṣāṃ na svaśarīraviśrāntaḥ ko 'pi dharmaḥ jaḍatvābhāvaprasaṃgāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:361: mama nīlaṃ bhāti mayā nīlaṃ jñāyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:362: teṣām jaḍabhūtānāṃ cinmayatve 'pi māyākhyayā īśvaraśaktyā jāḍyaṃ prāpitānām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:364: tato jaḍā nāma na pṛthak santi /
GSP30abhiprvu:368: iti / sa eva hi svātmanā san vaktavyo yasya anyānupahitaṃ rūpaṃ cakāsti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:369: na ca bhārūpānupahitaṃ jaḍaṃ nāma kiñcit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:370: tena jaḍānāṃ hi śaktirāviṣkriyate jaḍānprati ---- ityetat tāvat nirutthānameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:371: ye tu anye jaḍebhyo jīvanta ---- iti nāma prasiddhāḥ teṣāmapi śarīraprāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyākārāḥ tāvat jaḍā eva iti teṣāmapi kimucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:373: avarūpaṃ yallagnaṃ bhāti tadeva jīvarūpabhūtaṃ satyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:374: tasya ca āpāte yadyapi bahutvaṃ bhāti tathāpi tat jaḍātmakavedyaśarīrādyupādheḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:376: jīvā hi jaḍabhedāt bhedabhāginaḥ jaḍāśca jīvabhedāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:380: tadayaṃ jīvānāmabheda eva saṃpanna iti jīvan pramātā ---- iti jātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:382: yo hi jānāti ca karoti ca sa jīvati ---- ityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:383: tadayaṃ pramātā jñānakriyāśaktiyogād īśvara ---- iti vyavahartavayaḥ purāṇāgamādiprasiddheśvaravat ;
GSP30abhiprvu:385: tadapi ca kalpiteśvare rājādau tathā vyāptigrahaṇāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:386: yo yāvati jñātā kartā ca sa tāvati īśvarp rājeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:388: ātmā ca viśvatra jñātā kartā ca ---- iti siddhā pratyabhijñā /
GSP30abhiprvu:393: anye ca jīvanta ---- ityāpāte tāvad bhāti na tu saṃvidāpāte bhātīti jīvatāmiti jaṅgamā eva amī itthaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:394: nanu jñānakriye eva kathaṃ siddhe yata aiśvaryavyavahāraḥ prasādhyate ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayitumāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:395: tatra jñānaṃ svataḥ siddhaṃ kriyā kāyāśritā satī /
GSP30abhiprvu:398: mayā jñātaṃ jñāsyate ca ---- ityevaṃ svaprakāśāhaṃparāmarśapariniṣṭhitameva idaṃ jñānaṃ nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:407: yena śuklāderguṇāt atyantajaḍāt jānāmi ---- iti ---- vapuḥ citsvabhāvatām abhyetiḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:411: iti / tena āntarī kriyāśaktiḥ jñānavadeva svataḥ siddhā svaprakāśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:413: prāṇapuryaṣṭakakrameṇa śarīramapi saṃcaramāṇā spandanarūpā satī vyāpārātmikā māthāpade 'pi pramāṇasya pratyakṣāderviṣayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:414: sā ca paraśarīrādisāhityena avagatā svaṃ svabhāvaṃ jñātmakamavagamayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:417: na ca anyadvastu anyena vapuṣā bhātaṃ bhātaṃ bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:419: bhāti ca yat tadeva ahamityasya vapuḥ iti parajñānamapi svātmaivaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:421: sa cāpi vicārito yāvat na anya iti viśvaḥ pramātṛvargaḥ paramārthata ekaḥ pramātā sa eva ca asti / taduktam @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:423: iti / tataśca bhagavān sadāśivo jānāti ityataḥ prabhṛti krimirapi jānāti ---- ityantam eka eva pramātā iti phalataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ pramātuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:427: sadāśivātmanā vedmi sa vā vetti madātmanā //
GSP30abhiprvu:429: ityādi / ūhyate ityanena jñānena jñānasya prameyatvaṃ na nirvahati ---- iti darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:431: tadevaṃ yeṣāṃ tārkikapravādapāṃsupātadhūsarībhāvo na vṛtto 'smin saṃvedanapathe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:432: te iyataiva ātmānamīśvaraṃ vidvāṃso ghaṭaśarīraprāṇasukhatadabhāvān tatraiva nimajjayanta īśvarasamāviṣṭā eva bhavanti /
GSP30abhiprvu:434: upa iti ātmanaḥ samīpe ṭaṅkavat īśvarapratyabhijñānalakṣaṇa utkarṣo hanyate viśrāmyate yena ;
GSP30abhiprvu:435: etāvadeva ca asya granthasya tātparyam ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:437: upāṃśu avitataṃ kṛtvā uditi śāstrasya ūrdhva eva hanyate apasāryate prameyaviṣayo vyāmoho yena ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:440: kecittu gatiṃ striyaṃ gacchati ---- ityetadviṣayameva hantyarthamāhuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:443: iti śrīmadācāryotpaladevaśiṣya ---- śrīmadācāryalakṣmaṇaguptadattopadeśa ---- śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ śrīpratyabhijñāvimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre upoddhātaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:448: iha yat paramārtharūpaṃ āśaṅkyamānapratipakṣapratikṣepeṇa nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ suṣṭhutamāṃ spaṣṭokṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:451: jñānānandaṃ ca nirdvandvaṃ deva vṛtvā vivṛṇvate //}
GSP30abhiprvu:452: tatreha anātmānīśvaravādināṃ bhrāntibhedanapūrvakaṃ paramārthaṃ vivarīṣyan tadudbhāvanaṃ tāvat ekādaśabhiḥ ślokaiḥ karoti
GSP30abhiprvu:456: ityantaiḥ / tatra ślokadvayena ātmano dhruvasya dṛśyānupalabdhyā abhāva uktaḥ pratyakṣātmavādinaḥ prati /
GSP30abhiprvu:457: tatra ślokatrayeṇa smṛtyanusaṃdhānaṃ saṃskārāt siddham iti anyabāsiddhatvāt ātmānumānāya na paryāptam ---- iti proktam anumeyātmavādinaḥ prati
GSP30abhiprvu:458: tatra ślokena jñānādi guṇairguṇini pratipattiḥ ---- iti anumānaṃ nirastam /
GSP30abhiprvu:460: tato jñānakriyāśaktisaṃbandharūpamaiśvarya nirākartuṃ jñānasya svarūpameva vyatiriktaṃ vādyantaramate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:461: sāṃkhyamate ca ayujyamānam ---- iti nirūpitaṃ ślokadvayena /
GSP30abhiprvu:462: tata ekena kriyā nāma na kācit kvacidapi asti ---- iti kathitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:463: tatra sādhakaṃ pratikṣipya bādhakaṃ ca upanyasyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:464: tataḥ saṃbandhasya ślokena nāstitvaṃ pratipāditaṃ pramāṇābhāvaṃ vadatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:466: na ātmā sthiro nāpi jñātṛtvakartṛtvalakṣaṇam asya aiśvaryam ---- iti svapakṣa upasaṃhṛtaḥ ---- iti pūrvapakṣasya piṇḍārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:469: sābhilāpaṃ vikalpākhyaṃ bahudhā nāpi tad dvayam // Ipk_1,2.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:473: iha ātmā saṃvitsvabhāvaḥ sthiraḥ iti tāvadayuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:475: tathā hi ---- ghaṭaprakāśo ghaṭavikalpo ghaṭapratyabhijñā ghaṭasmṛtiḥ ghaṭotprekṣā ---- ityādirūpeṇa jñānānyeva prakāśante bhinnakāntāni bhinnaviṣayāṇi bhinnakārāṇi ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:476: tatra nīlasya prakāśaḥ svalakṣaṇābhāsaṃ jñānam svam anyānanuyāyi svarūpasaṃkocabhāji ,
GSP30abhiprvu:477: lakṣaṇam deśakālākārarūpaṃ yasya ābhāsaḥ prakāśanam antarmukhaṃ yasmin bahirmukhīnasvarūpadhāriṇi jñāne tat avikalpakam viṣayabhede 'pi ekajātīyam
GSP30abhiprvu:487: sarvasya vikalpasya sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā nirvikalpakamūlatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:488: param iti ca anyarūpaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasya viṣayaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:494: yatastat abhilāpena saṃjalpātmanā śabdarūpeṇa saha vartate /
GSP30abhiprvu:499: idaṃ vā idam ---- ityādi bahudhā bhidyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:501: api tu tasya vikalpasya svarūpameva vicitrokurvat pratibhāti iti vikalpo bahubhedaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:503: syādetat , yallagnāsau paramparā so'pi ābhāti ---- iti ; tatra ,
GSP30abhiprvu:504: yato dvayamapi etad avikalpetararūpaṃ na anyasya kasyacit etadatiriktasya draṣṭuḥ anubhavituḥ saṃbandhi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:509: nanu astyeva avabhāsaḥ ---- iti asiddhā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:512: smarāmi idam ---- iti vidādiprakṛtyartharūpāt jñānasmṛtyādeḥ idam ---- iti ca karmarūpāt viṣayāt atiriktameva aham ---- iti anuyāyini prakāśe anuyāyirūpaṃ bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:527: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- ahaṃpratītireva tāvat na ātmā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:531: tathāpi saṃvitsaṃvedyavyatiriktasya ātmano na siddhiḥ ---- ityetat apiśabdena dyotitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:532: evaṃ nāsti ātmā saṃvitsaṃvedyatryatirikto dṛśyasya tasyānupalabdheḥ ---- iti // 1// //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:535: kathaṃ bhavenna nityaḥ syādātmā yadyanubhāvakaḥ // Ipk_1,2.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:540: tathā hi ---- smṛtau na arthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:548: tadā tatprakāśarūpā kathaṃ smṛtistaddvāreṇa arthaviṣayā syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:549: tayā ca sarvo vyavahāraḥ kriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ ityasau svarūpeṇa anapahnavanīyā satī anubhavasya nāśe kiṃcit avinaṣṭam āvedayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:553: tattu na adhikam ihaiva unmīlitam ācāryeṇa ,
GSP30abhiprvu:554: vaktavyaśeṣavivakṣayā pūrvapakṣo mā tāvat samāpat ityāśayena /
GSP30abhiprvu:557: anubhavaśca dhvastaḥ iti na kenacitprakāreṇa smṛtiḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:558: tadabhāve ca saṃketaśabdasmṛtyāyattā api astaṅgatāḥ sarve vikalpāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:559: nirvikalpaṃ ca andhabadhiramūkaprāyam iti hanta nirākrandam avasīdet viśvam ---- iti //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:560: iha kāryātirekeṇa tādṛk kalpanīyaṃ yat kāryasiddhaye paryāpnoti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:566: etadapi hi vaktavyam ---- ākāśamapi asti ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:567: atha ucyate ---- na kevalena ātmanā etat siddhyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:568: api tu anubhavasaṃskāro 'pi atra upayogī ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:573: dṛṣṭeṣu anubhūteṣu vastuṣu yā smṛtiḥ tasyām anubhavo dṛgātmā dvāram arthāśasparśe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:575: tasya hi anāśe idam ---- ityeṣa eva atruṭitaḥ prakāśaḥ iti kā smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:577: yatraiva viṣaye anubhavo vṛttaḥ tadeva tasyāḥ smṛteḥ padaṃ smaryamāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:580: nanu jñānāntarasya viṣayeṇa kathaṃ tasyāḥ viṣayitvābhimānaḥ ---- ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:586: tena atrāpi saṃskāraḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ pūrvānubhavānukāriṇīṃ karoti ---- iti tadviṣaya eva smṛterviṣayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:587: evaṃ tarhi antargaḍuḥ yathā āyāsāya param ,
GSP30abhiprvu:588: tadvat ātmā sthiraḥ kalpanāyāsamātraphalaḥ iti kiṃ tena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:589: sarvaṃ hi saṃskāreṇa jagadvyavahārakuṭumbakaṃ kṛtakarāvalambam ---- iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:592: ya āśrayaḥ sa ātmā syāt ---- ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:597: sa tarhi avyatiriktaḥ iti na nityaḥ syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:601: tarhi na vyatirikto 'sau iti punarapi anitye jñāne saṃskāraḥ ---- ityāyātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:602: anubhavādviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasmrṭyākhyakāryakāri jñānaṃ paramparayā jāyate ---- iti iyāneva saṃskārārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:607: etadāha ---- tataḥ iti ātmano bhinneṣu dharmeṣu aṅgīkriyamāṇeṣu teṣu satsvapi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:608: ātmanaḥ svarūpe viśeṣābhāvāt sa tāvat ātmā smrṭau na vyāpriyeta ,
GSP30abhiprvu:610: anapāyāt , iti saṃskārādeva smṛteḥ siddhiḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:611: ahaṃ smarāmi ---- iti yaḥ smartā so'pi śarīrasaṃtāno jñānasaṃtānaśca adhyāvasīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:615: iti / evam ātmani sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca parākṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:623: jñānaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ cet tad anityaṃ kimātmavat /
GSP30abhiprvu:625: parābhyupagamena prasaṅgāpādanam etat pūrvapakṣavādī karoti ---- prasaṅgaviparyayalābho me bhaviṣyati ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:626: tatra ātmavādī nityatvam ātmana itthaṃ brūte ---- iha kālo nāma idaṃbhāvaviśiṣṭasya viśeṣaṇatām avalambamānaḥ taṃ viśiṣṭīkurvan tatsaṃkocāt anityaṃ saṃpādayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:627: ātmanaśca citsvabhāvatvāt idam ---- iti prathanābhāvena viśeṣyatvaṃ nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:630: sa itthaṃ bruvāṇaḥ paryanuyujyate ---- jñānamapi tarhi svaprakāśam iti tatrāpi eṣaiva vārtā iti tadapi kasmāt na nityam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:633: tata ātmano jñānaṃ śaktiḥ iti avasannam adaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:634: atha na svaprakāśaṃ jñānaṃ tarhi parasyāpi ado na prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:635: svaprakāśarūpāveśanaṃ hi asau parasya vidadhat bodhaḥ prakāśo bhavati parasyāpi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:636: tataḥ svaprakāśatāśūnyo na asau arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:638: jaḍo'pyasau ittham arthasya prakāśo bhaviṣyati ---- iti sāṃkhyamatam āśaṅkate @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:645: na kaṃcitprati vā iti sarvajñam ajñaṃ vā jagat syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:648: tat nūnam anyatraiva ayaṃ dharmaḥ tattvāntare ,
GSP30abhiprvu:649: tatrāpi katham arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt iti nūnaṃ tatra tattvāntare so'rthaḥ pratibimbatvena upasaṃkrāmati /
GSP30abhiprvu:650: tat tattvāntaraṃ sattvaprādhānyāt pratibimbagrahayogyaṃ tamasā''cchāditatvāt sakalapratibimbanato vyāvartitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:651: bhāge rajasā tamaso'pasāraṇāt kiṃcideva pratibimbakaṃ gṛhyāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:654: evam arthasya tāvat rūpaṃ buddhiḥ dhārayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:655: iyaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhaduḥkhamoharūpatayāṃ bhogyatvāt jaḍam iti darpakṣavat aprakāśam /
GSP30abhiprvu:656: na ca bhogyasya aprakāśasya tadviruddhabhoktṛtārūpaprakāśātmakasvabhāvasaṃbhavo yuktyanupātī iti tadvilakṣaṇena bhoktrā bhavitavyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:658: svabhāvāntaraṃ hi aprakāśarūpaṃ bhogyaṃ kathaṃ bhoktuḥ svabhāvatayā saṃbhāvyeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:659: sa ca prakāśamātrasvabhāvatvenaiva yadi viśvasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:661: ghaṭaprakāśo'pi paṭaprakāśaḥ syāt iti viśvaṃ saṃkīryeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:662: sa ca arthāt arthapratibimbāt tadādhārācca buddhitattvāt anyaḥ katham arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:665: tataḥ prakāśapratibimbaparigrahamahimopanataprakāśāveśabuddhitattvāveśitapratibimbakanīlādyarthaparyantasaṃkrānteḥ prakāśāveśasya arthaḥ prakāśate iti siddho vyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:666: tadevaṃ jñānaṃ jaḍabuddhitattvāvyatirekāt jaḍamapi citpratibimbayogāt viṣayasya prakāśaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:667: etadeva tāvat anucitam ---- yat prakāśātmā pumān buddhau pratibimbam arpayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:671: ātmāpekṣayā ca na buddhirvimalā tat bahvatu tāvat etat ---- iti atha śabdena sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:672: kiṃtu pratibimbavādenāpi na kiṃcit pratisamāhitaṃ bhavet ---- iti darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:674: caitanyapratibimbayoge yadi tāvat tatpratibimbakamapi mukhyaṃ prakāśarūpameva na bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:676: na hi pratibimbatavahnipuñja ādarśo dāhyaṃ dahet /
GSP30abhiprvu:678: tat tarhi buddheravyatiriktam iti mukhyaprakāśarūpaiva buddhirjātā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:680: sa eva punaḥ jājvalyamānaṃ nijam ojo jṛmbhayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:683: evam arthapratibimbakadvāreṇa arthamayī ---- ityapi āyāto vijñānavādaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:690: yasya jñānaṃ nāma śaktiḥ syāt iti jñānamātrameva asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:691: yo 'rthaprakāśarūpo bodho yaśca vikalpasmṛtyādirūpaḥ tāvatā arthavyavahārasiddheḥ ---- iti prasaṅgaviparyayalābhaḥ jñānaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ cet ityādeḥ ślokadvayasya tātparyam //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:698: tatra gṛhaseśagatadevadattasvarūpāt anantaraṃ bāhyadeśavartidevadattasvarūpam ---- ityetāvat upalabhyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:699: na tu tatsvarūpātiriktāṃ kāṃcit anyāṃ kriyāṃ pratīmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:700: devadatto dinaṃ tiṣṭhati ityatra tu prabhātakālāviṣṭadevadattasvarūpaṃ tataḥ praharakālāliṅgitatatsvarūpam ---- ityādi bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:701: dugdhaṃ pariṇamate ityatra madhuravasturūpam amlavasturūpam dravarūpaṃ kaṭhinarūpam ---- ityādi /
GSP30abhiprvu:702: evaṃ sādṛśyācca tatra pratyabhijñā bhinne'pi kāyakeśanasvādāviva /
GSP30abhiprvu:707: tathāpi sthūladṛṣṭyā asti bhedaḥ iti te hi bhedena bauddhairucyante ---- iti tātparyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:708: evaṃ pratyakṣeṇa na dṛśyate kacit kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:710: kāryaṃ ca prāmaprāptyādyuttarakṣaṇarūpaṃ taddeśavasturūpādi iti kāryānyathānupapattyāpi na sā kalpyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:711: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ tasyā adṛṣṭiḥ ---- iti sādhakapramāṇābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:715: na tu svātmani kiṃcit pūrvam aparaṃ vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:717: ato vikalpaprāṇitaṃ pūrvāparībhūtatvaṃ kramarūpatā kriyāyāḥ kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ na vastu spṛśati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:718: te hi kṣaṇā na anyonyasvarūpāviṣṭāḥ iti katham ekā kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:719: kramo hi bhedena vyāptaḥ abhiśne tadabhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:720: bhedasya viruddham ekyam iti kathaṃ kramikā ekā ca iti syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:724: kiṃ ca tathābhūtairbhinnadeśakālākāraiḥ kriyākṣaṇairāviṣṭa āśrayaḥ kathamekaḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:726: sa eva grāmaṃ prāptaḥ iti sādṛśyāt bhavantī pratyabhijñā na aikyaṃ vāstavaṃ gamayitumalam //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:729: taṃ saṃbandhaṃ dhvaṃsayituṃ tadviṣayaṃ pramāṇābhāvaṃ tāvadāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:733: tatra sati śiviko yāvat ghaṭaḥ ityevaṃ bhāvakṣaṇā eva upalabhyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:736: sarvatra ādhārādheyabhāvādau ayameva panthāḥ ---- pṛthagrūpakuṇḍavadarakṣaṇānantaraṃ nirantarātmakaviśiṣṭakuṇḍavadarodayaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:737: ayameva ca bhāvo bhāvāntareṇa saha niyatapūrvāparatayā vikalpena vyavahiyamāṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ---- iti abhidhīyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:738: na ca jñānakriyābhyāṃ saha ātmanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ātmanastatkāryatvābhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:740: kriyāyāśca abhāvāt iti na jñānakriyāsaṃbandho yato jñātṛtvakartṛtve syātām //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:745: saṃbandhastāvat parasparaprāptirūpo dvayoḥ prāptibhājorekastiṣṭhati ---- iti sāmānyalakṣaṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:747: na hi ekatra viśramitāśeṣaśarīrasāro'nyatra viśramitum alam svarūpabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:748: etena saṃyogasamavāyau tanmūlāśca anye'pi saṃbandhā bādhavidhurāṃ dhuram adhyāropitā mantavyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:749: yo'pi cetaneṣu tatkalpanayā ca acetaneṣu pāratantryātmā saṃbandho vyavahiyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:750: tatra siddhasya na pāratantryam asti siddhatvādeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:756: tasmāt jñānasaṃbandhāt jñātā iti yathā vikalpakalpito 'rtho na vastu tathā kriyāsaṃbandhāt kartā ityapi kalpanāmātram ---- iti pūrvapakṣasya saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:758: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ pratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre pūrvapakṣavivṛtirnāma dvitīyamāhnikam // 2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:762: etasmin pūrvapakṣe yaduktaṃ smṛteḥ saṃskāramātrādeva siddhiḥ ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:768: kriyāyāṃ saṃbandhe ca dūṣaṇoddharaṇaṃ dvitīye kriyādhikāre bhaviṣyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:769: yattu pareṇa vyatiriktaṃ jñānaṃ kāśādasāṃkhyādidṛṣṭau nirākṛtaṃ tadabhimatameva granthakṛta iti tat dūṣaṇāntarameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:770: tatra ślokadvayena jñānasya svasaṃvedanarūpatayā anubhavasya smṛtau aprakāśatvaṃ darśitaṃ saṃskārajatve 'pi /
GSP30abhiprvu:771: tataḥ ślokadvayena smṛteḥ bhrāntitvam āśaṅkāpūrvakaṃ parākṛtya tṛtīyena prasaṅgāt sarvādhyavasāyānāmapi bhrāntitvāśaṅkā śamitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:772: tataḥ satyapi saṃskāre smṛtyanupapattau vyavahārocchedaḥ ---- iti ślokenoktvā svapakṣe tadupapattiḥ ---- iti ślokenoktam ---- iti tātparyam
GSP30abhiprvu:776: pūrvapakṣamadhyāt mayā tāvat bahu aṅgīkartavyam ---- iti satyam ityanena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:777: yattu na aṅgīkartavyaṃ tat dūṣyate ---- ityetaduktaṃ kiṃtu ityanena viśeṣābhidhāyinā /
GSP30abhiprvu:778: iha smṛtau viṣayamātrasya prakāśo na samarthanīyo vartate yaḥ saṃskārādeva siddhyet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:779: kiṃtu anubhavaprakāśena vinā tat ityevaṃrūpā kathaṃ smṛtiḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:780: kathaṃ ca tayā vinā abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:787: ātmaniṣṭhe svaprakāśajñāne viṣayasyeva anubhavasya prācyasya aprakāśāt //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:788: nanu saṃsk/arajatvādeva prācyamanubhavamapi viṣayīkurutāṃ smṛtiḥ ---- ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:790: rase saṃskārajatvaṃ tu tattulyatvaṃ na tadgatiḥ // Ipk_1,3.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:791: dṛk jñānam , tacca jaḍāt vibhidyate svaprakāśaikarūpatayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:794: ābhāsaḥ prakāśamānatā sā svaṃ rūpamavyavhicāri yasyāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:796: satyapi bāhye taccharīrasaṃkrāntaṃ na prakāśanaṃ jñānasya rūpaṃ bhavitumarhati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:798: nanu svābhāsameva sat tat anubhavajñānaṃ smaraṇe bhāsiṣyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:800: paratra yadi dṛk bhāseta tarhi na sā svābhāsā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:801: idameva hi svaprakāśasya lakṣaṇam ---- svayaṃ hi yadi prakāśeta tadā pareṇa saha asaṃbandhāt saṃbandhaprāṇā kathaṃ paratra iti saptamī saṃgacchatām
GSP30abhiprvu:802: tathā ca rūpajñānena rase dṛk rasaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na vedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:803: evaṃ hi cakṣuṣaiva rasaḥ phalato gṛhīta eva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:804: nanu yadi na ābhāti smaraṇe 'nubhavaḥ kiṃ tarhi saṃskāreṇa kṛtaṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:808: naitat , yato hi asau tatsaṃskārasaṃskṛtāt samanantarapratyayāt utthitaḥ smṛtibodhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:809: tena tatsadṛśo bhavatu śāsvāsaṃniveśa iva pūrvasaṃniveśatulyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:810: na tu yo yatsaṃskārāt jātaḥ sa tasya vedanasvabhāvo bhavati ---- iti yuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:815: abhyasya ca tadubhayavedanarūpasya abhāvāt iti saṃskārāt paraṃ saviṣayatāmātraṃ smṛteḥ siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:817: nāpi asya viṣayasya pūrvānubhavaviṣayīkṛtatvam ---- iti niścayaḥ eṣaḥ //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:818: nanu yadi smṛtijñāne anubhavasya satyataḥ prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:821: yāvatā smṛtirvikalparūpatvāt kevalamaparakāśamānameva anubhavaṃ tadviṣayaṃ ca adhyavasyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:835: anubhūtasya anubhavaprakāśitasya viṣayasya apramoṣo'napahāraḥ tathaiva prakāśanaṃ yat etat smṛteḥ ātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tat tathāprakāśanābhāve vighaṭetamām
GSP30abhiprvu:836: kiṃ ca bhrāntau asadvā ātmākāro vā prakhyāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:837: na tu tayā arthaḥ svīkriyate tasya aprakāśanāt iti tayā artho na vyavasthāpita eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:840: na ca tadaprakāśane saṃskārajatvena kiṃcit kṛtyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:842: na ca anubhavena viṣayaprakāśanātmanā smṛtyabhidhānāyā bhrānteḥ kicidapi sādṛśyam asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:844: nanu yo'nubhavo yaśca tadviṣayaḥ sa yataḥ tayā adhyavasīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:849: na prakāśyate iti cet punarapi viṣayo na spṛṣṭa eva anayā iti sādṛśyamiti śabdagaḍumātram ,
GSP30abhiprvu:853: iha smṛteḥ anyasya vā bhrāntibodhasya svasaṃvedanāṃśe prakāśamāne na bhrāntitā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:855: yastu tatra adhyavasīyate svākāraḥ sa viparītatayā asvākāratvena arthatayā iti tatrāṃśe bhrāntitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:856: sa cāṃśo'rthalakṣaṇo na smṛtyā anyayā vā bhrāntyā spṛśyate iti tatra asau tūṣṇīkā iti balādeva tatrāṃśe jaḍatvam asyā āyātaṃ ghaṭajñānasyeva paṭe /
GSP30abhiprvu:857: na ca jaḍena viṣayasya kiṃcit kṛtyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:859: atha tu tam avasāyarūpaṃ svasaṃvedanāṃśaṃ svākāraṃ vā avalambya ajaḍatvam asyāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:860: evamapi ajāḍye nijaṃ svasaṃvedanam ullekhaśca svākāraḥ ---- itīyati eṣā pariniṣṭhitā
GSP30abhiprvu:861: smṛtiḥ iti viṣayasya nāmāpi prahītum aśaknuvataḥ tataḥ smṛtyadhyavasāyāt kathaṃ viṣayasya
GSP30abhiprvu:863: saṃskāre satyapi smṛtiḥ na kathaṃcana ghaṭate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:864: tataśca parasparasaṅgatihīnāni sakalāni jñānāni ---- iti yaduktaṃ ślokapañcakena tat idānīṃ prakṛte yojayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:867: janasya lokasya yā kācana sthitiḥ vyavahāraḥ sā sarvajñānānāṃ yat anusaṃdhānam ekaviṣayabhāvopapannasmṛtitāprāptirūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:870: prathamamapi hi pratyakṣajñānam ahamitipūrvāpararūpānusaṃdhānena smaraṇānuprāṇitena vinā na ghaṭate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:874: evaṃ jñānānām yat anusaṃdhānam tato jāyamānā janasthitiḥ evam iti parābhyupagame sati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:878: anyonyam tāvat bhinnāni jñānāni ---- anyat anubhavajñānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:883: evaṃ na svarūpato na vedyayo vā ekībhāvarūpam anusaṃdhānam asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:885: na ca turyaṃ jñāteyanibandhanam anusandhānādhāyi saṃbhāvyate iti dhvaṃseran vyavahārāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:886: na ca dhvaṃsantām iti bhavadabhīṣṭaśāpamātrāt te dhvaṃsante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:887: prakāśante yataḥ tata etat āpadyate ---- etadeva samarthayitum udyantavyam ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:888: tacca asmadabhimataprakāreṇa vinā vidherapi aśakyasamarthanam ---- iti darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:891: saṃvit tāvat prakāśate iti tāvat na kecit apahnuvate /
GSP30abhiprvu:892: sā tu saṃvit yadi svātmamātraviśrāntā arthasya sā kathaṃ prakāśaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:893: sa hi arthadharma eva tathā syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:894: tataśca arthaprakāśaḥ tāvatyeva paryavasita iti galito grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:895: ato 'rthaprakāśarūpaṃ saṃvidam icchatā balādeva artho'pi tadrūpāntargata eva aṅgīkratavyaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:896: sa ca arthaprakāśo yadi anyaśca anyaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:897: tat na smaraṇam upapannamityata eka eva asau ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:898: ekatvāt sarvo vedyarāśiḥ tena kroḍīkṛtaḥ ---- ityetadapi anicchatā aṅgīkāryam /
GSP30abhiprvu:899: evamapi satatameva unmagnena nimagnena vā viśvātmanā prakāśeta ,
GSP30abhiprvu:901: na caivam , ataḥ svarūpāntarbruḍitam artharāśim aparamapi bhinnākāram ātmani parigṛhya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:902: kaṃcideva arthaṃ svarūpāt unmagnam ābhāsayati ---- iti āpatitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:904: unmagnābhāsabhinnaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ vahirmukhatvāt tacchāyānurāgāt navaṃ navaṃ jñānamuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:905: evamapi navanavābhāsāḥ pratikṣaṇam udayavyayabhāja iti saiva vyavahāranivahahāniḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:906: tena kvacit ābhāse gṛhītapūrve yat saṃvedanaṃ bahirmukham abhūt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:907: tasya yat antarmukhaṃ citsvarūpatvaṃ tat kālāntare 'pi avasthāsnu svātmagataṃ tadviṣayaviśeṣe bahirmukhatvaṃ parāmṛśati iti eśā smṛtiśaktiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:908: yacca tat navaṃ bhāsayati smarati vā tat vastutaḥ saṃvidā viśvamayyā tādātmyavṛtti iti viśvamayaṃ pūrṇameva iti navaṃ na kiṃcit ābhāsitaṃ smṛtaṃ vā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:909: idamapi pravāhapatitam urīkāryam ---- yat kila tat ābhāsyate tat saṃvido vicchiidyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:917: yataḥ eṣa eva paritaśchedanāt pariccheda ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:921: sa eva hi tena tena vapuṣā jānāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:925: jīve niruddhā tatrāpi paramātmani sā sthitā //}
GSP30abhiprvu:926: ityādi / etāsāṃ ca jñānādiśaktīnām asaṃkhyaprakāro vaicitryavikalpa iti tatsāmarthyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:928: tadevaṃ cidvapuḥ ityekaṃ kṛtvā iyadāyātam viśvarūpaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:929: tata eva ca pariniṣṭhitaikarūpajaḍabhāvavailakṣaṇyāt jñānādiśaktiyuktatāmāheśvaryam upasaṃprāptaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:930: etadanupagame na kiṃcit idaṃ bhāseta ---- iti prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:931: bhāsate tu , tasmāt etat avaśyāṅgīkartavyam ---- iti prasaṅgaviparyayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:933: yadyevaṃ na syāt ---- iti prāktanena ślokena saha saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:936: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ īśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre paradarśanānupapattirnāma tṛtīyamāhnikam // 3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:941: tadubhayānugrāhiṇī apohanaśaktiḥ ---- iti tāvat vastusaṃbhavakrameṇa pradarśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:945: tatra saṃskāramātrāt tāvat mā nāma udapādi smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:946: idaṃ tu vaktavyam ---- tathābhūtabhavadabhyupagatabhagavatprabhāvo'pi katham enāṃ kuryāt ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayituṃ smṛtitattvanirūpaṇāya
GSP30abhiprvu:951: tatra ślokena svapakṣe smṛtirupapannā ---- iti kathitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:953: tṛtīyena anubhavena tadviṣayeṇa ca ekībhāvaparyanta āveśaḥ smaraṇasya uktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:954: turyeṇa anubhavasya na viṣayatayā smṛtyā prakāśanam ---- iti nirūpitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:955: pañcamena yogijñānamapi anubhavaṃ pṛthagbhāvena na viṣayīkaroti ---- iti baḍatā turyaślokārtha eva upodvalitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:956: ṣaṣṭhenāśaṅkyamānam anubhavasya smṛtyā pṛthagviṣayīkaraṇaṃ kākpanikam ---- ityavāstavīkṛtam /
GSP30abhiprvu:957: saptamena smṛtiprasaṅgāt vikalpe'pi pūrvānubhavena aikyātmāveśo darśitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:958: aṣṭamena smartavyasya smṛteḥ smartuśca ekacittattvaviśrāntiḥ uktā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:959: prasaṅgācca dṛśyasya darśanasya draṣṭuśca ---- iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:963: pūrvamanubhūtasya arthasya ya upalandhā antarmukho bodhaḥ sa tāvat adyāpi parataḥ smṛtikāle'pi astyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:965: anubhavasya ca antaḥ artho'pi apṛthagbhāvena avasthitaḥ ---- ityetadapi ayatnasiddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:966: iyat tu cintyam ---- akālakalite saṃvedane tadantarvartini ca viśvatra bhāvajāte yadi tāvat cinmayatāparāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:967: tat aham iti etāvataiva pūrṇena vimarśena bhāvyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:974: apūrvatābhāsanācca tat anubhavanameva syāt na smaraṇam ---- ityāśaṅgyāha svairī iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:975: svam ātmīyam upakaraṇam īrayati svakartavyeṣu avaśyaṃ tacchīlaśca ;
GSP30abhiprvu:976: svaṃ ca ātmānam īrayati na punaḥ svakartavye prerakamapekṣate ---- iti svairī svatantraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:978: sa iti vimarśanasya ca iyadrūpam ---- yat sarvathā akālakalitasvarūpaparāmarśanameva na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:979: nāpi atyantaṃ bhedena vimarśanameva api tu yo bhāvaḥ pūrvamanubhavakāle taddeśakālapramātrantarasācivyena pṛthakkṛto na ca ahantāyāmeva līnīkṛtaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:980: sa tādṛgeva tamaseva ācchādya avasthāpitaḥ saṃskāraśabdavācyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:982: tatra apahastite sa pūrvavat pṛthakkṛte evāvabhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:983: nanu ca idantayā avabhāset pūrvavadeva , naivam /
GSP30abhiprvu:986: pūrvakālaparāmarśaḥ iti viruddhapūrvāparaparāmarśasvabhāva eva sa iti parāmarśa ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:987: evaṃ ca sa eva parameśvaraḥ smarati /
GSP30abhiprvu:988: etadeva hi tasya smartṛtvam ---- yat evaṃprakāraparāmarśocitakālakalādisparśasahiṣṇumāyāpramātṛbhāvaparigrahaḥ iti māyāvidyādvayādvayamayam
GSP30abhiprvu:989: tata eva sakalasiddhivitaraṇacaturacintāmaṇiprakhyam āgamikāḥ smaraṇameva mantrādiprāṇitaṃ manyante / tathā ca @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:992: anena tṛnnantasamāsena yatnato 'nubhavasyārthamukhena kālasparśam arthaviśrāntatāṃ dvayorapi pramātari nirūḍhiṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:996: tatra yadi kaścid brūyāt ---- iha smṛtirvikalpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:999: anubhavena ca yena so'rthaḥ prakāśatāṃ nītaḥ sa idānīṃ kīrtimātramūrtirjātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1000: na ca so'pi smṛtyā prakāśyate ---- jñānasya jñānāntareṇāsaṃvedyatvāt asattvācceti
GSP30abhiprvu:1001: arthasya prakāśanābhāvāt idaṃ smarāmi iti jñānaṃ bhrāntimātrameva ---- iti punarapi āpatitam ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1007: evaṃ ca yāvat adhyavasāyo'rthasya tāvat arthāt iti sāmarthyāt iyat abhyupagantavyam ---- yat so'rthaḥ prakāśate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1017: ābhāsāntaravyāmiśraṇābhāve 'pi tu kālābhāsasaṃbhedenaiva svālakṣaṇyaṃ tasya ābhāsasya karoti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1020: tāvatyeva vā smṛtiḥ ābhāsāntarairapi vyāmiśrā atisphuṭeti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1025: bhāsayet iti vidhirūpeṇa niyogena niyamo lakṣyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1030: pūrvābhāsitaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vedyāṃśasparśī bhūtakālo ghaṭābhāsasyāpi kevalasya svālakṣaṇyāpattiheturdarśitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1032: arthitātiśayāt tu sphuṭatvam iti atha śabdo dyotayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1035: nanu evaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśane bhedena bahistadavabhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1036: etadeva hi bahiravabhāsanam ---- yat svalakṣaṇaprakāśanam iti śaṅkāśamanāya nirūpayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1037: na ca yuktaṃ smṛterbhede smaryamāṇasya bhāsanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1038: tenaikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditaiṣa saḥ // Ipk_1,4.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1039: smaraṇajñānāt bhinnatvena bahīrūpatayā yadi so 'rtho bhāseta smaryamāṇasya ca yat bhāsanaṃ tadeva na syāt smaryamāṇameva tat na syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1041: nanu caivaṃ kathaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśanam uktam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1042: etat na idāṇīṃ prakāśanam api tu pūrvakāle eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1047: tataḥ kim ? ubhayamapi na kiṃcit syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1049: maivam , yasya hi saṃvedanānyeva bhinnāni tattvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1051: asmaddarśane tu bhinnakālā api saṃvidaḥ tatkālātyāgenaiva ekatāvabhāsanena svatantraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1052: pramātā yāvadantarmukhatayā tāvatyaṃśe vimṛśati tāvat prakāśasya tātkālikabahirbhāvābhāso
GSP30abhiprvu:1054: etadeva vedanādhikaṃ veditṛtvaṃ ---- vedaneṣu saṃyojanaviyojanayoḥ yathāruci karaṇaṃ svātantryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1056: ghaṭamahamanvabhūvam iti vā sa ghaṭaḥ iti vā aikyam anusaṃdhānam anusaṃdhāturabhinnam iti darśayituṃ yadeva aikyaṃ sa eva veditā iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1057: eṣa sa iti ācchāditasyeva pramātṛtattvasya sphuṭāvabhāsanaṃ kṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1064: nanu ca prācya eva anubhavo yadi smaryamāṇasya bahiravabhāsanarūpaḥ prakāśaḥ tarhi iyat ucyatām ---- so'nubhava idānīṃ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyate ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1065: aikyena tu alaukikena ko'rthaḥ iti vyāmohaṃ vihantumāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1068: pūrvo ghaṭādiḥ arthaḥ pṛthak iti idantayā bhāti sma naivaṃ smaraṇakāle smṛtijñānāt pṛthaktvena idaṃ pūrvamanubhavanam iti bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1069: yathā ca smṛtikāle tasmāt smṛtijñānāt so'rthaḥ prāk iti pūrvasvabhāvo na bhedena ābhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1070: smṛtikāle bahiravabhāsābhāvāt evaṃ tata eva hetoḥ pūrvo 'pi anubhavo na bhedena ābhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1074: aham ---- ityevaṃsvabhāvo ya ātmā pūrvāparasaṃvidantarmukhasvabhāvaḥ tatra yat ārohaṇam
GSP30abhiprvu:1075: viśramaḥ tena hetunā pūrvasaṃvidrūpatāyāḥ svaprakāśāyā bhāsanāt tallonasyāpi ghaṭasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1077: ātmani ca ārohaṇam viśramaṇā anubhavasya arthasya ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:1078: prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ ---- iti nyāyāt saṃkhyākṣipte tadvati vā kartṛbhūte 'smadarthe 'nubhavo bruḍitaḥ taddvāreṇa artho'pi ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1082: hi yasmāt naiva bhāti pūrvo 'nubhavaḥ pṛthak aparārdhoktāt hetoḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1084: luṅā bhūtakālasya dyotitatvāt prāk iti bhinnakramaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1088: nanu ka evamāha ---- anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1089: ghaṭavat na bhāti iti cet kiṃ tataḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1090: ghaṭo'pi hi na anubhavasakhyaḥ bhāti iti kiṃ na bhāti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1091: svabhāvena bhāti iti tu ubhayatrāpi samānam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1092: tathā hi ---- atītānāgatasūkṣmādi yathā yogijñāne viṣayībhavati iti abhyupagatam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1097: ālambanayogaśca kathaṃ śaṅkayeta na ca sālambanam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1098: tasmāt parakīyamanubhavanamiva nijamapi viṣayīkriyatām ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭānta evāsiddhaḥ iti bhānti ityantena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1099: abhyupagamena vā siddhatve 'pi prakṛte 'rthe viṣamaḥ iti śeṣeṇa darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1102: yoginām yat etat darśanāntaram bhāvanādyudbhavaḥ paracittaviṣayo jñānaviśeṣaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1103: tatra dṛśaḥ iti upalabdhayo na bhānti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1104: tathā hi ---- saugatānāṃ tāvat svaprakāśaikarūpaṃ jñānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1106: tarhi yad asya nijaṃ vapuḥ ananyavedyatayā prakāśanaṃ nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1109: puruṣaśca asaṃvedya parvā iti kathaṃ vedyā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1110: vaiśeṣikāṇāmapi ātmani abhedena samavāyi saṃvedanaṃ paragataṃ manasā kathaṃ gṛhyeta antaḥśarīravṛttinā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1111: taccharīrāntaranupraveśe tu tasyaiva aham iti śarīrīkaraṇāt ahantāvabhāsitatvāt ātmano bhedo vigalet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1114: tasmāt yoginaḥ paracittavedanāvasare iyān prakāśaḥ ---- etaddehaprakāśasahacārī ghaṭasukhādiprakāśaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1117: pramātrīkṛtaparadehaprāṇādisamavabhāsasaṃskārāt tu tanniṣṭhām idantām eva prakāśabhāge 'pi manyamāna idaṃ parajñānam iti abhimanyate avigalitasvaparavibhāgo yogī /
GSP30abhiprvu:1118: prāptaprakarṣastu sarvam ātmatvena paśyan svasṛṣṭameva svaparavibhāgaṃ manyate iti jñānasya na yogijñānena prakāśyatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1119: bhavatu vā tathāpi prakṛtaṃ na etatsamam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1120: tathā hi ---- ayamanubhavati iti paraniṣṭha eva asau anubhave yoginaḥ prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1121: na tu ahamanubhavāmi iti ātmāroheṇa vartamānaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1122: iha tu anvabhūvam iti ahamaṃśaviśrāntiḥ anālīḍhedaṃbhāvaiva anubhavasya iti yuktamuktam ---- yasmāt anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti tasmāt aikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditā iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:1123: yadyahaṃabhāvaviśrāntivaśāt anubhavaḥ smṛtau pṛthak na bhāti iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1124: tadā parāmarśāntaraṃ sākṣādeva idantayā anubhavaṃ parāmṛśat yadi vā idaṃbhāvocitaghaṭādiviśrāntatām anubhavasya prathayat upalabdham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1125: iti tadanusāreṇāpi kiṃ na vyavahriyate iti parābhiprāyaṃ pratikṣipati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1129: sa hi na pṛthagbhūtāṃ dṛśaṃ kāṃcit manyate ---- sā dṛk me āsīt ityevam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1130: evamapi tu yat smaryate evaṃbhūtamapi yat smaraṇaṃ kasyacit vivecakaṃmanyasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1132: padasyeva prakṛtipratyayārthanirūpaṃaṃ kālpanikaṃ vibhajya ākaraṇaṃ paratra pratipādanamātram /
GSP30abhiprvu:1135: yata eva tat rāhoḥ śiraḥ itivat kalpitaṃ bhedaṃ manyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1136: anyathā sa ghaṭaḥ itivat sā dṛk ityatrāpi prāktanaṃ dṛgantaram apekṣaṇīyaṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1137: tat ityanena hi ghaṭasya vā dṛśo vā pūrvānubhavaviṣayāpattiḥ ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1139: tataśca dṛk mayā dṛgantareṇa anubhūtā iti āpatet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1143: nanu atra dayitāvadananalinādiviśrāntaṃ darśanam uktam na tu ātmārūḍham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1146: kartuḥ kriyayā hi āpyaṃ karma iti dṛśikriyāyāḥ kartṛniṣṭhataiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1147: tathā ca kartṛsthāmeva dṛśikriyāmāhuḥ darśayate bhṛtyān rājā ityādau /
GSP30abhiprvu:1148: jaiminīyairapi jñānarūpā dṛśiḥ bhāvanātmikā pramātṛviśrāntaiva uktā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1150: anyā saṃvit vā'svatantrā iti anyat etat /
GSP30abhiprvu:1155: anye tu bhinnakramatvena yojayanti ---- dṛk āsīt sā me ityevam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1156: mayā dṛṣṭam iti ca yat smaraṇaṃ tat vyākaraṇamasyāḥ iti anantaroktānvabhūvamityucitaparāmarśāyāḥ smṛteḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1158: nanu dṛṣṭamapi nirvikalpakena yāvat na parāmṛṣṭaṃ vimarśaviśeṣaviśrāntyā tāvat na smaryate mārgadṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaparṇādi viśeṣeṇa rūpeṇa ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1160: samanantarabhāvivikalpakāle taddarśanam idantayā avabhātapūrvaṃ vā na vā iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1164: iha darśanaṃ yādṛśaṃ nijena vapuṣā tādṛśenaiva tena bhātavyaṃ sarvadā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1165: tacca svakāle'nanyaprakāśam aham ityetāvatā svarūpeṇa ucitaprakāśam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1168: kiṃ tu avasāyo 'pi evaṃbhūtaḥ iti apiśabdena sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1169: tatra samanantarabhāvinā vikalpena vastu parāmṛśyamānam anubhavaparāmarśamukhena vā parāmṛśyate ahamimaṃ paśyāmi iti vartamānatayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1170: imam ityanena ca pratyakṣavyāpāratvaṃ pratyakṣāyamāṇatvena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1173: tatra antye vikalpe darśanasya pṛthak parāmarśa eva nāsti iti kā tatra idantāśaṅkā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1174: tataśca pāriśeṣyāt ahantayā tasya atrāsti parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1175: tadabhāve vikalpasya nimīlitākṣe 'pi bhāvāt svayamarthasparśe sati sphuṭamaviṣayaparyavasitaḥ kathamadhyavasāyo bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1176: ādye tu darśanaṃ parāmṛṣṭamapi asmadarthe 'ntarbhūtam ahaṃbhāvāspadam avasātari viśrāntaṃ svaprakāśameva parāmṛṣṭam iti vikalpo'pi na bodhāntarabodhyatāṃ bodhayati bodhasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:1183: jñānasya jñānāntareṇa parāmarśe hi ayameva nyāyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1187: smṛtaṃ mayā iti ahantārūḍhyaiva vikalpādeḥ avabhāsāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1188: ata eva ātmano'mī vikalpādyāḥ śaktiviśeṣāḥ tadviśrāntaśarīratvāt iti darśitam jñānasmṛtyapohanaśaktimān ityatra //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:1192: tat iti tasmādarthe pūrvoktasya prameyasya hetubhāvena upajīvanam iha sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1193: yata evamuktam ---- anubhavasya arthasyeva smaraṇāt na bhedena avabhāsaḥ smrṭiśaktiśca parameśvarasyaiva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1197: ---- parāmarśabhedāt kadācit svātmaparāmarśapūrvakam anubhāvyam parāmṛśati yatra asya abhisaṃdhipradhānatā mayā dṛśyate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1198: kadācit anubhavanīyameva pradhānatayā parāmṛśati yatra anabhisaṃdhereva sahasā vastūpanipātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1199: arthakriyāṃ prati āgrahaviśeṣo vā ayam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1202: evamubhayathānubhave pratyekaṃ smṛtirapi dvayaparāmarśamayī udeti iti catvāraḥ smaraṇabhedāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1208: teṣu ca grāhyaṃ tāvat prakāśāt abahirbhūtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1214: tadevāpṛthagbhūtaṃ atra pṛthagbhūtaṃ ca bhavati iti nūnamanyaḥ kalpitaprakāśātmā kaścit atra artho 'sti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1215: yato 'yam artharāśiḥ pṛthagbhavan anyonyamapi pṛthaktām adhigacchet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1216: anyathā prakāśābhinnānāṃ parasparamapi kathaṅkāraṃ pṛthagbhāvo bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1220: aham iti vicchedaśūmyaprakāśocitena parāmarśena parāmṛśyamāno māyāpramātā iti vakṣyate {dehe buddhau ...................... /
GSP30abhiprvu:1223: evaṃ samameva svātmani nirmalamakurasthānīye yat yugalakaṃ svasmāt prakāśarūpāt avyatiriktam
GSP30abhiprvu:1224: avabhāsayati parameśvaraḥ tadeva etat bhagavato jñānakartṛtvaṃ smaraṇakartṛtvaṃ jñānaśaktismṛtiśaktirūpam
GSP30abhiprvu:1227: ayam iti ca yat āmṛśati pramātā prakāśarūpo yena anubhavati iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1229: grāhyarūpeṇa grāhakarūpeṇa yojitau ghaṭādidehādisvabhāvau arthau vedyau pramātari viśuddhaprakāśarūpe bhātaḥ prakāśete /
GSP30abhiprvu:1230: evaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ iti sa iti ca yat parāmṛśati prakāśarūpaḥ pramātā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1233: anubhavarūpopajīvitvaṃ pūrvoktaṃ draḍhayituṃ prasaṅgāt atra jñānaśakterapi unmīlanaṃ kṛtam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1237: grāhako māyīyaḥ kalpitaḥ pramātā aśuddhaprakāśasvabhāvaḥ iti śivam / āditaḥ ślo. 31//
GSP30abhiprvu:1238: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃīśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ prathame jñānādhikāre smṛtiśaktinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturthamāhnikam //
GSP30abhiprvu:1241: jñānaśaktipradīpena yaḥ sadā taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:1246: tatrādyeva ślokena vastuni pratijñāṃ karoti evaṃbhūtā jñānaśaktiḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1247: tataḥ ślokadvayena prakāśa evārthānāṃ svarūpa, ityāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1248: tato dvayena prakāśabāhyānāmarthānāṃ sadbhāvaṃ vijñānavādyupagatavāsanādūṣaṇena dṛḍhīkṛtam āśaṅkya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1249: tṛtīyena tadanabhyupagame 'pi tāvat na kiñcit uparudhyata iti darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1250: atha ślokena svadarśane 'rthatattvam upadarśayan bāhyārthasadbhāve pratyakṣaṃ parākaroti pramāṇatvena /
GSP30abhiprvu:1252: anantaraṃ ślokena cidātmani arthānām avaśyaṃ sadbhāvaḥ parāmarśātmanā iti prakaṭayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1253: tato 'pi prakāśasya pramātṛrūpasya pratyavamarśa eva jīvatam iti ślokacatuṣṭayena anubhavāgamanyāyasvarūpanirūpaṇābhiḥ abhidhatte /
GSP30abhiprvu:1254: anantaraṃ jñānaparāmarśa eva jñeyaṃ śuddhaṃ pramātṛrūpatānujjhitaṃ ca prakṣayati iti tasyaiva pradhānatve nyāyaṃ ślokatrayeṇāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1255: prakāśaikarūpatve ca jñānajñātrādi bhinnam iti ślokenāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1256: tato jñātari iva viśuddhe jñāne 'pi avikalpakasavikalpakarūpe vimarśa eva prāṇitam iti ślokadvayenāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1258: yat bhinnatvaṃ tat upasaṃhāradiśā ślokena samarthayate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1262: tatra yadi bhedena ābhāsānte 'rthāḥ tat teṣvapi tathaiva avabhāsa ucitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1264: tadanubhava eva tāvat jñānaśaktirūpo vicāraṇīya ityāśayenāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1267: vartamānatvena sphuṭatayā avabhāsanam idamityevamākāraṃ yeṣāṃ teṣām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1269: bhinnānām tato māyāpramātuḥ vicchinnānām avabhāsanam tat paramārthapramātari śuddhacinmaye antaḥsthitavatām tena saha aikātmyam anujjhitavatāmeva ghaṭate pramāṇena upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1270: tena anujjhitasaṃvidabhedasya bhāvasya kalpitapramātrapekṣayā bhedena prakāśanaṃ bhagavato jñānaśaktirityuktaṃ bhavati //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:1273: na ca prakāśo bhinnaḥ syādātmārthasya prakāśatā // Ipk_1,5.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1275: tasya nīlādirūpataiva yadi prakāśamānatā na punaḥ sāparā kācit arthaśarīrottīrṇā prakāśātmatā tarhi yathā sarvān prati nīlameva tatsaṃbhāvanayā bhaṇyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1277: vastuto vā svātmanyeva tat nīlaṃ parasya paraniṣṭhatvānupapatteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1278: svātmani vā na nīlaṃ na anīlam prakāśānugraheṇa vinā vyavasthānāyogāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1279: tathā prakāśamānatāpi asya sarvān prati na kaṃcit vā prati api tu svātmanyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1280: svātmanyapi vā na syāt iti andhatā jagataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1281: atha indriyālokādikṣaṇavargāt prakāśarūpo 'sau nīlakṣaṇo viśiṣṭa eva jātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1284: sarvathā arthaśarīraviśrāntaḥ cet prakāśo mama avabhāsate iti pramātṛlagnatayā prakāśasthitiḥ durupapādā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1285: pramātā hi tadānīm indriyādimayo 'rtharūpaprakāśasya kāraṇaṃ bhavet bījamivāṅkurasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:1287: tato yadi na prakāśātmā sa syāt prāgiva jñānodayāt pūrvaṃ yathā'sāvaprakāśaḥ tathā jñānodaye 'pi syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1289: tat kathaṃ jñānasya udayānudayayoḥ arthasya tulyatā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1291: yāvatā arthāt bhinnaṃ yat jñānaṃ prakāśarūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1293: yadi tāvat arthaḥ prakāśate ityevaṃbhūtaṃ jñānasya svarūpaṃ tat arthajñānayoḥ abheda evāyātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1295: arthasvabhāvatve ca sati prakāśasya arthātmatāyām uktaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1296: atha arthaṃ prakāśayati iti jñānasya svarūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1297: tarhi prakāśamānamarthaṃ karoti jñānam iti āpatite punarapi sa eva doṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1298: kṛtapratānaśca ayaṃ prakṛtyarthaṇyarthaviveko mayaiva bhedavidāraṇe iti tata eva anveṣyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1299: tasmāt bhinnaḥ prakāśo 'rthasya saṃbandhī bhavati iti saṃbhāvanaiva nāsti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1300: tacca idam upapattyā āyātam ---- arthasya svarūpaṃ prakāśamānatā prakāśābhinnatvam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1301: prakāśaśca yadi ghaṭe 'nyaḥ paṭe 'nyaḥ tadā anusaṃdhānasya ayogaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1302: dvayoḥ prakāśayoḥ svātmamātraparyavasānād iti vitatya upapāditaṃ naśyet janasthitiḥ ityatra /
GSP30abhiprvu:1304: etadeva āvṛttyā darśitaṃ na ca prakāśo bhinnaḥ syāt iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:1306: bhinne prakāśe cābhinne saṃkaro viṣayasya tat /
GSP30abhiprvu:1308: yadi arthāt anya eva jñānātmā prakāśaḥ ata eva bhinno 'rthataḥ tarhi svātmani tasya prakāśamātrarūpatvāt abheda eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1310: pītasya prakāśaḥ iti yo nīlāṃśaḥ pītāṃśaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1311: sa na tāvat jñānasya svarūpam bhedavādatyāgāpatteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1313: tadevedaṃ vicāryate ---- iha prakāśabalāt nīlapītayoḥ bhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1314: yenaiva ca prakāśena nīlo nīla eva iti upagamyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1315: tenaiva ca prakāśena pītaḥ pīta iti kathaṃ saṃgacchatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1318: tena vā saha samānasāmagrīka ityādi yat ucyate tat siddhe nīlapītayorbhede syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1320: atha nīlākāro 'sau tat yadi pratibimbabalāt taddvitīyabimbānavabhāsāt ayuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1323: tathā karaṇatādivāde śikharasthajñānaṃ bahutaranīlādijanyam ekatra paṭu anyatra mandam iti kathaṃ bhedaḥ prakāśaśarīrasya abhedāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1324: tathābhūte ca anyataradarśanodbhūte 'pi saṃskāre balādeva aśeṣasmaraṇaprasaṅga iti bhūyān saṅkaraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1328: svātmani hi nīlaṃ yadi pūtaṃ na kiṃcit vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1333: iti / tat yadi prakāśaḥ tadā bhavati arthaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1335: yadi prakāśataiva ghaṭasya vapuḥ saiva paṭasya ityādi viśvavapuḥ prakāśaḥ siddhaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:1339: tatra prakāśasya avicitrasya krameṇa vicitratākāraṇaṃ pratibimbātmakaṃ tatpratibimbasajātīyaṃ yat tadeva nīlādirūpaṃ bāhyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1341: tathāpi idaṃ nīlamiti pratyakṣeṇa adhyavasāyāt adhyavasāyaprāṇitatvācca pramāṇasthiteḥ pratyakṣavyapadeśyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1346: tasyāpi tatprabodhasya vaicitrye kiṃ nibandhanam // Ipk_1,5.5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1350: tarhi tat aprakāśarūpam iti na prakāśeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1356: aṇumātramapi na rūpāntaram asya asti iti abhinno bodhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1357: tasya ca abhinnasya kadācit nīlābhāsatā kadācit pītābhāsatā iti ye vicitrābhāsāḥ tatra kāraṇatvam hi yasymāt na upapannam hetau abhinne kāryabhedasya asaṃbhavāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1358: tasmāt sa sa vicitranīlapītādirūpa ākāsmiko 'jñātapratyakṣasiddhahetukaḥ san bāhyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1360: jñānāt sarvathā pṛthagbhūtam anumāpayati iti saṃbhāvayate bāhyārthavādī //4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1363: tathā hi vijñānavādinā yo hetuḥ vaicitrye vāsanāprabodhalakṣaṇa uktaḥ sa na upapadyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1364: smṛtijanakaḥ saṃskāro vāsanā iti tāvat prasiddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1366: astu vā nīlādyābhāsasaṃpādanasāmarthyarūpā jñānasya yogyatātmikā śaktiḥ vāsanā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1369: tatrāpi tu brūmaḥ ---- iha yadyāpi ābhāsānāṃ jñānāntarvartinām apāramārthikatvaṃ saṃvṛtisattvam ucyetāpi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1370: tathāpi yadeṣāṃ tad vastusadeva aṅgīkāryam avastunaḥ sarvasāmarthyavirahitālakṣaṇasya kāryasaṃpādanaprāṇitasāmārtthyātmakasvabhāvānupapatteḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1371: evaṃsthite yā etā vāsanā ābhāsakāraṇatvena iṣyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1377: tathā yena rūpeṇa āsāṃ pāramārthikatā tena kāraṇatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1378: tat tarhi jñānamātraṃ tacca abhinnam iti nīlādyābhāsarūpasya kāryabhedasya asiddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1379: evaṃ vāsanānām abicitratve tatprabodho vicitra iti kā pratyāśā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1381: tathāpi bodhamātrātiriktasya deśakālabhāvādeḥ prabodhakābhimatasya vicitrasya kāraṇasya abhāvāt prabodho'vicitra iti eka eva prabodhaḥ iti samameva nīlādivaicitryaṃ bhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1382: atha svasaṃtānavartīni jñānāntarāṇi vicitrāṇi prabodhakāraṇāni iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1384: sukhaduḥkhanīkapīlādipūrvāparādideśakālabhedasya vijñānamātrarūpatve vijñānasya ca prakāśamātrapramārthatāyāṃ svarūpabhedāsaṃbhave tathā bodhavailakṣaṇyānupapatteḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1389: anumātrabhimatasaṃbinmātrarūpābhede paratvaṃ kasya bhavet iti na vidmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1391: so 'pi pramāṇena yadi na siddhaḥ tat asat eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1392: siddho 'pi prameyatayā cet tat jaḍa eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1393: tathāpi ca kāyādivat eva jñānamātrasvabhāvaḥ svasaṃvinmātrarūpatve paraṃ prati asya asiddheḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1394: nanu vyāhārādikriyā svātmani icchayā vyāhareyam ityevaṃrūpayā hetubhāvena vyāptā dṛṣṭā tat caitrakāye'pi tayā taddhetukayā bhāvyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1395: na ca matsaṃtatipatitā samīhā asti iti svasaṃvedanena niścitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1398: atrocyate ---- iha anumātuḥ vyāhārābhāso dvidhā bhavati ---- vyāptigrahaṇakāle 'vicchedaprāṇo 'haṃ vyāharāmi ityevaṃrūpaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1399: anumānāvasare ca vyāharati ayam iti vicchedajīvita iti anyasya vyāptiḥ gṛhītā anyaśca ābhāsaḥ katham idānīṃ hetuḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1400: vyāharati iti ābhāsasya hetuḥ avidita eva iti kathaṃ tato hetoḥ samīhā anumīyeta ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1401: kiṃ ca vyāharati ayam iti yaḥ pramātrantare 'numātṛsaṃmate vicchinnatayā avabhāsaḥ so'numeyasaṃmatāyāḥ paramīhāyāḥ kathaṃ kāryaḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1402: tasyā hi vyāharāmītyābhāsaḥ kāryo yo'sau avicchedajīvitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1403: na ca avicchedamayasya vicchedamayaḥ kāryam iti yuktaṃ tathābhūtakāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇopāyābhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1404: na hi svātmani yo'yam avicchinnābhāsaḥ sa paratra vicchinnaṃ vyāharati ityevaṃrūpam ābhāsaṃ janayati iti kenacit pramāṇena siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1407: na ca avaśyan avicchinnāt vicchinnena bhāvyam iti niyamo 'sti vyavhicārāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1408: na ca vicchinno 'pi ābhāsa upadyatām iti tadanusaṃdhānāt tadutpattiḥ niyatā tatsadbhāve 'pyasyānutpatteḥ tadabhāve ca utpatteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1409: vicchinna ābhāsaḥ paratra utpadyatām iti yā samīhā tayā saha pratra utpannasya vicchinnābhāsasya kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇameva parāsiddhau na
GSP30abhiprvu:1411: pramātrantarāṇi ca yadi bhinnāni tadā tanniṣṭhānām avabhāsānāṃ bheda eva jñānādavyatiriktaṃ ca iti nyāyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1412: tataśca ekābhāsaniṣṭhatvābhāvāt ekābhāsaviśrāntaḥ saṃbhūya pramātḥṇāṃ vyavahāro na syāt iti anyosaṃbhavaḥ ---- yat prameyaṃ bodhāt bhinnaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1413: sahopalambhaniyamādeḥ anaikāntikatvāt nīlapītādināpi prameyarāśinā kim apakṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1416: siddhau vā sarvapramātrantargatā ābhāsā ekaikatra paratra ābhāsavaicitryahetuṃ vāsanodvodhavaicitryaṃ janayeyuḥ niyame hetvantarābhāvāt iti tathāpi na nīlādivaicitryasiddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1417: evaṃ vāsanānāṃ tadudbodhahetūnāṃ ca vicitrāṇām anupapattireva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1419: abhinno bodhaḥ tasya ākasmikābhāsabhedahetutvānupapatteḥ bāhyo'rtho'numeyaḥ saṃbhāvyate iti yadi bāhyārthavādinā ucyate iti ślokadvayārthaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1422: adhunā tu enāṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ śithilayituṃ tāvadāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1425: syādetat iti pūrvoktasaṃbhāvanābhyupagame yadā vyākhyāyate tadā kiṃ tu iti vākyaśeṣeṇa tacchaithilyaviṣayaṃ saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ śeṣaślokena darśayate iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1426: yadi tu adhyāhāro na sahyate tadā syādetaditi idamapi saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1427: yadanena ślokena ucyate iti ekavākyatayā yojyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1428: anayāpi kaṣṭakalpanayā bāhyān arthān prasādhayatā bhavatā taiḥ na kiṃcit kartavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1430: na hi nityānumeyena kaścit vyavahāra iti kiṃ bāhyena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1432: bādhakaṃ ca prakāśāt bhede anumeyatayāpi prakāśanābhāva iti tāvat mukhyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1436: aṇusaṃcayabāhyavāde 'pi saṃcayasya anyasya abhāve paramāṇava eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1437: te ca yadi saṃyujyante nirantaratayā tat avaśyaṃ digbhāgabhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1438: evanākṣe ṣaṭsu dikṣu saṃcīyamāneṣu ṣaṭsu aṇuṣu madhyamasya paramāṇoḥ yatraiva dhāmni eko lagnaḥ tatraiva yadi aparaḥ tat ekaparamāṇumātratā
GSP30abhiprvu:1439: atha anyatra ekaḥ anyatar aparaḥ tat avaśyaṃ bhāgabhedāpattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1441: tasyāpi eṣaiva saraṇiḥ iti na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate bāhyaṃ tattvataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1443: saṃyoge bhinnadeśatvāvyāvṛtteḥ tanniṣṭaṃ dvyaṇukaṃ nāma kāryadravyam aṇuparimāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1447: yacca avyāpyavṛttitvaṃ saṃyogasya ucyate tanniraṃśe kathaṃ saṃgacchatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:1448: svāśraye hi yadi asau samavaiti kim anyāt asya avaśiṣyate yat na vyāpnuyāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1449: abhyuścayabādhakaṃ ca idam iti na atra asmābhiḥ bharaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1451: nanu bādhakaṃ nāma pramāṇasiddhe vastuni na kiṃcit kartuṃ samartham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1452: tenaiva dṛḍhena pramāṇena bādhakābhimatasya bādhitasya apramāṇatvasaṃpādanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1453: darśitaṃ ca iha sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāryahetuḥ tattadākasmikābhāsa iti kārikayā ityāśaṅkya āha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1456: iha tāvat svapna -- smaraṇa -- manorājya -- saṃkalpādiṣu nīlādyābhāsavaicitryaṃ bāhyasamarpakahtuvyatirekeṇaiva nirbhāsate iti yadyapi asti saṃbhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1457: tathāpi tadābhāsavaicitryam asthairyāt sarvapramātrasādhāraṇyāt pūrvānubhavasaṃskārajatvasaṃbhāvanāt avastu iti śaṅkyeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1458: yat punaridaṃ yoginām icchāmātreṇa purasenādivaicitryanirmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1459: tatra upādānaṃ prasiddhamṛtkāṣṭha-śukra -- śoṇi -- tādivaicitryamayaṃ na saṃbhavatyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1460: na hi evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam ---- sarvagatāḥ paramāṇavo yogīcchayā jhaṭiti saṃghaṭitāḥ kāryam ārapsyante iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1462: na ca etat prasiddham ---- pramāṇubhya eva sthūlaṃ ghaṭādi jāyate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1464: tathāpi niyatasahakārisamavalambanam karacaraṇādivyāpāre viśiṣṭadeśakāladharmādhipatyayogaḥ śikṣābhyāsaprakarṣa iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1465: iyati ca āṃśrīyamāṇe yogī kumbhaṃ nirmimāṇaḥ kumbhakāraprasiddhasanastasāmagrīsanarjanapuraḥsaraṃghaṭaṃ ghaṭayan kumbhakāra eva syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1467: tatra yogisaṃvida eva sā tādṛśī śaktiḥ ---- yat ābhāsavaicitryarūpam arthajātaṃ prakāśayati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1468: tadasti saṃbhavaḥ ---- yat saṃvit eva abhyupagatasvātantryā apratīdhātalakṣaṇāt icchāviśeṣavaśāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1469: saṃvido 'nidhikātmatāyā anapāyāt antaḥsthitameva sat bhāvajātam idamityevaṃ prāṇabuddhidehādeḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1470: vitīrṇakiyanmātrasaṃvidūpāt svātantryaṃ kiṃ na abhyupagamyate svasaṃvedanasiddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1472: evakāreṇa idamāha ---- sarveṇa tāvat vādinā viṣayavyavasthāpanaṃ saṃvidrūpam anapahnavanīyam ādisiddhaṃ hi tat iti uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1473: tasya ca svātantryameva devaśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ cidrūpatvam iti kim aparakāraṇānveṣaṇavyasanitayā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1474: hi yasmāt evaṃ prakāśayati deva iti saṃbhāvyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1475: tasmāt kiṃ bāhyena anupapattinā iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:1477: tatra kiṃ makurapratibimbitaghaṭādidṛṣṭāntena jñānapratibimbatābhāsavaicitrye vijñānadarpaṇātiriktaṃ tata eva bāhyābhimataṃ hetuṃ kalpayema
GSP30abhiprvu:1478: kiṃ vā yogidṛṣṭāntena saṃvitsvātantryameva hetubhāvena brūyāma ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1479: tadidaṃ sāṃśayikaṃ vartate iti āśaṅkya bāhyārthānumānasaṃbhāvanāṃ sūtradvayena apākartumāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1484: na kevalam anantaraślokanirdiṣṭābhiḥ yuktabhiḥ pratyakṣeṇa bāhyo'rtho na bhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1485: iyadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ tacca nīlaṃ bhāti iti svaprakāśasaṃvidrūpaṃ nādhikaṃ kiṃcit iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1486: yāvat anumānenāpi na asya bāhyāsya siddhiḥ iti apiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1487: tatra anumānam atra naiva pravartitum utsahate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1488: pravṛttamapi na prakṛtasiddhim ādavyāt iti anena sūtradvayena upadarśyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1491: tena yat sarvathā anābhātapūrvam ananubhūtacaraṃ tatra anumānam anumitivyāpāro vikalpātmā naiva kenacit vādinā iṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1492: nanu bhavatu pratyakṣato dṛṣṭe 'numāne saṃkathā iyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1493: sāmānyato dṛṣṭe tu kiṃ vakṣyasi yathā arthopalabdhyā indriyānumāne ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1494: ucyate ---- tatrāpi vikalpena yathā so'rthaḥ spṛśyate tathā anumeya iti sthitiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1495: vikalpaśca na indriyādikam arthaṃ kenacit saṃniveśaviśeṣādinā viśeṣātmanā spṛśati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1496: api tu kiṃcidupalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti amunā svabhāvena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1497: sa ca svabhāvaḥ kāraṇatālakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣagṛhīta eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1498: tathā ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ tantubhyaḥ paṭa ityādau kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhabalena tāvat niśceyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1499: tatra ca pratyakṣaṃ pratyābhāsaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhajate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1500: vimarśalakṣaṇasya pramitivyāpārasya ekaikaśabdavācye'rthe pravṛtteḥ tadanusāritvācca pramāṇasya iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1502: iti / ābhāsamātraṃ ca sāmānyam iti nir.eṣuate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1503: anupalambho'pi anyopalambharūpa ābhāsamātraviśrānta eva iti kāraṇābhāso viśeṣaśūnyaḥ parigṛhīta eva bījāt aṅkura iti pratītau /
GSP30abhiprvu:1504: yat yasya niyamam anuvidhatte avyatiriktam tat tasya kāryam iti pratighaṭaṃ mṛttikādirūpahetutadvanmātrasya āmāsāt //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:1507: anābhāse ca nāsti vikalparūpasya anumānasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1508: grāmagṛhādestu yat bāhyaṃ tat agrāmādirūpaṃ na ucyate pratyekaṃ vāṭānūpakuṇyatulādeḥ bāhyatvaprasaṅgāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1510: tasmāt grāmabāhyam ābhāsabāhyam iti ca śabdasāmyamātram etat na vastusāmyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1511: evaṃ ye vikalpe vastu na ābhāti iti manyante teṣāmapi tāvat anumānavikalpo na bāhye upapannaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1512: asmābhistu upapāditam ---- adhyavasāyasyāpi ābhāsamānaviṣayatvam bhrāntitve cāvasāyasya iti sūtre /
GSP30abhiprvu:1513: tena anumānavikalpātmanāpi prakāśena yadi anāviṣṭo nīlādiḥ arthaḥ tat na anumita eva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1515: tarhi prāgivārtho 'prakāśaḥ syāt iti nyāyena prakāśamātrasvabhāva eva , na bāhyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1516: tena bāhye sādhye yat kiṃcit pramāṇam ānīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1519: kenāpi prakāreṇa pratyakṣātmanā anumeyātmanā vā ābhāsanam ābhāso bāhyasya anābhāsasya na kadācit abhūt iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1520: tasmāt siddham cidātmaiva hi deva iti //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:1521: nanu antaḥsthitaṃ bahiḥ prakāśayedityuktaṃ tat antaḥsthitatvam upapādanīyam iti āśaṅkya āha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1523: astyeva na vinā tasmādicchāmarśaḥ pravartate // Ipk_1,5.10 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1530: kiṃ tu tatra aham iti ucite parāmarśe yo 'yam idantāparāmarśaḥ saiva bāhyatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1531: tacca iha antaḥsthitatvam ahamityetāvatā citsamucitenaiva bapuṣā parāmarśanameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1534: yadi hi na syāt kumbhakṛto ghaṭaṃ karavāṇi iti ya uttarakriyāmapekṣya icchāśabdavācyaḥ parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1535: eṣaṇīyena sa parāmṛśyena aniyantritaḥ cet tataḥ paṭecchāpi sā na kasmāt iti saṃkīryeran vyavahārāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1536: atha tatrāpi ca eṣaṇīyaḥ tadānīmeva nirmitaḥ san tathā jātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1537: tarhi tannirmāṇaṃ cidātmani vinecchayā nopapannam iti tiṣṭhāsorevamicchaiva hetutā ityatra varṇayiṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1538: tacca icchāntaramapi viṣayaniyantritaṃ na vā iti vikalpe 'navasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1541: atha tatrāpi tadānīmeva iti kṛtvā anavasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1542: tasmāt sarvo 'yaṃ bhāvarāśiḥ cidātmani aham ityeva vapuṣā satatāvabhāsuravapuḥ aiśvaryarūpācca
GSP30abhiprvu:1543: svātantryalakṣaṇāt svāmibhāvāt vicitreṇa vapuṣā kramākramādinā saṃvit enaṃ bahiḥkaroti
GSP30abhiprvu:1545: tatrāpi kvacit ābhāse pramātḥn ekīkaroti nitambanīnṛtta iva prekṣakān /
GSP30abhiprvu:1547: śarīraprāṇabuddhisukhādyābhāsāṃśeṣu tu bhedasya avigalanāt na sarvathā aikyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1548: ata eva pratikṣaṇaṃ pramātṛsaṃyojanaviyojanavaicitryeṇa parameśvaro viśvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārādinā prapañcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1555: iti / tasmāt sthitam antaḥsthitaṃ bhāvajātaṃ tena vinā tadviṣayasya parāmarśāyogāt iti //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:1557: sa ca avikalpaśuddhasaṃvidvapuṣi bhagavati kathaṃ syāt ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1561: anavabhāsasya ca aprakāśasya ghaṭādeḥ parasparaparihāreṇa dvayoḥ svātmani cet vyavasthānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1562: tat ghaṭapaṭayoḥ iva idamjaḍam idaṃ jaḍam iti durupapādaṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1565: tarhi saṃbandhamātreṇa mṛt api ghaṭasya iti ajaḍā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1566: atha na svasaṃbandhamātram api tu avabhāso 'rthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1567: tarhi arthātmanā sa prakāśa iti samāpatitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1568: na ca anyātmanā anyasya prakāśa upapannaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1570: tarhi avabhāso'pi ghaṭasya kāraṇam iti ghaṭo'pi ajaḍaḥ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1571: atha anyena satāpi ghaṭena yato 'vabhāsasya pratibimbarūpā cchāyā dattā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1572: tām asau adabhāso bibhrat ghaṭasya iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1574: tarhi sphaṭikasalilamakurādiḥ api evaṃbhūta eva iti ajaḍa eva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1575: atha tathābhūtamapi ātmānaṃ taṃ ca ghaṭādikaṃ sphaṭikādiḥ na parāmraṣṭuṃ samartha iti jad.aḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1576: tathāparāmarśanameva ajāḍyajīvitam antarbahiṣkaraṇasvātantryarūpaṃ svābhāvikam avabhāsasya svātmaviśrāntilakṣaṇam ananyamukhaprekṣitvaṃ nāma
GSP30abhiprvu:1577: ahamevaṃ prakāśātmā prakāśe iti hi vimarśodaye svasaṃvideva pramātṛprameyapramāṇādi kṛtārtham abhimanyate na tu atiriktaṃ kāṅkṣati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1578: sphaṭikādi hi gṛhītapratibimbamapi tathābhāvena siddhau pramātrantaram apekṣate iti nirvimarśatvāt jaḍam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1582: iti / madhyāvasthaiva tu idantā vimṛśyamānaūrvāparakoṭiḥ vimūḍhānāṃ māyāpadaṃ saṃsāraḥ iti vimarśa eva pradhānaṃ bhagavata iti sthitam //11//
GSP30abhiprvu:1583: na kevalaṃ saṃvittattvasya asmābhiḥ eva vimarśaprādhānyam uktam yāvat āgamāntarairapi iti darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1586: yato vimarśa eva pradhānam ātmano rūpam amumeva hetuṃ prayojanarūpam uddiśya ātmā dharmisvabhāvo dravyabhūto 'pi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1587: caitantyam iti dharmavācinā śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam āśritya uditaḥ kathitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1594: ityādau api hi dharmaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam ātmano darśitaṃ guruṇā anantena /
GSP30abhiprvu:1595: dravyaṃ hi tat ucyate yadviśrāntaḥ padārthavargaḥ sarvo bhāti ca arthyate ca arthakriyāyai ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1596: tad yadi na tat sakalo 'yaṃ tattvabhūtabhāvabhuvanasaṃbhāraḥ saṃvidi viśrāntaḥ tathā
GSP30abhiprvu:1597: bhavati iti sa eva guṇakarmādidharmāśrayabhūtapadārthāntarasvabhāvaḥ tāmeva mukhyadravyasvarūpam
GSP30abhiprvu:1599: tat anantadharmarāśiviśramabhittibhūtāyāḥ tasyāḥ sa eva dharmaḥ caitanyam iti kartṛkṛdantāt utpannena bhāvapratyayena saṃbandhābhidhāyināpi prādhānyena darśitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1601: dravytarūpasya ca saṃbandhinaḥ prakṛtyā uktatvāt citikriyārūpaṃ dhramaṃ saṃbaddham avagamayatā ṣyañā niṣkṛṣṭāṃśaḥ pratyāyito bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1603: svātaṃtryaṃ saṃyojanaviyojanānusaṃdhānādirūpam ātmamātratāyāmeva jaḍavat aviśrāntatvam aparicchinnaprakāśasāratvam ananyamukhaprekṣitvam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1604: tadeva anātmarūpāt jaḍāt saṃyojanaviyojanādisvātaṃtryavikalāt vailakṣaṇyādāyi iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1605: tadevaṃ paratvena pradhānatayā abhisaṃdhāya ātmā cetana iti vaktavye dharmāntarādharīkaraṇāya vimarśadharmoddhurīkaraṇāya ca ātmā caitanyam ityuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1607: ardhayuk pādaviśrāntiḥ iti hi kāvye samayaḥ , na śāstre /
GSP30abhiprvu:1608: yadi vā citkriyā ātmā ucitaḥ citikartṛtā ca iti pṛthageva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1610: nanu yathā prakāśo 'prakāśaśca iti ybhayamapi svātmani ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1611: tataśca prakāśa iti ukte jaḍāt na vailakṣaṇyam uditaṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1613: iti tenāpi kathaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ jaḍājaḍayoḥ ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1616: cetayati ityatra yā citiḥ citikriyā tasyāḥ pratyavamarśaḥ svātmacamatkāralakṣaṇa ātmā svabhāvaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1617: tathā hi ---- ghaṭena svātmani na camatkriyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1622: caitreṇa tu svātmani ahamiti saṃrambhodyoyollāsavibhūtiyogāt camatkriyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1625: idamiti yaḥ pariccheda etāvadrūpatayā tadvilakṣaṇībhāvena nīlapītasukhaduḥkhatacchūnyatādyasaṃkhyāvabhāsayogena avabhāsyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1627: evaṃ ca vimarśaḥ svātmani avimarśo 'pi svātmani ityasiddametat /
GSP30abhiprvu:1636: vakti viśvam abhilapati pratyavamarśena iti ca vāk ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1637: ata eva sā svarasena cidrūpatayā svātmaviśrāntivapuṣā uditā sadānastamitā nityā ahamityeva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1638: etadeva paramātmano mukhyaṃ svātantryam aiśvaryam īśitṛtvam ananyāpekṣitvam ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1639: parāparaṃ tu idaṃbhāvarūpasya pratyavamarśasya akhyātiprāṇasya udbodhamātre 'pi ahaṃbhāva eva viśrānteḥ śrīsadāśivādibhūmau paśyantīdaśāyām
GSP30abhiprvu:1640: aparaṃ tu idaṃbhāvasyaiva nirūḍhau māyāgarbhādhikṛtānāmeva viṣṇuviriñcendrādīnām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1650: saiṣā sāratayā proktā hṛdayaṃ parameṣṭhinaḥ // Ipk_1,5.14 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1652: svapuṣpaṃ kasmāt nāsti ityukta itivaktāro bhavanti ghaṭo hi sphurati mama na tu itarat iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1654: tat sarvadā sarvasya sphuret na kasyacidvā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1658: eṣaiva ca kiñcidrūpatā yat acalamapi calamābhāsate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1660: atiricyate iva iti tat acalameva ābhāsabhedayuktamiva ca bhāti / tata uktam @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1664: {atikruddhaḥ prahṛṣṭo vā kiṃ karomīti vā mṛśan /
GSP30abhiprvu:1672: sā ca svapuṣpādikamapi vyāpnoti iti mahatī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1673: deśakālau nīlādivat saiva sṛjati iti tābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇīyā na bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1674: yat kila yena tulyakakṣyatayā bhāti tat tasya viśeṣaṇaṃ kaṭaka iva caitrasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:1675: na ca deśakālau vimarśena tulyakakṣyau bhātaḥ tayoḥ idantayā tasya ca ahantayā prakāśe tulyakakṣyatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1678: pi tannirmāṇayogāt iti tato 'pi vyāpakatvanityatve / taduktam @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1680: iti / sāram iti yat atucchaṃ rūpaṃ tat iyameva vimarśaśaktiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1681: grāhyagrāhakāṇāṃ yat prakāśātmakaṃ rūpaṃ tasyāpi aprakāśavailakṣaṇyākṣepikā iyameva iti śrīsāraśāstre'pi nirūpitam @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1687: tasyāpi vimarśaśaktiḥ iti viśvasya parame pade tiṣṭhato viśrāntasya tasya idameva hṛdayaṃ vimarśarūpaṃ paramantrātmakaṃ yatra tatra abhidhīyate
GSP30abhiprvu:1700: na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī // }
GSP30abhiprvu:1704: ityādi ca / tat etena viduḥ ityetat nirvāhitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1705: bauddhairapi adhyavasāyāpekṣaṃ prakāśasya prāmāṇyaṃ vadadbhiḥ upagataprāya eva ayam arthaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1707: nanu asaṃkhyaśaktiśreṇośobhitavapuṣi paramaśive vimarśaśaktireva iyam itthaṃkāram abhiṣicyate kasmāt ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1709: jñeyaṃ na tu tadaunmukhyātkhaṇḍyetāsya svatantratā // Ipk_1,5.15 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1713: sā ca vimarśarūpā iti yuktam asyā eva prādhānyam iti tātparyeṇa uttaramuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1715: prakāśātmā parameśvaraḥ svātmānaṃ jñātrekarūpatvāt ajñeyamapi jñeyīkaroti iti yat saṃbhāvyate kāraṇāntarasya anupapatteḥ darśitatvāt dṛḍhena saṃbhāvanānumānena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1716: tadata eva vimarśaśaktilakṣaṇāt kartṛtvāt hetoḥ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1717: yato hi ayam ātmānaṃ parāmṛśati tato viśvanirbharatvāt tathā nīlāditvena cakāsti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1720: āha, pṛthak prakāśāt bahirbhūtā sthitiḥ yasya tādṛk jñeyaṃ naiva bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1724: yadi vyatiriktaṃ jñeyaṃ syāt tat jñātṛrūpasya ātmano yat etat jñeyaviṣayam aunmukhyaṃ svasaṃvedanasiddhaṃ dṛśyate tat na asya syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1725: tena vyatiriktaviṣayaunmukhyena anyādhīnatvaṃ nāma pāratantryam asya ānīyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1729: anātmā ca jaḍo jñeyaṃ prati na unmukhībhavati iti prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1730: tataḥ prasaṅgaviparyayāt idamāyātam ---- avyatiriktonmukhaḥ svatantraḥ san ātmānameva jñeyīkaroti iti //15//
GSP30abhiprvu:1732: yāvat atyaktakartṛsvabhāvaṃ svātantryeṇa aparityaktameva santam ātmānaṃ nirmāya vyavahāreṇa dhyānopāsanārcanopadeśādinā yojayati iti yat saṃbhāvyate tadapi ata eva iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1733: nanu svātantryayuktaṃ ca nirmīyate ca iti viruddham idam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1734: atrāha , advayātmanaḥ saṃvidekarūpasya svātantryāt hetoḥ idaṃ na na yujyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1736: tatsaṃpādane yat apratihataṃ svātantryaṃ tadeva punaḥ svātantryaśabdena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1737: ata eva ityanena tu vimarśaśaktirūpam iti apunaruktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1738: atha vā ata eva svātantryāt iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena ślokadvayena saṃbandhanīyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1741: īśvaro bhagavān ātmā nityo vibhuḥ svatantraḥ ityevamādau hi pramātuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1745: dhyeyaṃ ca bhāti iti tat tāvat nirmitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1749: na ca evam phalabhedasya upalabdheḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1750: tasmāt svātantryaśūnyatābhāsanena svātantryayuktatābhāsanena ca yat idam ubhayaṃ jñeyam ātmarūpameva parameśvaro bhāsayati tat vimarśaśaktibalāt eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1753: sa ca prakāśo vimarśasāra iti vimarśābhede tadeva tat iti vaktuṃ yuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1754: īśvara ātmā ityādisaṃkalpeṣu ca nirmitasya idantayā parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1756: iti nirmitasya tadrūpatvābhāve kathaṃ svātantryāmuktatvam iti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1765: aham ityevaṃ svarūpo yaḥ parāmarśo yaśca īśvaraḥ pramātā ātmā śiva ityādiḥ anantaprakāraḥ parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1766: tasya yadyapi bhedo 'nyonyarūpatā tathāpi tadbhedāt hetoḥ asya ātmano nirmātṛrūpasya ahaṃparāmarśamayasya nirmeyarūpasya ca īśvarādiparāmarśāspadasya yo bhedaḥ śaṅkitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1770: jñātṛtvādi ca jñānādau svātantryam ananyamukhaprekṣitvam avicchinnajñānayogaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1771: avicchedaśca jānāmi karomi iti asmadarthaviśrāntiḥ iti asya īśvarasya ātmanaḥ sṛṣṭeḥ sṛjyamānasya ahaṃvimarśanīyatvameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1773: asya īśvarasya yataḥ īśvarādisaṃkalpeṣu api ahaṃparāmarśanayogyasyaiva sṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1776: pākaḥ kartā samuccayo vikalpaḥ ityādiśabdaiḥ abhidhīyamānāḥ sattvabhāvamāpāditā api
GSP30abhiprvu:1777: pacati caitreṇa ca vā ityevaṃrūpe mūlaparāmarśe viśrāmyanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1778: anyathā tu tāḥ pratītā naiva bhaveyuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1783: madhyaviśrāntipadaṃ tu yat vṛkṣamūlasthānīyaṃ grāmagamane tasya tadapekṣayā sṛṣṭatvam ucyate iti ko virodhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1784: anena nīlādeḥ api idaṃ nīlam iti madhyaparāmarśe 'pi mūlaparāmarśe ahamityeva viśrānteḥ ātmamayatvam upapāditameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1785: nīlam idam vedmi ityapi hi ahaṃ prakāśe itīyattattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1787: mūḍhastu nīlādivimarśāt eva arthakriyādiparitoṣābhimānī iti nīlādeḥ svātantryanirmuktatvam uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1788: ātmādau tu tanmūlaparāmarśaviśrāntimantareṇa pratītiparisamāptim arthakriyāṃ ca mūḍho'pi na abhimanyata iti tasya nirmitau api anujjhitasvātantryam uktam //17//
GSP30abhiprvu:1789: nanvevaṃ viśvaparāmarśanām aham ityeva viśuddhaikaparāmarśaviśrāntireva tattvam tat katham idam ucyate ---- jñānasmṛtyādikā asya śaktaya iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1790: jñānasya ca saṃśayanirṇayādibhedaḥ nīlādīnāṃ ca vaicitryam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1795: tataśca bhinnaṃ prakāśāt sarvam avabhāsajātaṃ māyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1797: tayā bhinnaṃ yat saṃvedyaṃ pramātuśca anyonyataśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1798: māyāśaktyā bhinnena pramātuḥ anyonyato vedyācca karaṇavargeṇa yat saṃvedyaṃ sa eva gocaro viśrāntipadaṃ yasyāḥ tādṛśī satī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1799: saiva pratyavamarśātmā citiḥ parāvāgrūpā jñānam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1803: tathā hi ---- indtriyeṇa sphuṭagrāhiṇā bāhyena viṣayeṇa sphuṭena ca niyantritaṃ saṃvittattvaṃ tat jñānam /
