GSP30abhiprvu:1805: buddhyā viṣayeṇa ca viṣayatvaparyantabhājā adhyavasāyo niścayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1806: viṣayasya ca yat bhinnatvaṃ bahirantaḥkaraṇānāṃ ca tatprakāśābhedāt anupapannaṃ cittattvena bhāsyate iti bhede yato viśrāntiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1808: tato jñānasaṃkalpādayo bhinnāḥ tasya apradhvastasvasvabhāvābhedasya saṃvittattvasya anusaṃdhātuḥ śaktaya iti uktāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1809: saṃśayādayaśca bhinnā nīlādivaicitryaṃ ca iti sarvam akhaṇḍitam //18//
GSP30abhiprvu:1810: nanu pratyavamarśātmatvaṃ citiśakteḥ saṅkalpasmaraṇādiśaktiṣu sacikalpātmikāsu bhavatu /
GSP30abhiprvu:1817: iti evaṃ prathamasamaye katham abhilāpayogaḥ iti parasya vyāmoham apohitumāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1821: anyathā bālasya prathamaṃ vyavahāre dṛśyamāne vyutpattireva na syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1824: punastadviviktaṃ bhūtalaṃ paśyati iti ghaṭam ānaya naya iti vyavahārāt katham asya ayam artha iti hṛdi parisphuret ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1831: tathāpi saṅketakāle sa śabdo viṣayatvena idaṃbhāvena pratyavamṛśyamānatvāt bhedāt pracyutya nirbhāsamāno vijñānaśarīre viśrāntaḥ san vācaka iti bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1832: tad vijñānasya savarūpaṃ cet bhāti tat abhilāpamayameva iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1833: yathā viṣayasya sukharūpatvābhāve 'pi jñānaṃ sukhātmakaṃ bhāti tathā mā bhūt abhilāpātmā rūpādiḥ viṣayaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1835: atra tu darśane viṣayasyāpi vimarśamayatvāt abhilāpamayatvameva vastutaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1836: staimityādyavasthāpi yadi na parāmarśamayī tarhi asyāṃ vikalpātmakapramātṛvyāpārānulāsāt saṃbhavaḥ śapathaparamārtha eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1838: rūpaviṣayādhyavasāyī hi yadi vikalpa udiyāt kimanyat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1841: sakalena ca śabdagrāmeṇa śabdanaṃ hi sahante vastūni ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1843: tathā hi ---- bālasya puraḥ puṇḍe sahajo yaḥ parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1844: aham ityavicchedena idam iti vicchedena vā tatpṛṣṭhe eva gaura iti gauḥ iti vā śabda āropyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1851: iha sākṣātkāro vastutaḥ paśyāmi ityevaṃbhūtavikalpanavyāpāraparyanta eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1852: vikalpo hi pratyakṣasya vyāpāra iti paro 'pi manyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1853: na ca vyapāraḥ tadvato bhinno yuktaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1859: yadi sa na syāt tat ekābhisaṃdhānena javāt gacchan ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1864: tathā hi ---- tasmin deśe jñānam -- ācikramiṣā -- ākramaṇam -- ākrāntatājñānam -- prayojanāntarānusaṃdhānam -- tityakṣā -- deśāntarānusaṃdhiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1865: tatrāpi ācikramiṣā ityādinā yojanaviyojanarūpeṇa pratyavamarśena vinābhimatadeśāvāptiḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1868: atra ca yataḥ paścādbhāvisthūlavikalpakalpanā na saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1869: tata eva tvaritatvam iti sūkṣmeṇa pratyavamarśena saṃvartitaśabdabhāvanāmayena bhāvyameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1870: saṃvartitā hi śabdabhāvanā prasāraṇena vivartyamānā sthūlo vikalpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1871: yathā idamityasya prasāraṇā ghaṭaḥ śkla ityādiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1873: dhāvu gatiśuddhau iti pāṭhāt dhāvistvaritagatau svaśaktivaśāt vartata iti //19//
GSP30abhiprvu:1876: tatra śabdo nīlādivat eva pṛthak pratibhāsate ---- nīlam idam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1879: sa ca atra māyātmakaṃ bhedapade 'pi prakāśāpṛthagbhūto bhavadbhiḥ iṣṭaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1883: kena etat uktam ghaṭa iti yaḥ sthūlaḥ śabdaḥ sa prakāśajīvitasvabhāvo vimarśa iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1884: so'pi hi sthūlaḥ śabdo 'rthavat pṛthagbhūta eva bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1885: tau nāmakarūpalakṣaṇau śabdārthau ekarūpatayā so 'yam ityevaṃrūpatvena parāmṛśantī adhyavasā yā sā parameśvaraśaktiḥ vimarśarūpā ātmavadeva ahamityanavacchinnatvena bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1886: na tu kadācit idantayā vicchinnatvena bhāti vicchinnatvena avabhāse parapratiṣṭhatvāt punarvimarśāntareṇa bhāvyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1887: tatrāpi evam iti anavasthāto nīlasya prakāśanameva na syāt pratiṣṭhālābhābhāvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1888: tasmāt sarva eva vimarśaḥ prakāśāt avicchinna eva iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1892: nanu evaṃ sarvasyaiva jñānakalāpasya ahamityeva pratiṣṭhāne vedyabhūmisparśo nāsti vedyabhuvi ca deśakālayogaḥ na tu vedakāṃśe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1893: deśakālayogābhāve ca yat idaṃ jñānāṃ deśāpekṣayā pramātrādyaṃśāpekṣayā ca sakramatvaṃ lakṣyate tat kathaṃ syāt ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2017: tasminnapi vedye śunyāntaraṃ tatrāpi śūnyāntram ---- iti yāvadbhedaḥ tāvatkalpanā na truṭyatīti tadarthamāha kalpite iti /

GSP30abhiprvu:2119: tata eva smaraṇakālāsaṃbhavī ābhāsaḥ tadanubhavapūrvakālakalita eveti svayaṃ smaraṇādernirviṣayatvaṃ gṛhītagrāhitvaṃ ca uddhoṣyate /

GSP30abhiprvu:2150: ata eva bahirmukhaprakāśātmakavijñānasvabhāvasya pramāṇavargasya yo 'ntaḥ pratyābhāsam idam idam iti ananta ---- kalpaḥ vikalpamayo vimarśātmā pramāsamūhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2152: ataśca bahirghaṭaprakāśaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ iti antarvikalpaḥ svīkṛtapūrvarūpaḥ aham iti tadubhayaviśrāntisthānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2157: saṃvinniṣṭhā hi viṣayavyavasthitayaḥ iti yat ucyate tat na bhinnarūpaprakātmakasaṃvinmātraviśrāntyā
GSP30abhiprvu:2158: siddhyati api tu tāstā vibhinnāḥ saṃvido niścayarūpāḥ pramātmāno yāḥ tāni eva mukhāni
GSP30abhiprvu:2159: dvārāṇi upāyā mārgāḥ taiḥ mukhaiḥ nadīsrotaḥsthānīyaiḥ yadi amī bhāvā nīlasukhādaya
GSP30abhiprvu:2160: uhyamānā ekasmin aham iti pramātṛrūpe mahāsaṃvitsamudre pratitiṣṭhanti ābhimukhyena
GSP30abhiprvu:2162: tata eṣu parasparaṃ samanvayarūpaṃ tat jñāteyaṃ tat upapattyā ghaṭate ,

GSP30abhiprvu:2171: tajjñānāṃ tadvikalpānāṃ tanniścayānāṃ ca deśakramaṃ kālakramaṃ cātyajatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2175: yato hi asau samanvayaḥ sakṛdābhāsena deśakālākāramiśrīkaraṇātmanā yojanābhāsena sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ nānyathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2176: na hi pṛthakpṛthak parikṣīṇeṣu srotaḥsu taduhyamānāḥ tṛṇolapādayaḥ samanvayaṃ kaṃcit yānti iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2177: anekatvena deśakālādibheda ityāśayena sakṛcchabdaḥ tanniṣedhatātparyeṇa prayuktaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:2178: tatra ko 'sau samanvaya ityāśaṅkya bahutaravyāpakaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ tāvat darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2182: tatra viṣayasyāsau smṛtiḥ na nūtanaḥ prakāśaḥ api tu asya sa prakāśaḥ prācyo 'nubhava eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2183: sa cānubhavo jñānarūpatvena jñeyarūpatvābhāvāt na jñānāntarasaṃvedyaḥ api tu svaprakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2184: sa ca smṛtikāle yadi asan tat kathaṃ prakāśatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2185: bhavatu vā asau tathāpi smṛtiḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2189: na tu aparaṃ svasaṃvedanavyatiriktaṃ pratyakṣam anumānādikaṃ vā tatra kramate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2190: tataśca tāvatkālāpi avichinnamekaṃ yat svasaṃvedanaṃ tadeva pramātṛttvam iti siddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:2191: anyatra anubhavitari smartā anyo na upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2193: idānīṃ tu svasaṃvedanaikībhāvena bhaṅgyantareṇa iti viśeṣaḥ //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:2196: bādhābhāve tat kathaṃ syād ityāśaṅkya so 'pi ayaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ satyāsatyapravibhājanayā
GSP30abhiprvu:2197: viśveṣāṃ vyavahārāṇāṃ jīvitabhūto na ekena pramātṛtattvena vinā ghaṭata iti vitatya darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2200: bādhābhāve prāmāṇyam ityetadartham avaśyasamarthyo yo bādhavyavahāraḥ so 'pi katham iti api śabdasyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2201: iha śuktyā tāvat rajatasya na kācit bādhā nāma kriyamāṇā dṛśyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2202: śuktijñānena rajatajñānaṃ bādhyate ityapi na yuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2203: svasmin viṣaye ātmani ca svarūpe dvayoḥ jñānayoḥ pariniṣṭhitayoḥ viśr/
GSP30abhiprvu:2205: atha ayaṃ parasparaparihāra eva virodhaḥ tarhi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ virodhāt bādhyabādhakabhāvasya svātmani pariniṣṭhaiva na labhyeti sutarāṃ vighaṭeta satyetarapravibhāgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2207: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- yadi jñānaṃ svayaṃ naśyati tadā kiṃ jñānāntareṇa asya kṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2208: na hi tena tatkāle 'saṃbhavatā tasya viṣayāpahāraḥ kartuṃ śakyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2209: na rājatam ityapi jñānaṃ svaṃ rajatābhāvaṃ viṣayīkurvat na viṣayam apaharet rajatajñānasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:2211: tatrāpi sarveṣāṃ jñānām iyameva saraṇiriti kiṃcideva bādhyam iti kathaṃ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2212: yadā tu rajatajñānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ ca ekatra svasaṃvedane viśrānyataḥ tadā etat upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2213: tathā hi ---- ekatrāpi pramātṛtattve viśrāmyatāṃ jñānānāṃ naikaprakāraiva viśrāntiḥ api tu vicitratayaiva sā saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2214: tathā hi ---- nīlam iti utpalam iti jñāne pramātari viśrāmyantī parasparoparāgābhāsena viśrāmyataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2216: śuktikā iti na rajatam iti vā jñānaṃ rajatam iti jñānasya unmūlanaṃ tadīyavimarśātmakapramārūpavyāpārānuvartanavidhvaṃsaṃ kurvat pramātari pratiṣṭhāṃ bhajate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2217: evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādau viśrāntivaicitryaṃ prameyāsaṃbhavi pramātrā svātantryeṇa nirmitaṃ tata eva asya pramāsvatantratādāyi vācyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2218: evamekatra pramātari pūrvajñānasya parivarjanena yato niścitā sthitiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2220: nīlādivat kila tānapi vyavahārān sa eva parameśvaraḥ svātantryāt ābhāsayati tat te 'pi satyā eveti //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:2224: iha śuktikājñānaṃ svātmānaṃ saṃvidat svātmābhinnaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ budhyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2226: tatparicchedanāntarīyakaśca anyavyavaccheda ityaśuktijñānarūpasya rajatajñānasya apramāṇatvavedanaṃ tadeva ucyate yat etat śuktikāsaṃvedanābhinnapramāṇatvavedanam
GSP30abhiprvu:2227: na ca etat apūrvaṃ yat vastvantarajñānameva vastvantarābhāvajñānam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2230: ataśca bādhyabādhakatvam evaṃ siddham iti cet asmābhiḥ ucyate ---- tat kiṃ pramātraikyeneti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:2231: atra prasaṅgāt abhāvavyavahārasya siddhau tattvamupapādayiṣyan dṛṣṭāntameva tāvat paradarśane dūṣayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2234: yo dṛṣṭānta uktaḥ sa eva na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2235: kuta iti cet ucyate iha bhūtalaṃ na ghaṭaḥ iti tādātmyena abhāvo vyavahartavyaḥ kadācit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2236: kadācit vyatirekeṇa iha bhūtale ghaṭo na iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2239: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirapi hi yasya nāsti piśācādeḥ svabhāvabalāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2241: tasyāpi tādātmyenāyamabhāvo gṛhyate bhūtalaṃ na piśāco na śabdaḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2242: yatra tu dṛśyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam avaśyam apayogi tatra vyatirekeṇa abhāve vyavahartavye na eṣo 'bhyupāyaḥ //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:2250: iti satyapi ghaṭe katham abhāvo vyatirekeṇa na vyavahriyate atra bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2253: bhinnasya ghaṭasya abhāvaṃ sādhayati na tu sarvadā iti kena prakāreṇa bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2254: etena atra bhūtale piśāco nāsti ityapi syāditi āpatitaṃ mantavyam //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:2255: nanvevaṃ vyatirekābhāvaniṣṭho vyavahāro loke tāvat avigītaḥ asyāṃcideva daśāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2256: tatra kā gatirityāśaṅkya cirantanairaparidṛṣṭaṃ tatsiddhiprakāraṃ darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2259: iha bhāva eva bhāvāntarasya abhāva iti vyavahartavyaḥ iti ayaṃ tāvat aparityājyaḥ prātītikaḥ panthāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2260: tatra bhāvasya bhāvāntareṇa ya ādhāryādhārabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāvatadabhāvayoḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2261: tataśca bhūtale ghaṭavyatiriktaṃ vastvantaraṃ śilādikam ālokapuñjādikaṃ vā yat cākṣuṣe jñāne bhāti tadeva vyavahriyate bhūtale ghaṭābhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2263: yatrāpi nāsti cakṣurvyāpāro netranimīlanasaṃtamasādau tatrāpi bhūtale ghaṭocitakaṭhinasparśaviviktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2264: mṛdum uṣṇaṃ śītam anuṣṇāśītaṃ vā gṛhṇan tameva atra ghaṭābhāva iti vyavaharati vāyusparśasya
GSP30abhiprvu:2267: padārthastu ---- kiṃ tu iti svamatopakṣepāya svapratibhāpraśnaparāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2268: kiṃ punaratra nyāyyamiti tatrāha tatra bhūtale ālokacayaḥ tāvat asti jñeyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2270: tasya ālokacayasya sparśasya vā yat svajñānam anyaghaṭādiviviktena svena rūpeṇa jñānam tat kartṛ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2271: tasya ālokādeḥ aghaṭarūpatāṃ ghaṭābhāvarūpatāṃ tatra bhūtale sādhayati iti śakyo '; yamarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2273: āntaraprāṇaspandanajanitasūkṣmaśabdākarṇanācca śrotrādisākalyaṃ saṃbhavāyamānaḥ tameva śabdam ekajñānasaṃsargiṇaṃ śṛṇvan śabdāntaraṃ niṣedhayati na iha anyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2275: rasagandhasparśābhāvo 'pi dantodakarasaṃ tripuṭikāgandhaṃ kāyīyaṃ ca sparśaṃ saṃvedayamānenaiva rasābhāvo vedyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2278: acirapravṛttatattadviṣayānubhavakalpitasya tadaiva dhvaṃsānāśaṅkanāt karaṇasya kāraṇasākalyaniścayaḥ kim ekajñānasaṃsargitayā iti cet na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2280: nanvevam adṛśyāsyāpi piśācādeḥ niṣedhavyavahāro vyatirekeṇāpi prāpnoti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2281: sa hi ālokapuñjo yathā ghaṭāt anyaḥ tadvat piśācāderapi /
GSP30abhiprvu:2284: adṛśyo bhūtalasyāntarna niṣedhyaḥ sa sarvathā // Ipk_1,7.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2285: ālokapuñjo yadyapi piśācād vyatirikto yadyapi ca āloko 'sti apiśācātmā ityetāvat siddhyati tathāpi atra piśāco nāsti ityetat aśakyam adhyavasātum
GSP30abhiprvu:2288: ataśca siddhyatīdam atra ghaṭo nāsti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2289: piśācastu tādṛksvabhāvo yo bhūtalamadhye ālokamadhye 'pi vā bhavan bhūtalasya ālokasya vā tāṃ nibiḍatāṃ na vihanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2290: tataśca ālokamadhye tasya saṃbhāvanāt kathaṃ vyatirekeṇa niṣedhavyavahāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2291: evaṃ rūpamadhye rasādeḥ saṃbhāvanāt tasyāpi aniṣedhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2292: yadyapi anālokaḥ ālokāt anyaḥ piśācaḥ tathāpi asau bhūtalasya antarmadhye 'dṛśyo bhavati iti saṃbhāvyate yathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2293: tadvadeva ālokasyābhyantarepi so'sti iti saṃbhāvyata eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2294: tataśca yadyapi ālokastato 'nyaḥ ityanena pathā niṣiddhaḥ piśācaḥ tathāpi sarvaprakāreṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:2295: na niṣiddhaḥ iti tadabhāvanibandhanāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyavahārāḥ pravartantām iti ślokārthaḥ //11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2296: evaṃ prasaṅgāt abhāvavyavahārasya tattvam upadarśya prakṛte yojayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2299: yathā āloko ghaṭābhāva iti āloke gṛhīte prāk gṛhītasya ghaṭasya na kiṃcit āyātam tathaiva śuktijñānaṃ rūpyajñānābhāva iti iyat saṃbhāvyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2300: yathā ghaṭajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaprāmāṇyasaṃvit paṭajñānābhāvaḥ paṭajñānābhāvaprāmāṇyasaṃvit iyatā ca na pūrvapravṛttaṃ paṭajñānam apramāṇībhavati
GSP30abhiprvu:2301: eṣā hi tasya ghaṭajñānasya svarūpacintā sarvā na jñānāntarasya ādyasya kimapi ato jātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2303: na rajatam idam iti ca jñānameva svātmanā prakāśatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2304: ahaṃ śuktau rajatābhāve ca pramāṇaṃ na tu rajate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2305: tāvatā tu prāktanasya rajatajñānasya na kiṃcit vṛttam iti tadviṣayīkṛtaṃ rajataṃ katham asatyaṃ syāt //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:2306: nanvidamityanena tadeva parāmṛśyate yatra rajatajñānam abhūt tatraiva idānīṃ na rajatam iti śuktiḥ iti ca jñānaṃ pramāṇabhūtaṃ jātam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2307: tat ato 'numīyate ---- tat prācyaṃ rajatajñānam apramāṇam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2308: na hi etat saṃbhavati ---- viruddhaviṣayadvayāvagāhi jñānadvayaṃ pramāṇam ekatra viṣayībhavati iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2312: na kevalaṃ svasaṃvedanāt na siddhyati bādhā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2317: iha dharmiṇi siddhe siddhena hetunā smaryamāṇavyāptikena sādhyadharmāyogavyavacchedo 'numānavyāpāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2318: iha ca prācye rūpyajñāne dharmiṇi aprāmāṇyaṃ sādhyo dharmaḥ tatra śuktikājñānaṃ vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2321: na caitat yuktam tatkāle prācyarūpyabodhasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2324: ataḥ smaryamāṇaṃ taddharmi syāt ityapi asat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2325: atha śuktiḥ na rajatajñānasya viṣaya iti sādhyate śuktikājñānaviṣayatvāt iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2328: kena caivaṃ vyāptirgṛhītā ---- yatra idānīm anyat jñānam tatra pūrvam anyat na bhavati iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2331: etena etat pratyuktam ---- ekasmin viṣaye kathaṃ jñānadvayaṃ syāt iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2333: te hi tāvat svātmani svaviṣaye ca viśrāmyate iti uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2335: na ca tathābhūtamapi vyavadhānam atra pratītau saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2337: ata eva etadapi aśakyaṃ vaktum ---- mā bhūt bādhā nāma iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2338: evaṃ parapakṣe 'nupapattiṃ pradarśya svapakṣe ekapramātṛpariniṣṭhiteḥ udiyāt bādhyabādhakabhāva iti vākyena pratijñātaṃ nigamayati ---- yuktā sā ekasmāt pramātuḥ yadi jāyeta iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2339: sa eva hi tathā nirmātā iti vyākhyātameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2340: sthite caivaṃ yadi vyavahārasiddhaye 'nyathānupapattirapyucyate tat ucyatāṃ kāmam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2343: yāvat avāntaravyavahārā api ye krayavikrayādayaḥ samalāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2346: vyavahārā hi sarve samanvayaprāṇāḥ iti upasaṃhārakrameṇa darśayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2351: tathā ślokāntarairuktena vyavahārodāharaṇaprakāreṇa idamapi mantavyam ---- yat vibhau deśakālānavacchinne ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2352: ata eva atyarthabhinnaiḥ māyābalāt bhedaikaprāṇitaiḥ nīlasukhādyābhāsaiḥ pratibimbakalpaiḥ anatiriktatayā vartamānaiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2355: anubhava eva atra dṛḍhatamaṃ pramāṇam iti yāvat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2356: anubhūyate ca sopadeśaiḥ avadhānaparaiḥ yena eṣāṃ yaiva saṃsāradaśāsaṃmatā vyavahāradaśā saiva pramātṛtattvaprakhyātmikā śivabhūmiḥ / yaduktam
GSP30abhiprvu:2366: nityaṃ maheśvaraḥ siddhaḥ siddhānāṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:2367: evaṃ jñānasmaraṇāpohanāni vyutpādya eṣāmekamāśrayaṃ vinā vyavahāro na yuktaḥ iti nirūpitam etāvatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2369: ityatra yat uktam ekaḥ iti tat parighaṭitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2372: yadatraiva maheśvaraḥ iti uktam tanmāheśvaryaṃ svātantryarūpamupapādayitavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2373: tacca jñānaviṣayaṃ kriyā ---- viṣayaṃ ca ityubhayaprakāram ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2374: tatra yato bhagavān jñātā kartā ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2375: yadyapi ca prakāśavimarśātmakaṃ cidekaghanam ekameva saṃvidrūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2376: tathāpi vyutpādanāya tatparighaṭita eva ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2377: tena jñānātmakakriyāviṣayaṃ svātantryaṃ yadyapi kriyāśaktirūpaṃ tathāpi tat jñānādhikāra eva nirṇetavyaṃ tadviṣayatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2378: evaṃ ca jñātṛśabdārthaḥ prakṛtitaḥ pratyayataśca saṃpūrṇatayā nirṇīto bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2380: tatrābhāseṣu yat svātantryaṃ tadeva jñānaśaktiviṣayaṃ svātantryaṃ saṃpadyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2385: tatra abhāsāntarāpekṣī ca ābhāso 'nyathā vā iti ślokena uktvā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2386: sa eva ābhāsa eka iti ślokāntareṇa ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2387: arthakriyābhāso 'pi tathaiva ābhāsaniyata iti ślokadvayena uktvā kasmin ābhāse sā arthakriyā iti punaḥ ślokadvayena /
GSP30abhiprvu:2391: ślokāntareṇa maheśvaratvam upasaṃharatā bhāvinaḥ kriyādhikārasya upakṣepa iti saṅkṣepārtha āhnikasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:2393: nanu yadi parameśvaraniṣṭhatayaiva samasto 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ tat asya sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvaprāyaprasiddhavaicitryānupapattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2394: yena kila ayam anuprāṇitaḥ sa eka eva bhagavān ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2395: na ca tadvyatirekeṇa vyavahārasya nijaṃ kiṃcana tattvam utpaśyāma ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2400: kevalam etāvatā ābhāsānāṃ bhedo na punararthāvabhāsasya svātmagataḥ kvacidapi bheda iti ślokadvayasya saṃmelitasya saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2401: yasminneva kāle sa ābhāsa ābhāti tatkāle eva bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2402: yat akṣasāmakṣyaṃ bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvaṃ nāma ābhāsāntaraṃ paśyāmītyevaṃrūpaṃ tatsāpekṣāḥ tadvyāmiśrāḥ kvacit ābhāsā bhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2404: andhaviṣayaḥ andhakārasthapramātṛviṣayaḥ punaḥ yo 'nyo vyavahārosphuṭatāmayaḥ tatra te ābhāsā anyathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2405: tathā hi jātyandhasya bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvalakṣaṇam ābhāsāntaraṃ naivāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2406: dṛṣṭavatastu andhībhūtasya saṃtamasashtitasya ca tātkālikaṃ tat nāsti api tu prāktanameva bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvam anusaṃdhatte //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:2407: tasmāt arthāvabhāsasya keṣucidapi vikalpeṣu sattāyāṃ svarūpe viśeṣo 'sti iti saṃbhāvanā na kartavyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2408: te hi vikalpā bhāvivastugāmino vā bhaviṣyanniṣṭhā vā bhavantu avrtamānaniṣṭhā vā atītavastuviśrāntā vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2415: te punarābhāsāḥ svātantryeṇa yadā bhagavatā saṃyojyante viyojyante ca tadā ayaṃ sphuṭatvādirvyavahāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2416: nīlamityābhāsasya utprekṣe ityādyābhāsāntaravyavacchedanena paśyāmīti ābhāsavyāmiśraṇāyāṃ sphuṭatāvyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2418: parameśvarasvarūpāntarbhūtatve punarābhāsānāṃ na kutaścit vyavacchedaḥ na kenacit vyāmiśraṇā iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:2419: nanvetat nīlādiṣu upapadyatāṃ yatra bāhyendriyavyāpāro 'sti sukhādau tu tadabhāvāt kathaṃ vaicitryamityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2425: duḥkhe ahikaṇṭakādau ca taddhetau atīte 'nāgate vā yadyapi ābhāsaḥ sa eva tathāpi
GSP30abhiprvu:2426: atītamidam anāgatamidam iti ābhāsāntareṇa yato vyāmiśraṇā anubhavāmīti ābhāsācca
GSP30abhiprvu:2427: yato vyavacchedaḥ tena vidyamāneṣvapi teṣu tasya pramātuḥ tena prakāreṇa sthitirna
GSP30abhiprvu:2428: bhavati yathā pūrvan abhūt aham adhunā sukho duḥkhīti samarjitatattannimitasāmagrīko vā iti //3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2429: yadā tu vikalpena tāni vastūni bāḍham ullikhati tadā paunaḥpunyaviśiṣṭasukhataddhetūllekhanābhidhānakāraṇābhāsānupraveśāt
GSP30abhiprvu:2430: ābhāsāntaravyāmiśraṇātmanā tenaiva asmaduktena prakāreṇa na punaranyena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2432: sukhī ahamityādikena sthitiḥ bhavati iti saṃbhāvyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2433: ucitametat yatastadānīṃ sphuṭatvābhāsamiśraṃ sukhābhāsam upalakṣayati asau /
GSP30abhiprvu:2435: nanu iyatā kimuktam bhavati ---- bāhyarūpāḥ sragādayaḥ sukhādihetavo bāhyajanitāśca sukhādayaḥ sukhyahamiti abhimānahetavaḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2436: tataśca bāhyatvābhāve tajjanyatvābhāve ca na tathā uktaṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2437: tatra ca ta eva na kecit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2438: tataśca kathamuktam arthāvabhāsasya sattāyāṃ na kvāpi viśeṣa iti sattāyā eva abhāvāt ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2440: nātmā sattā tatasteṣāmāntarāṇāṃ satāṃ sadā // Ipk_1,8.5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2442: duḥkhaṃ nāsti mameti ye bhāvābhāsā abhāvābhāsāśca teṣāṃ bāhyatvaṃ nāma ātmā svarūpaṃ na bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2443: na hi sukhamityasya svarūpaṃ bāhyam iti vapuṣā bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2444: sukhasya hi sukhameva svarūpam kevalaṃ bāhyatvaṃ nāma abhāsāntaram īśvareṇa svātantryabalādeva
GSP30abhiprvu:2445: yadā tatra sukhābhāse miśratayā bhāsyate tadā tat tasya upādhirūpatām uparañcakatāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2447: tataśca yathā nīlābhāsābhāve utpalābhāsasya na kiṃcit vṛttaṃ svarūpato rājābhāsābhāve vā puruṣābhāsasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2448: tathā bāhyatvābhāsābhāve 'pi sukhābhāsasya duḥkhābhāvābhāsasya kāntābhāsasya ca na svarūpataḥ kācana mlānatā iti āntarāṇāṃ sadaiva sthitiḥ eṣām
GSP30abhiprvu:2449: iha antaḥkaraṇe buddhidarpaṇātmani nīlādīnāmavabhāsānām āntaratvamapyasti antaḥkaraṇamadhyebhavatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2452: atra ca avasthādvaye 'pi arthakriyām amī kurvantyeva antato jñānaṃ svaviṣayam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2453: yat punaḥ pramātṛtādātmyalakṣaṇam āntaratvaṃ tatra amī kathaṃ na kāṃcit arthakriyāṃ vidadhīran ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2458: eṣām ābhāsānām arthakriyā na kācit asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2459: sā hi arthakriyā bhede sati bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2460: sa hi nīlābhāsaḥ pītābhāsāt yato bhidyate yataśca pramāturbhidyate tataḥ svena sādhyāṃ bhinnam arthakriyāṃ tasya pramātuḥ kuryāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2461: na ca eṣa tadā bhede 'sti pramātraikyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2463: tathā ca kāntābhāsasya bāhyatve 'pi sati ābhāsāntarasya āliṅganalakṣaṇasya vyapagame dūrībhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2464: iyam iti ca ābhāsāntarasya upagame 'nyaiva prāktanāhlādaviparītā dṛśyate arthakriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2465: ata ābhāsabhedābhāvaḥ yataḥ pramātraikyakṛte āntaratve tasmāt na arthakriyā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2466: arthakriyābhāso 'pi ca ābhāsāntarameva iti arthakriyākāritvamapi na bhāvānāṃ sattvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2468: nanu ca bāhyābhāsavyatibhedanakāle āntarābhāso virodhāt vicchinna iti katham idam uktam āntarāṇāṃ ya ābhāsaḥ sa sadā iti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2472: iha avabhāsānāṃ sadaiva bāhyatābhāsatadabhāvayoḥ api antareva pramātṛprakāśa eva sthitiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2474: anyathā naiva prakāśeran iti uktaṃ yataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2475: yadā tu māyāśaktyā vicchedāvabhāsanasvātantryarūpayā bāhyatvam eṣām ābhāsyate tadā tat avalambya avabhāsamānānām asau sthitiḥ bahirapi antarapi
GSP30abhiprvu:2476: nāyam antarābhāso bāhyatvasya virodho pratyuta sarvābhāsabhittibhūto 'sau ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2477: tat kathaṃ virodhaḥ iti yuktamuktam sadaiva āntarāṇāṃ sattā iti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:2482: dṛśyate ca vikalpollikhitaḥ piśācādiḥ trāsādividhāyī ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2484: pramātraikātmyamāntaryaṃ tato bhedo hi bāhyatā // Ipk_1,8.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2485: vimarśaviśeṣarūpe vikalpajñāne ya ullikhyamānaḥ kāntācaurādiḥ arthaḥ sopi bāhyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2487: yasmāt so 'pi pramātuḥ sakāśāt pṛthageva prathate ayam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2488: yacca pramātari ahamityeva viśrāntatvaṃ tat āntaratvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2492: tataśca pramātari nikaṭaṃ tādātmya ---- prāptameva iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2493: tato yat bhinnaṃ tat bāhyameva iti yuktā ullekhasyāpi arthakriyā //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:2495: antaḥkaraṇagocarasya tu kiṃ kṛtaṃ tat ityāśaṅkya āha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2498: antarvikalpapratibimbatasya nīlādeḥ yo bahirātmanā pramātṛvicchinnena svabhāvena prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2499: sa bhartuḥ antarābhāsān bibhrato bahiḥ sṛṣṭiṃ ca puṣṇataḥ īśvarasyaiva icchayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2500: yathaiva cakṣurādiviṣayabhūtānāṃ pratyakṣajñānaśabdavācyo bāhyātmanā prakāśo nīlādīnām /
GSP30abhiprvu:2501: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- kumbhakāravyāpāro nāma paramārthataḥ īśvarecchaiva tadabhāsitakāyaspandaparyantā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2503: tataśca tathā īśvarecchayā prakāśāt avahirbhūtā api nīlādyā bāhyakaraṇagocarībhūtāḥ kalpitāt pramātuḥ vicchinnarūpatvena bāhyatvena bhāsante
GSP30abhiprvu:2504: tathā antaḥkaraṇagocarībhūtā api iti ko viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2505: sukhaduḥkhaprāyāstu bharatādyuktarūpāḥ sthāyivyabhicārirūpā ritinirvedādayo 'ntaḥkaraṇaikagocarībhūtā bahirātmanā bhānti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2506: saṅkalpeṣu yadyapi kṣetraJñasyaiva svātantryam tathāpi citparamārthatāyā nyagbhāvayitum aśakyatvāt īśvarasyaiva tat vastutaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2509: jīve niruddhā tatrāpi paramātmani sā sthitā //
GSP30abhiprvu:2511: iti / yatra tu anicchoreva kṣetrajñasya svarasavāhivyākṣepasārā sāṅkalpikī sṛṣṭiḥ tatra sphuṭaḥ īśvarasyaiva vyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2512: tasmāt sāṅkalpikānāmapi bahirbhāve parameśvarecchiava heturiti siddhāntaḥ //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:2513: adhunā pūrvoktam aikyaṃ māheśvaryaṃ ca nigamayati @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2515: prakāśaikyāttadekatvaṃ mātaikaḥ sa iti sthitam // Ipk_1,8.10 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2517: vimarśa eva devasya śuddhe jñānakriye yataḥ // Ipk_1,8.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2522: lokapaddhatiḥ lokamārgaḥ sarvo vyavahāro na saṃbhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2525: na caitat durghaṭam yato viṣayaprakāśa eva saṃvit ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2530: sa eva ca pramātā ucyate iti sthitam idānīmupapattitaḥ //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:2531: na ca asya asau prakāśalakṣaṇaḥ svātmā nīlādyuparāgaśca parāmarśan śūnya eva āste sphaṭikrama.eriva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2535: sa eva hi ahaṃbhāvātmā vimarśo devasya krīḍādimayasya śuddhe pāramārthikyau jñānakriye ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2536: prakāśarūpatā jñānaṃ tatraiva svātantryātmā vimarśaḥ kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2540: aparāvasthāyāṃ ca māyāpade idaṃbhāvaprādhānyena vartamāne iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2541: sarvathā tu vimarśa eva jñānaṃ tena vinā hi jaḍabhāvo 'sya syāt iti uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2542: sa eva ca kriyā iti bhāvinaḥ kriyādhikārasya upakṣepaṃ karoti iti śivam //
GSP30abhiprvu:2553: prakaṭayatu naḥ śrīmāngaurīpatiḥ sa ṛtaṃ param //1//}
GSP30abhiprvu:2556: atha kriyāśaktisvarūpaṃ vitasya nirṇetum adhikārāntaram ārabhyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2568: viṣayavibhāge ca sati vastutaḥ ekatraiva tayoḥ viśrāntiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2572: tatra pūrvokte jñānaśaktisamarthanopayoganimeye siddhe prameyāntaramapi ayatnataḥ siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2574: ata eva yadapyuktaṃ kriyā naikasya sakramā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2576: yat tāvat uktam jñānānyeva anubhavavikalparūpādibhinnāni na teṣām āśrayo 'sti kaścit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2577: saṃskārācca smṛtiḥ siddhā jñānaṃ ca jaḍaṃ cet na arthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2578: ajaḍaṃ cet deśakālasaṃkocavaikalyāt ātmatattvāt abhinnam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2579: tat tāvat pratikṣiptaṃ bhinnānāmanubhavādīnāmanupapatteḥ vitatya darśitatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2582: tatsvātantryāvabhāsitajñeyoparāgavaśāt tu tasya saṃkocāvabhāsa ityapi darśitaṃ yataḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2583: na kevalam ato hetukalāpāt jñānaśakticodyāni nidāritāni ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2584: yāvat kriyāśaktiviṣayāṇyapi dūṣaṇāni ata eva hetukalāpāt apasāritāni iti apiśabdaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2585: ekā kriyā kramikā katham āśrayasya ekasvabhāvatve sati ghaṭate ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2591: yataḥ iyati pūrvapakṣe iyadeva jīvitamekamanekasvabhāvaṃ kathaṃ syāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2592: atra ca uktaṃ citsvabhāvasya darpaṇasyeva ekatānapabādhanena ābhāsabhedasaṃbhave ka iva dhirodha iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2593: tasmāt pratyabhijñānabalāt eko 'pi asau padārthātmā svabhāvabhedān viruddhān yāvat
GSP30abhiprvu:2594: aṅgīkurute tāvat te virodhādeva kramarūpatayā nirbhāsamānāḥ tamekaṃ kriyāśrayaṃ saṃpādayanti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2600: ghaṭate na tu śāśvatyāḥ prābhavyāḥ syātprabhor iva // Ipk_2,1.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2601: utkṣipati apakṣipati hastam iti ye pūrvottare kṣaṇāḥ te kramavantaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2602: tatra yeṣāṃ ta eva kriyā kāṇādādīnāmiva teṣāṃ sā sakramā pratyakṣeṇaiva bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2603: ye tu manyante tathābhūtapratyakṣaparidṛśyamānarūpabhedasaṃpādikā yā asau kācit atīntriyā
GSP30abhiprvu:2604: hastagatā śaktirvyāpārodbodharūpā nityānumeyā tasyāḥ kevalaṃ pūrvāparībhūtatvam anumīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2605: iti laukikyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sakramatvaṃ kālaśakteḥ ābhāsavicchedanapradarśanasāmārthyarūpāt pārameśvarāt śaktiviśeṣāt ghaṭate upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2606: yā tu prabhoḥ saṃbandhinī tadavyatiriktā kriyāśaktiḥ śāśvatī kālena aspṛṣṭā tasyāḥ sakramatvam asti iti saṃbhāvanā'pi nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2607: yathā prabhoḥ sakramatvamasaṃbhāvyaṃ tathā asyā api / uktaṃ hi ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2610: nanu kālo viśeṣa bhāvam upagacchan bhāvaṃ svena rūpeṇa avacchinatti tatra ko'sau kālo nāma ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2612: śītoṣṇe vātha tallakṣyaḥ krama eva sa tattvataḥ // Ipk_2,1.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2615: ta eva kālaḥ yato'pariniṣṭhitaṃ gamanapaṭhanādi tairiyattayā pariniṣṭhīyate parivartakairiva kanakam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2616: sa eva ca sūryādīnāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣastattvataḥ paramāśrataḥ kramo nānyaḥ kaścit kramo nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2617: krama eva ca kālo nānyo'sau kaścit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2622: iti tena tena pratimānavartakatulyena sūryasaṃcārādinā saha mīyamāno hemasthānīyo devadattābhāsasya vaicitryabheda ittham ucyate divasaṃ gacchati iti //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:2623: nanu evaṃ kālo nāma bhāvasvabhāva eva astu ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2629: tasmāt aruṇābhāsasya sadbhāvaḥ sphuṭaprabhāpuñjasya ca asadbhāvaḥ ityevaṃbhūto yo bheda ābhāsasadbhāvāsadbhāvābhyanuprāṇitaḥ tatkṛtaḥ kramaḥ kālātmā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2630: tau ca ābhāsānāṃ bhāvābhāvau na bāhyahetukṛtau iti vistārya upapāditam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2631: iti ya eva saṃvitsvabhāva ātmā svaprasaṃkalpādau ābhāsavacitryanirmāṇe prabhuḥ prabhaviṣṇuḥ iti svasaṃviditastata eva tau bhavataḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2632: sa hi ātmani nīlādīn ābhāsān ābhāsayan citratayā aparimeyayā bhāsayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2633: tathāhi ---- lohitābhāsaṃ ghaṭābhāsam unnatābhāsaṃ dṛḍhābhāsaṃ ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena ghaṭābhāsaṃ paṭābhāsaṃ ca pṛthaktvāvabhāsena anyonyatra ābhāsābhāvena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2636: yadā tu śaradābhāsaṃ hemantābhāsena ca sarvathaiva śūnyamābhāsayati hemantābhāsaṃ ca śāradābhāsena tadā kālātmā krama uttiṣṭhati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2637: iti seyam itthaṃbhūtā bhāvavaicitryaprathanaśaktiḥ bhagavataḥ kālaśaktiḥ ityucyate //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:2649: tasmāt vaicitryāt ābhāsyamānāt deśarūpo dūrādūravitatatvāvitatatvādiḥ kramo bhagavatā avabhāsyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2650: yadā tu gāḍhapratyabhijñāprakāśabalāt tadeva idaṃ hastasvarūpam iti pratipattau mūrterna bhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2651: atha ca anyānyarūpatvaṃ bhāti tadaikasmin svarūpe yadanyat anyat rūpaṃ tadvirodhavaśāt asahabhavatkriyā ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2652: tasyā yat vaicitryaṃ parimitāparimitātmakaṃ tadekānusandhānena phalasiddhyādinibandhanavaśāt yathāruci carcitena nirbhāsayan kālarūpaṃ kramamevāvabhāsayati
GSP30abhiprvu:2653: na caitat vācyam ---- ekasvarūpasya katham anyat anyadrūpamiti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2654: yato na asau kaścit bhāvo ya evaṃ kalpyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:2657: na hi bhāsane virodhaḥ kaścit prabhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2666: dṛśyete ca abhavam ahaṃ bhavāmi bhavitāsmi iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2667: gṛhe tiṣṭhāmi araṇye devagṛhe iti ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2668: kiṃ ca svayaṃ deśakālakramaśūnyasya kiṃ dūraṃ kim antikaṃ kiṃ vartamānaṃ kim atītaṃ kiṃ bhāvi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2669: iti pramātrāśrayo bhāveṣvapi kramo na yuktaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2670: na ca pramātṛnirapekṣeṣvapi teṣu svātmani dūratvādi bhūtatvādi vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2675: svātmeva svātmanā pūrṇā bhāvā bhāntyamitasya tu // Ipk_2,1.7 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2676: sarveṣu vastuṣu ekānekarūpeṣu yaḥ kālātmā kramaḥ tasya ya ākaraḥ ---- utpattinibandhanam iti vyākhyātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2677: ābhāsasya bhāvābhāvakṛto bhedaḥ sa śūnyaprāṇabuddhidehādeḥ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2680: na hi tasya bhāsanaṃ svarūpaṃ nīlādivat jaḍatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2683: yathā supto dehasya saṃsārayātrāpatitatve śūnyasya prāṇādeḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2688: sa ca yataḥ pramātā ahaṃbhāvasamāveśanāt aparipūrṇāt ata eva udriktakālakramavattvāt bhāveṣvapi kālakramam ābhāsayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2689: yo 'haṃ bālo 'bhavaṃ tatsahabhāvī vaṭābhāso 'pi abhavat iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2690: na tu yaḥ sakṛd vibhātaḥ iti anayā vācoyuktyā avicchinnabhāsanaḥ pramātā saṃvidrūpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2694: evaṃ deśakramo'pi mitātmanaḥ paricchinnasvarūpasya śūnyādeḥ dehāntasya svātmani bhāti iha tiṣṭhāmi iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2695: svāpekṣayā ca bhāveṣvapi yat mama saṃyogapārimityena vartate tadantikam itarat dūram iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2696: amitasya svarūpeyattāśūnyasya tu saṃvittattvasya bhāvāḥ svātmanā ahaṃbhāvena yato bhānti tataḥ pūrṇāḥ ---- aparicchinnasvarūpeyattākāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2697: yataḥ svātmā tasya tathābhūta eva iti samuccayopamā , taduktam ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2698: {apūrvāparaṃ hi idaṃ mūrtitaḥ kriyātaśca sarvaṃ sarvataḥ pūrṇam}
GSP30abhiprvu:2699: iti / kriyāprasaṅgāt iha kālakramaḥ prākarṇiko dṛṣṭāntatvena tatprasaṅgāt deśakramo nirūpitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2700: dṛṣṭāntaśca pūrvaṃ vācya iti vaicitryanirūpaṇāvasare deśakramasya ādau abhidhānaṃ nyāyyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2701: upasaṃhāre tu prākaraṇikasya kālakramasyaiva ādau nirdeśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2703: nanu evaṃ satyapramātari bhagavati nāstyeva kriyā iti āyātaṃ kālakramābhāvāt kramāśrayeṇa ca tasyā avasthānāt ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2704: kintu nirmāṇaśaktiḥ sāpy evaṃ viduṣa īśituḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2707: ananyonmukhatārūpā icchaiva kriyā iti upasaṃhariṣyate adhikārāntare evam icchaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:2709: caitramaitrāderapi pacāmi iti yaiva antaricchā saiva kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2710: tathā ca adhiśrayaṇādibahutaraspandanasaṃbandhe 'pi pacāmi iti nāsya vicchidyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2711: yattu pacāmi iti icchārūpaṃ tadeva tathāspandanātmatayā bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2712: tatra tu na ko'pi kramaḥ tattvataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2713: evam īśvarasyāpi īśe bhāse sphurāmi dhūrṇe pratyavamṛśāmi ityevaṃrūpaṃ yadicchātmakaṃ vimarśanam aham ityetāvanmātratattvaṃ na tatra kaścit kramaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2714: etadeva ca ucyate pramātṛprameyavaicitryakrama ullasatu ityamunā vākyena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2716: yathā tu icchārūpaṃ pacāmi iti spandanātmatāṃ kāyāparyantāṃ gataṃ kramārūpitam ābhāti
GSP30abhiprvu:2717: tadā bhagavadicchā pramātṛprameyabhedaparyavasitā tatkramopaśliṣṭā bhāti darpaṇatalamiva
GSP30abhiprvu:2719: atra ca kevalaṃ darpaṇasya tathā icchā nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2720: parameśvarasya tu sā asti ---- iti ubhayathā asya kriyāśaktiḥ kramarūpakriyānirmāṇasāmarthya kramarūpakriyoparāgayogaśca iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2722: tatra tu asya cicchaktiḥ ucyate anyaiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2723: iha tu kriyāśaktireva sā svīkṛtā iti piṇḍārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2724: akṣarārthastu ---- tathā iti svarūpabhedena deśakramakāriṇā kriyābhedena ca kālakramasaṃpādakena upalakṣito yo vijñātuḥ śūnyādeḥ pramātuḥ bhedo'nyonyaṃ jñeyācca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2725: evaṃ ghaṭādeḥ parasparaṃ jñātuśca sa bhagavatā avabhāsyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2726: yat tadavabhāsanaṃ sā īśiturapi nirmāṇaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktiḥ na tu kevalaṃ śūnyādereva kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2727: yataśca tannirmitaṃ jñātṛjñeyakriyāvaicitryabhedam asau vidvān vetti aviratam tatraiva hi tat sphurati tato'pi tasya sā kriyāśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2728: ato bhāsanavicchedanābhāvāt kramābhāve sthūladṛṣṭyā yadyapi asya bhavet kriyānupapattiśaṅkā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2729: kiṃ tu evamasya kriyāśaktirūpapannā ---- iti saṃgatiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2735: bhedābhedau ca yo mantratattvavittaṃ stumaḥ śivam //1//}
GSP30abhiprvu:2742: tatra prathamaślokena sūtrakalpena ekānekarūpasya kriyādeḥ bāhyavāde viruddhadharmādhyāsadūṣaṇena anupapadyamānasyāpyavaśyasamarthanīyaṃ vapuḥ iti darśayate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2744: tṛtīyena nirvikalpakasaṃvedanasaṃvedyatve 'pi vikalpakāle eva sphuṭameṣāṃ rūpam ityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2748: nanvevaṃ tathā nirmāṇaśaktyā avabhāsanārūpayā yat nirmīyate tasyāvabhāsanaiva nirmāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2753: tataśca asatyaṃ satyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti ya evaṃprāyeṣu vyavahāraḥ sa kathaṃ saṃgaccheta
GSP30abhiprvu:2754: nirmeyatvāviśeṣāt ityāśaṃkya kriyādīnāmasatvatvaṃ tāvat nipapannam iti vadan dvicandrādīnāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2755: tu itthamapi asatyatvam iti sūcayan āha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2758: cittattvāt anyatra yā kriyābuddhiḥ kartṛkarmakaraṇādiṣu caitro bhrajati taṇḍulā viklidyante edhā jvalanti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2760: tathāhi ---- tattaddeśakālākārabhinnaḥ tatra caitradeho'nekasvabhāvo'pi sa evāyam iti ekarūpatām aparityajanneva nirbhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2761: sa eva ca ekānekarūpā kriyā tathaiva pratibhāsanācca pāramārthikī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2762: dvicandrādi tu tathābhāsamānamapi uttarakālaṃ pramāvyāpārānuvṛttirūpasya sthairyasya unmūlanena dvicandro nāsti ityevaṃ rūpeṇa asatyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2763: iha punaḥ calati caitraḥ ityevaṃbhūto vimarśaḥ anuvartamāno na kenacit unmūlyamānaḥ saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2765: tathāpi dvicandrābhimānī na tāvatīṃ tatra arthakriyām abhimanyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2766: api tu yādṛśī ekena śaśinā kartavyā timirāpasāraṇādirūpā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2768: iti na taddviguṇām arthakriyāṃ tatra adhyavasyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2770: brajyāyāṃ tu yāmeva grāmaprāptim adhyavasyati tasyām avikalāyām upayogo 'syā iti sthairyāt upayogācca ekānekarūpakriyātattvālambanabuddhiḥ satyaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:2771: evaṃ saṃbandhādiṣu kālaparyanteṣu vācyam uttarakārikāsu sphuṭīkariṣyati //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:2777: iha tāvat caitre calati dṛṣṭe na jātucit na calati ayam iti buddhiḥ jāyate ---- na rajatam itivat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2778: dvicandro 'pi nāyaṃ dvicandraḥ timiravaśāt aham upaplutanayanaḥ param evaṃ vedmi iti bhavati unmūlanābuddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2779: yattu uktam ---- ekameva katham anekaṃ bhavati iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2780: tatra ucyate ---- iha kāraṇameva katham akāraṇaṃ bhavati atha ucyate ---- viṣayabhedāt tathā iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2781: tadviṣayabhede etat na virudhyate iti kena ayaṃ vitīrṇo'vasaraḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2782: saṃvedanena iti cet calati ityādau saṃvedanameva asmāmiḥ pramāṇīkṛtaṃ kimiti na sahyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2783: viṣayabhedo 'pi ca atra vaktuṃ na na śakyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:2785: ata eva anyāpekṣāviyogāt antaraṅgatvāt āntaram anuvartamānaṃ tathābhūtābhāsamātragrahaṇocitāntaḥkaraṇavedyatayā
GSP30abhiprvu:2786: ca āntaraṃ tathāsvarūpāparicyuteḥ tattvam ābhāsāntarayogena tananasahiṣṇutvācca tattvam
GSP30abhiprvu:2793: iti uktanītyā viśvameva ānantaraṃ sat ekam , tadeva
GSP30abhiprvu:2798: anekatvaṃ punar ---- ābhāsāntaramiśratāyām uvhayakaraṇavedyatve cidatiriktatābhāsane ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2800: tasyaiva ca tathātvam iti parāmarśabalādeva kāraṇākāraṇavat upādānasahakārivat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2801: atha vyapadeśamātram etat kāraṇam akāraṇaṃ ca ityādi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2803: nīlaṃ pītam avikalpakaṃ savikalpakam ityapi sarvaṃ māyāpade vyavahāramātram iti sarvaṃ samānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2806: tatra iti , teṣu kriyādiṣu yat āntaraṃ tattvaṃ tadekam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2807: tadeva indriyavedyatāṃ prāpya deśādibhedāt anekatāṃ yāti iti saṃbandhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2809: tayorvā ekatvānekatvayoḥ madhye ekatvamevam anekatvamevam iti vā yojanā //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:2810: nanu evaṃ viṣayabhede abhyupagamyamāne yadā ekaṃ pratibhātaṃ bhavati tadā na anekam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2813: tathāhi bāhyena indriyeṇa caitro vicitradeśakaḥ param anubhūyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2814: na tu anekābhāsasaṃmiśrīkāre bāhyendriyajasya avikalpakasya vyāpāraḥ ---- saṃnihitaviṣayabalotpatteḥ avicārakatvāt ityāhuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2815: vikalpenāpi mānasena tathābhūtaṃ vastu naiva spṛśyate iti kayā dhiyā vastu ekānekarūpaṃ gṛhyeta ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2819: iha jñānamālāyā antaḥsūtrakalpaḥ svasaṃvedanātmā pramātā jīvitabhūtaḥ iti upapāditaṃ prāk ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2826: paścādbhāvinaṃ vyavasāyaṃ niścayātmakaṃ vikalpakam anuvyavasāyaśabdavācyaṃ vidadhadantaḥkaraṇam etān kriyāsaṃbandhādivikalpān saṃpādayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2827: te ca vikalpāḥ taddvayam ekatvānekatvarūpam avalambante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2828: nahi vikalpeṣu pratibhāsamānam avastusat iti hi uktam prakāśataiva vastutvam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2829: na ca vikalpasya prakāśarūpatāṃ muktvā āropaṇādhyavasāyābhimānādināmadheyaṃ vyāpārāntaraṃ yuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2830: tato 'bāhye bāhyam āropayanti ityādi vaco vastuśūnyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2833: ityatra / atha brūyāt paro yat indriyajñānena prakāśanīyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tat kathaṃ vikalpaḥ spṛśediti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2834: bhavedevaṃ ---- yadi vikalpo nāma svatantro bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2835: yāvatā pramāturasau vyāpāraḥ pramātā ca pūrvānubhavāntaḥsvasaṃvedanarūpaḥ tadasya
GSP30abhiprvu:2836: ca ayameva pūrvānubhavasaṃskāro yat vikalpanavyāpārakāle 'pi pūvānubhavātmatvam anujjhanneva āste ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2837: tataḥ pūrvānubhavo yāvat svalakṣaṇakāśanātmā tāvat pūrvānubhavatādātmyāpannapramātṛtattvavyāpāro 'pi vikalpastadviṣaya eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2841: iti / tasmāt pramātuḥ yo vyāpāra ekatvānekatvasaṃyojanātmā sa eva prakṛto tatra tādṛśīḥ kriyādikalpanā ekānekavastuviṣayā etā iti grahaṇakavākyasūcitā mana eva karoti iti sthitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2846: iti mānasavikalpagrāhyā ekānekarūpāḥ sāmānyādayaḥ iti sthitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2848: tadvaśāt ucyatāṃ saṃvṛtisatyatvaṃ satyatvasyaiva tu prakāraḥ tat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2850: tatra ca ayaṃ saṃvidavataraṇakramo yat kriyāśaktereva ayaṃ sarvo visphāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2852: tathāhi ---- samānānāṃ yat ekaṃ bhāti tat sāmānyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2854: avayavānāṃ yadaikyaṃ vaitatyaṃ ca deśataḥ so'vayavī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2855: imam avadhiṃ kṛtvā ayam ittham tato 'sya ayaṃ purastāt ityādirdik ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2856: asyāyaṃ kriyāpratānaḥ sahabhāvena āste vinābhāvena vā iti vartamānādiḥ kālaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2857: yāvat hi prātipadikārthasya pṛṣṭapāti vapuḥ bhāti tadatiriktaṃ sarvaṃ saṃbandha eva iti kārakāṇāmapi saṃbandharūpataiva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2858: kevalaṃ kvacit asau saṃbandho vyapadeśāntaragranthiṃ sahate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2859: yathā sāsrādimatāṃ saṃbandho gāvaḥ iti ekavyapadeśasahiṣṇuḥ tatra sāmānyādivyavahāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2861: ata eva diṣṭiprasthapalādipramāṇaparimāṇonmānarūpaṃ tatra antargataṃ vā aṇumahadādi saṃkhyāpṛthaktvādi ca yat tat sarvaṃ saṃbandhasyaiva vijṛmbhitam
GSP30abhiprvu:2862: ye 'pi sāmānyādi vastvantaram amaṃsata te 'pi tatra samavāyam abhyupajagmuḥ jīvitatvena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2863: samavāyaśca saṃbandhātmā tadanugrāhyo vā keṣāṃcit , yata āhuḥ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2868: so 'pi kriyādvāreṇa sarvabhāvātmā sambandham uddhurayati iti saṃbandhādhīnaiva iyaṃ citrā lokayātrā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2876: rājā puruṣaśca bahistaṭasthau svātmaikaparisamāptau pramātṛbhūmau yadaikyaṃ gacchataḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2879: tadā tāveva sambandhadhiya ālambanaṃ bhavato rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2880: tathāhi ---- rājā yadā pūrvaṃ dhiyā gṛhīto 'pi na svātmaviśrāntyā tuṣyati tadā rūpāntareṇa puṃsā śleṣaṃ bhajan kṛtārthībhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2882: sa ca eṣa rūpaśleṣa eka eva ubhayoḥ cidātmani tathā avasthānarūpaḥ pūrvapratilabdhasaṃvitpratiṣṭhaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2883: tata eva adhikasaṃviśrimajjanāt anābhāsamānapṛthagbhavanalakṣaṇaḥ svātantrye viśrāmyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2890: jātyavabhāsasya avabhāsamānarūpāyāḥ jāteḥ grāhikā yāḥ kalpanāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2891: tā na kevalaṃ saṃbandhavat antar ekarūpatāṃ bahiśca anekarūpatām ālambante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2892: yāvad bahirapi vyaktibhedalakṣaṇam anaikyaṃ bahireva ca tadanusyūtatārūpām ekatām ālambanatvaṃ nayanti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2893: gāvaḥ iti hi pratibhāse pṛthakkṛtā bahir vyaktayo bhānti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2895: anuyāyi ca āsāṃ bhāti vapuḥ yata ekaprātipadikārthaparāmarśānugamaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2896: ubhayaṃ ca tad bahireva imāḥ iti aṅgulyā nirdeśāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2898: iti na tatra bhedābhedau dūṣaṇaṃ citrasaṃvedana iva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2900: āntaraṃ tu aikyaṃ saṃbandhadvāreṇa tadvadeva sarvatra ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2901: evam avabhāsamānasya ghaṭa iti avayavidravyasya prāhikā yāḥ kalpanāḥ tā na kevalaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2902: saṃbandhavat antarbahīrūpatayā ekānekaviṣayā yāvat bahirapyekaṃ niḥsaṃdhibandharūpatvena
GSP30abhiprvu:2904: ghaṭa iti hi niḥsandibandhanaikaghanātmā vitatarūpaśca bhāti iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:2907: kārakāṇāṃ kartrādiśaktyādhārāṇāṃ dravyāṇāṃ ca yo 'nyonyaṃ samanvayo dṛśyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2910: na hi pramāparāmarśam antarvartinaṃ vihāya vastunaḥ sākṣāt anvayo 'tra saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2912: kārakaśaktināmapi yaḥ svāśrayaiḥ saṃbandhaḥ so'pi kriyāparāmarśanimittakaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2913: dravyāṇāṃ ca śaktīnāṃ ca kriyayā sākaṃ sākṣāt saṃbandhaḥ iti iyaṃ kriyaiva bhagavatī etāvadvijṛmbhitaṃ saṃbandham āvirbhāvayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2914: asmādidaṃ pūrvaṃ paraṃ dūre ityevaṃ vahirbhinnatayāparāmṛśyamānayoḥ bhāvayorantar abhedanapūrvakaṃ bhedāvamarśamadhyam abhedaviśrāntaṃ ca yat rūpam āmṛśyate tat dig ityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2915: atra hi tayoḥ mukhādyavayavaviśeṣaparāmarśādaraḥ tatsaṃmukhatvaparāṅmukhatvādiniścayaḥ saṃyogasaṃyuktasaṃyogālpatādiparigrahaśca upayogī /
GSP30abhiprvu:2917: pakṣyati pacati apākṣīt ityādau tu saṃbhāvitasya sphuṭasya sphuṭabhūtapūrvasya ātmīyasaṃvedanaspanditaprāṇādityādikriyāntarasya phalaviśeṣasya ca odanādeḥ parāmarśa upayujyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2920: yatra padārthābhāsasya ātmaviśrāntyā saṃtoṣamapuṇyataḥ ābhāsāntaraparāmarśaviśrāntisākāṅkṣatayā svarūpapariniṣṭhā tatra saṃbandharūpataiva kriyāśaktivijṛnbhāmayī
GSP30abhiprvu:2925: nahi uttarasaṃbandhasṛṣṭyā vinā pūrvasaṃbandhāvabhāse hāniḥ kācit yen mūle kṣatiḥ śaṃkyeta //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:2929: bhedābhedavatārthena tena na bhrāntir īdṛśī // Ipk_2,2.7 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2933: na tatkāritvaṃ sarvadā tadāveśādaśanāt , uktaṃ hi
GSP30abhiprvu:2935: iti / tatkāritvasya ca pratyakṣānupalambhātmakānvayavyatirekagamyasya apratyakṣatve sayo'pi apratyakṣatvaprāptaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2942: tathāpi yadi paro'nubadhnīyāt ---- iha lokaḥ prācuryeṇa arthakriyārthī tatkāriṇi satyatvaṃ vyavaharati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2945: yadi na kupyasi tat sarvatraiva vyavahāre yatrāpi sphuṭā saṃbandhādidhīḥ na udeti eṣameva tatrāpi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2946: iti saṃbandhādirūpatayā bhedābhedavān yo 'rthaḥ tenaiva athakriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2947: na tu svātmamātraviśrāntena kācidapi kadācidapi arthakriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2949: ityādi krameṇa sarvo vyavahāraḥ sukhābhāsaśca yo'nubhūtaḥ sa eva abhilaṣyate na tu anyo'nanubhūtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2950: sa eva abhilaṣyate na tu anyo'nanubhūtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2951: sa eva ca yadi prāpyate tadabhilaṣitaṃ prāptam iti tuṣyate yadi ca tat tadeva tarhi kim abhilaṣyate ---- prāptatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2952: atha atadeva tathāpi katham arthyate ---- ajñātatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2953: tasmāt etat evaṃ bhavati ---- yadi tadeva ca atadeva ca tadapi ca atadapi ca iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2958: dṛṣṭaṃ ca saha dṛṣ.yaiva vinaṣṭamiti kārthitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2960: ityādi / evaṃ ca ābhāsātmani asmin asaṃvedyamapi ābhāsāntaraṃ sāmānyasaṃbandharūpatayā anupraviṣṭam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2961: anyathā na kathaṃcidvyavahāraḥ iti sakaladeśakāladaśāpuruṣopayogī yadi ayaṃ vyavahāro na satyaḥ tarhi na anyasya satyatvaṃ vidmaḥ ---- iti na atra bhrāntiḥ iti bhramitavyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2967: yasya vaktrāvalokīni prameye taṃ stumaḥ śivam //1//}
GSP30abhiprvu:2968: evaṃ kriyāśaktivisphāranirūpaṇaprasaṅgena saṃbandhapuraḥsaraṃ sāmānyādīnāṃ tattvam upapāditam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2970: tacca dvividhameva paramārthataḥ jñāpyajñāpakatā kāryakāraṇatā ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2971: tatra pūrvasyāṃ mānameyabhāvādicintāspadabhūtāyāṃ sarvam uktacaraṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca āyattaṃ ---- pramāṇādhīnā vastusiddhiḥ iti tatra tatra prasiddheḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2972: evaṃ ca prakṛtasamarthanīyavastūpayogitayā svayaṃ ca saṃbandha rūpatayā avaśyavicāryāṃ mānādisthitiṃ nirūpayitum
GSP30abhiprvu:2978: tataḥ prameyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpayituṃ pratyābhāsaṃ pramāṇasya vyāpāro na tu svalakṣaṇātmakavastvekaniṣṭhatāniyamena ---- iti darśayituṃ pratyavamarśabalena ābhāsavyavasthā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2983: sa ca eṣa sarvaḥ pramāṇatatphalaprameyādipravibhāgaḥ sati pramātari pradarśitarūpe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2984: tato na tasya prameyatā yena atrāpi pramāṇavyāpārasaṃbhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2990: vastu pramāṇaṃ tat so 'pi svābhāso 'bhinavodayaḥ // Ipk_2,3.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2994: vastu nīlasukhādikaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate ---- niyatāṃ prakāśamaryādāṃ na ativartate idamiti svarūpeṇa etādṛk iti ca viśeṣaṇabhūtanityatvānityatvādiyogena
GSP30abhiprvu:2996: tacca vivecakena vicāryam ---- iha vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ svātmavaśenaiva na tāvat vyavatiṣṭhate ---- jaḍatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2997: mama nīlaṃ prakāśate caitrasya veti ca tadā kathamavabhāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2999: anyo 'pi cet jaḍaḥ tat andhena andhasya hastādānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3001: so 'pi yadi śuddho nirviśeṣo na tarhi nīlasyaiva vyavasthāhetuḥ bhavet ---- pītādāvapi tasya tathātvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3002: tadasau nīloparakto nīlonmukho nīlaprakāśasvabhāva ityābhāsaḥ san nīlasya vyavasthāpakaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3004: sa ca nīlasya prakāśo yadi avyatiriktasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3007: nīlaṃ ca ittham tato vyatirekābhāsayogyaṃ yadi so'pyā ---- bhāso mahataḥ prakāśāt vyatiricyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3010: iti nūnaṃ tena saṃkoca ātmani nirbhāsanīyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3011: saṃvido vastūnāṃ ca saṃkocanaprāṇo nañartharūpo'sau śūnya ityucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3015: anantakālāntarmukhasaṃvedanarūpāt sa pramāṇābhimata ābhāso yāvat prameyonmukhatāsvabhāvaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3016: tāvat prameyasya deśakālākārābhāsasaṃbhedavattvāt so 'pi tathaiva kṣaṇe anyānyarūpaḥ sraṣṭavyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3017: taduktam abhinavodayaḥ iti ---- abhinavaḥ ---- kṣaṇaparivāsamlānyāpi na kalaṅkitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3019: so'pi yadi tathābhūto māyāpramātṛlagno na bhavet tato mama nīlāvabhāso yasya tasyaiva pītābhāso mama iti na syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3020: asti ca idaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ---- yat sarvatra abādhyamānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3021: ityevaṃ svatvena ābhāsamāno ya ābhāso ---- navanavaprameyaunmukhyāt navanavodayaḥ sa pramāṇam yataḥ pramāṃ vidhatte /
GSP30abhiprvu:3023: āha ---- sa eva bodharūpa ābhāso mitiḥ pramāṇaphalam iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3024: nanu evaṃ paryāyatvamuktaṃ bhavet na tu phalabhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3025: āha ---- bāhyonmukhatayā prakāśarūpayā tatra tat pramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3026: yā tu tasyaiva antarmukhātmā vimarśarūpatā prāk upapāditā tatsvabhāvena kevalaṃ viṣayadaśāsaṃkucitena sa eva bodhaḥ phalam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3027: yathāhi yaḥ śūro'haṃ sa eva vijayī iti ekaniṣṭhe śūratvavijayatve vivekavatā hetuphalabhāvena vyavasthāpyete ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3028: yato hi ahaṃ śūraḥ tato vijayī iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3029: evaṃ yato nīlaprakāśaḥ tato nīlamidam iti parāmarśa iti ekarūpatve 'pi hetuphalabhāvaḥ , yayoktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3031: iti / kiṃ ca iha vyāpārarūpameva phalaṃ vyāpāraśca vyāpriyamāṇāt vyāpāryamāṇāt vā ananyākāra eva siddhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3032: iti ---- abhedaḥ pramāṇaphalayoḥ vimarśabalena ca yataḥ pramāṇaṃ vimarśaśca śabdajīvitaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3035: tato deśakālābhāsayoḥ svalakṣaṇatvārpaṇapravaṇayoḥ anāmiśraṇāt sāmānyāyamāne ābhāse pramāṇaṃ pravartate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3036: ayam ityapi hi avabhāsa ābhāsāntarānāmiśre puro'vasthite bhāvāvabhāsamātre ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3041: svalakṣaṇaṃ tu tadābhāsasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāsarūpam ābhāsāntaram ekam anyadeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3043: tatparaṃ miśrīkāreṣu teṣu ābhāseṣu gṛhītagrāhi na pramāṇam iti agre bhaviṣyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3044: adhyavasāyasya asmaduktanayena śabdaprāṇitasya pratyābhāsaviśrāntau tadapekṣamapi prāmāṇyaṃ vadatā pratyābhāsaniṣṭhameva prāmāṇyamupetyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3047: nanu yadi vimarśaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ sa tarhi dvicandre 'pi asti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3048: maivam , sa hi saṃskārayogāt ātmānamabhimataprasiddhārthakriyāprāptiparyantamanubandhayan anunmūlitavṛttiḥ sthiraḥ san tathā bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3049: madhye punarunmūlanaṃ cet sahate na tarhi asau tathā vimarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3050: nāyaṃ vimarśaḥ pūrvamapi ---- ekena antarmukhena vapuṣā pūrvameva ---- tasya nirmūlanāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3052: tadaiva na idaṃ rajatam iti vṛttapūrvasyaiva vimarśasya avimarśīkaraṇaṃ saṃvedyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3056: ityatra , evaṃ sthite dvicandre 'pi yāvat parakutūhalasaṃpādanamarthakriyāsaṃmatam
GSP30abhiprvu:3060: nanvevaṃ yatra arthakriyāṃ na anvicchati tatra kathaṃ bādhābādhavyavahāraḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3061: mā bhūt ---- kiṃ naḥ truṭitam pravṛttirhi na sarvatra pramāṇata eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3063: arthapakṣādhikyāt arthitvatāratamyādapi vā kṛṣyādau saviṣānna bhojane niścitasaṃbhāvitadṛṣṭapratyavāye ca cauryādau pravṛttidarśanāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3065: sa ca pravṛttaḥ kvacana anummūlitapramitikaḥ pramāṇatāṃ pratipadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3067: evam ājanma yato 'nena abhyasta ājanmaśatebhyo vā pramāṇāpramāṇavibhāgaḥ tato maṇirūpyādivat tatsvarūpam āpātamātra eva vilakṣaṇamīkṣate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3068: asti hi tasya paramārthato vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāraṇabhedādikṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3069: tataśca yadārtiṃ parimitāṃ sahyām abhimanyate tata eva arthitāmahāgraheṇa yatra tatra
GSP30abhiprvu:3070: na preryate tadā visaṃvādabhīruḥ niścitaprāmāṇyāt bodhāt adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭe'pi vā pravartamāno na visaṃvādyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3072: tena laukilaṃ pramāṇasvarūpam anūditaṃ sāmānyasaṃbandhādijñāne'pi mohāt aprāmāṇyaśaṃkāṃ śamayitum ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3073: ata eva vibhāgaviśeṣalakṣaṇaparīkṣādibhiriha na āyāsito lokaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3074: yat yat abādhitasthairyam ata eva apratihatānuvṛttikaṃ vimarśaphalaṃ vidhatte tattad bodharūpaṃ bodhyaniṣṭhaṃ pramātṛsvarūpaviśrāntaṃ pramāṇam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3075: tacca aindriyake bodhe sukhādisaṃvedane yogijñāne ca avivādameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3077: anumānajā tu pratītiḥ ābhāsāntarāt kāryarūpāt svabhāvabhūtāt vā ābhāsāntare pratipattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3078: vastvantarasya ca tena sākaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamaśca īśvaraniyatiśaktyupajīvana eva avadhāryo bhavati na anyathā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3079: tena yāvati niyatirjñātā tāvati deśe kāle vā anumānaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3080: āgamastu nāmāntaraśabdanarūpo dṛḍhīya stamavimarśātmā citsvabhāvasya īśvarasya antaraṅga
GSP30abhiprvu:3081: eva vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣāderapi jīvitakalpaḥ tena yat yathāmṛṣṭaṃ tat tathaiva yathā
GSP30abhiprvu:3082: naitat viṣaṃ māṃ mārayati garuḍa eva aham iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3083: tatra tu tathāvidhe śabdanātmani vimarśe ānukūlyaṃ yo bhajate śabdarāśiḥ so 'pi pramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3086: tena hi yat śabdanam utpātitaṃ jyotiṣṭomakārī ahaṃ svargaṃ gantā iti dīkṣito 'ham apunarāvṛttibhāgī iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3091: anyasya tu dṛḍhapratipattirūpatvābhāvāt apramāṇameva tathāvimarśanātmakaṃ śabdanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3092: nanvevaṃ tadeva śāstraṃ kaṃcitprati pramāṇaṃ kaṃcitprati na iti syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3096: apakṣapāti pramāṇam iti kaḥ asya vacanasya arthaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3097: kiṃ yat ekasya nīlajñānaṃ pratyakṣarūpaṃ tat kiṃ sarvasya nīlaṃ bhāsayati dhūmajñānaṃ vā agnim ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3098: tvaṃ prātarnidhimanena vidhinā landhāse iti ca yaḥ siddhādeśa āgamaḥ sa kiṃ sarvānprati pramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3100: tathā ihāpi dṛḍhavimarśanarūpaṃ śabdanam ā ---- samantāt arthaṃ gamayati iti āgamasaṃjñakaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvasya tāvat bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3101: tatra yathā mithyājñānasahāyatāṃ bhajamānam ālokendriyādikam apramāgatāsavivam apramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3102: na ca etāvatā samyagjñānarūpasya pratyakṣasya kācit pakṣapātitā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3103: tathā sa eva vyotiṣṭhomādiśabdaḥ śūdrāderadṛḍhavimarśātmani ata evāpramāṇe āgamābhāse
GSP30abhiprvu:3106: sarva eva hi āgamo niyatādhilārideśakālasahakāryādiniyantritameva vimarśa vidhatte ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3108: tena prasiddhiḥ iti śloke yatra yadā ityuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3111: tasmāt pramāṇalakṣaṇe jñāte sarvaṃ pramāṇasvarūpaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3112: yastu avisaṃvādakatvaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam āha tenāpi prāpakatvaṃ pravartakatvaṃ pravṛttiyogyaśakyaprāptikavastūpadaśakatvaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3113: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ bruvatā na kiṃcit pramāṇābhimatabodhaviśrāntaṃ svarūm uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3114: tacca anenaiva lakṣaṇena nirvāhyate tat nirvyūḍhaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3117: nanu ca ekābhidhānaviṣaye mitiḥ iti yat uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3118: tatra ---- ekamabhidhānaṃ bāhye svalakṣaṇa eva pravartate yadi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3120: ābhāsamiśrīkaraṇābhāsastu svalakṣaṇam ityāśaṅkāṃ śamayan pramāṇasya yat prameyaṃ tat paramārthato nirūpayitum āha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3123: yadyapi ghaṭa iti bahiḥ paridṛṣṭa eko 'rthaḥ tathāpi tāvāneva asau na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3125: tathāhi ---- svatantraṃ vā vivecanam arthitvānusāreṇa vā pūrvaprasiddhyupajīvanena vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3126: tatra tridhāpi vivecane kriyamāṇe pṛthageva bhānti ābhāsāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3128: ucyate ---- teṣāṃ pṛthak bhāsamānānāmapi ābhāsānāṃ yo vimarśaḥ anuprāṇitabhūtaḥ sa kadācit pratyābhāsameva viśrāmyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3130: kadācit punaḥ guṇapradhānatāpādanena atra idam ittham iti miśraṇāprāṇo vimarśaḥ tadā tadekaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3131: apiḥ bhinnakamaḥ anusandhānena miśratāvimarśena sādhito ya eko 'rthaḥ svalakṣaṇātmā tanna ekasminnapi sati ruci ---- svātantryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3133: vyutpattiṃ ---- vṛddhavyavahāraśaraṇatāṃ ca anatikramya bhidyata eva ābhāsaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:3139: iha tāvat ekasminnapi cetanatayā prasiddhe puruṣasvalakṣaṇe vitatadeśavyāpitāṃ dīrghatāmeva kadācit vimṛśati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3141: niḥsaṃdhibandhanarūpatāṃ vā vṛttatāṃ yā śilānāmapi saṃbhavinī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3142: ūrdhvadigākramaṇarūpāṃ vā ūrdhvatāṃ yā sthāṇorapi saṃbandhinī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3144: tathā hi ---- svatantrayā vā icchayāṃ rucirūpayā yāvadevaṃ kuryāt yathouktam
GSP30abhiprvu:3146: iti / vitatadeśavyāpina eva vā arthān tirodhilakṣaṇām arthakriyām arthayamāno vibhajet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3147: evaṃ vyavahāre vṛddhaiḥ kīdṛk dīrghaṃ nāma gīyate iti vyutpitsamāno vyutpādayitumicchuḥ vā vibhāgaṃ kuryāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3149: ekasvalakṣaṇaṃ tu ---- ekasmin deśābhāse kālābhāse ca viśrānteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3151: evaṃ puruṣatvavat anye 'pi brāhmaṇādyābhāsā api nirūpyāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3152: evam atra tāvat prasiddhatara ābhāsabhedo ---- jaḍājaḍasādhāraṇabahutaradharmāspadatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3153: anena nidarśanena dhūme'pi dhūmatvacāndanatvaśrīkhaṇḍacandanotthitatvādayaḥ prasiddhā ābhāsabhedā vibhajanīyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3154: prasiddhena dṛṣṭāntena aprasiddhabhāgo 'pi yo ghaṭaḥ tatrāpi ābhāsabhāgabhedo bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3155: tathāhi kiṃcidapi atra nāsti iti hṛdbhaṅgamiva āpadyamāno ghaṭaṃ paśyan asti idam iti sattvābhāsameva paśyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3163: evam ete ābhāsabhedā eva vastu ābhāsamānatāsāratvāt vastutāyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3164: yo 'pi ābhāsasya prāṇabhūto vimarśaḥ so'pi pratyābhāsameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3167: arthakriyākāritvamapi anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pratyābhāsameva niyataṃ ---- sadābhāsena hṛdbhaṅgaparihāramātrasya saṃpādanāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3168: tatra ābhāsāntarasya yā apekṣā sā agnyābhāsena arthakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ pātrābhāsasya iva tadābhāsanāntarīyakatvena ābhāsāntarasyāpi niyatasya apekṣaṇāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3169: evaṃ yena yena mukhena artho vicāryate tena tena ābhāsamātrātmaiva tathaiva pratibhāsanāt vimarśanāt arthakriyākaraṇācca iti siddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:3170: evaṃ prasiddhataraprasiddhāprasiddhatvātiśayena eko'pi arthogranthakāreṇa traidhaṃ nirūpito dīrghavṛtteti dhūmeti saddhaṭeti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:3171: nanu evaṃ pratyābhāsameva vastutve eko ghaṭātmā na vastu syāt ityāśaṃkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3174: ābhāsānāṃ miśraṃ yadrūpaṃ tatra avaśyaṃ kaścidābhāsaḥ pradhānatvena anyābhāsānāṃ viśrāntipadīkāryaḥ sa teṣāṃ samānamadhikaraṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3175: tena saha yasteṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ tat sāmānādhikaraṇyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3176: tena upalakṣito yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ ---- arthonmukhaḥ prakāśaḥ tadanuprāṇakaśca napadātmā parāmarśaḥ ---- tasya sarvasya ekābhāsaviśrāntatāniyamāt
GSP30abhiprvu:3177: tasmāt taṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāsaṃ samanughrāṇayati yo vākyātmā vākyārthaparāmarśarūpo
GSP30abhiprvu:3178: vimarśaḥ ---- iha idānīṃ eṣa ghaṭo'sti ityevaṃrūpaḥ tato hetoḥ ye abhedina ekasvalakṣaṇatām
GSP30abhiprvu:3179: prāptā na ca svarūpabhedam ujjhantaḥ teṣām anyā viśiṣṭā samuditā arthakriyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3180: ābhāsavimarśabhede punaranyā niyatā ekaikamātrarūpā ābhāsapratibhāsaśabdābhyāṃ sūtre vimarśo'pi ākṣipto mantavyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3181: punaḥ śabdo viśeṣadyotakaḥ kākākṣivat ubhayatra yojyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3183: tatra ca aikyāvabhāse paratantraṃ sat pṛthaktvaṃ yadā ābhāsānāṃ tadā samānarūpavyaktyuparañjakatvena pāramārthikaṃ sāmānyarūpatvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3184: ghaṭābhāsasya tu śuddhasya svatantraparāmarśe yogyatāmātreṇa sāmānyarūpatā na vastuto ---- dravyādanyo hi sarvaḥ padārthaḥ paratantratāsāraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3185: evam eko'pi ghaṭātmā ca ityapi satyameva ---- ābhāsavimarśārthakriyābalena tathā vyavasthāpanāt iti //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:3188: ābhāsāśca bhinnā api yadi ekām arthakriyāṃ kartuṃ miśrībhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3189: tadā kasteṣām iyattāvadhiḥ iti codyam apavadati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3192: pṛthak vatinyo yāḥ pradīpasya prabhāḥ sūkṣmatamāvalokanasāmarthyādhānalakṣaṇāṃ yām arthakriyāṃ na kṛtavatyaḥ tāmeva ekabhavanābhyantaraṃ saṃmūrchitātmāno vidadhate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3195: tadvat ghaṭaḥ kāñcano lohitaḥ tato'yaṃ śivaliṅgaśiromārjanocitasalilāharaṇārthakriyocito dṛṣṭamātra eva tīvraprītilakṣaṇārthakriyākārī ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3197: yat punarābhāsānāṃ miśraṇe kā sīmā iti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3198: tatra ucyate ---- yeṣām avirodhaḥ ta eva ābhāsā miśrībhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3201: pṛthak ye dīpaprakāśāḥ teṣāṃ saṃbandhi yadekaṃ sāgare srotasāṃ ca yadekaṃ vastu tena
GSP30abhiprvu:3202: kāryā yathā aikyadhīḥ tathā aviruddhā ye avabhāsā ghaṭalohitakāñcanādayaḥ teṣāṃ saṃbandhi
GSP30abhiprvu:3203: tadekaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tatkāryā aikyadhīriti saṃbandhaḥ . aikyadhiyā ---- pratibhāso
GSP30abhiprvu:3205: nanvevaṃ pratyābhāsaṃ pramāṇasya viśrāntatvāt agnyābhāse agnijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dhūmajñānaṃ ca dhūmābhāsamātre kāryakāraṇabhāvāvabhāso 'pi tāvanmātre
GSP30abhiprvu:3206: tataśca dhūmābhāso'pi agnyābhāsaṃ vyabhicaret ityādi bahutaropaplavaprasaṃgaḥ iti śaṃkām apohitum āha
GSP30abhiprvu:3211: tathāhi ---- aviśiṣṭo yadyapi bahnyābhāso deśakālābhāsapramukhaiḥ ābhāsaiḥ asaṃkīrṇatvena
GSP30abhiprvu:3212: sāmānyamātrarūpatvāt tathāpi sa evābhāso yāvadbhirābhāsairavinābhūto bhagavatyā niyatiśaktyā
GSP30abhiprvu:3213: niyamitaḥ tāvato 'vabhāsān svīkṛtyaiva pramāṇakṛtāṃ niścayapadavīm avatarati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3215: ca svābhāvikāvyabhicaritaniyamaḥ pratīyamāno viśvatraiva sarvadaiva ca tathā pratīto
GSP30abhiprvu:3220: tasya hi pramātuḥ kṛtrimeṇa itareṇa vā rūpeṇa ābhāsāntaranāntarīyakatayā asau bahnyābhāsaḥ saṃviditaḥ sarvadeśakālagataḥ tathā saṃviditaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3222: tasya yathecchaṃ puruṣasamayena niyujyamānasya śabdasya artho 'yaṃ jvaladbhāsvarākāra ābhāsa ityanena niyatiśaktireva sarvatra śaraṇam iti piśunayati
GSP30abhiprvu:3223: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- yatkiṃcit kṛtrimam itaradvā bhāvābhāsasya ābhāsāntareṇa nāntarīyakatayā pratibhāti tatra niyatiśaktimātrameva paraṃ vijṛmbhate
GSP30abhiprvu:3224: tattu niyatirūpaṃ pūrvāparavitatakālam ---- indhanakāryatve dhūmakāraṇatve uṣṇasvabhāvatve ca ābhāsamāne ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3226: tataśca niyatiśaktyupajīvanena dhūmābhāso 'pi agnyābhāsāvyabhicārī iti na kaścit viplavaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3227: kāryatā kāraṇatā uṣṇatā ca tasya tasya śabdasyārthatā tattacchabdā bhidheyatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3229: ityevaṃbhūto ya ātmā svabhāvo vahnyādau sa ekasmādeva pramāṇāt mataḥ ---- saṃvidita iti yāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:3233: evaṃ bhāvasvabhāvavyavasthāpanaṃ pratyābhāsaviśrāntena ekena pramāṇena kriyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3234: teṣāmapi ābhāsānāṃ yathocitaṃ yadanyonyanāntarīyakatvaṃ tat ekena saṃvedanarūpeṇa tadanekapramitābhāsaviṣayapūrvapravṛttasaṃvedanakalāpānuprāṇakāntarmukhasvarūpeṇa niścīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3238: bhāvasvabhāvavyavasthāpanātmakamānasapravṛttyatiriktakāyapravṛttyupayogastu yathā pramāṇaviṣayaḥ taṃ prakāraṃ darśayitum āha @-----
GSP30abhiprvu:3241: bāhyā tāvat arthakriyā svalakṣaṇataḥ svālakṣaṇye ca deśakālābhāsayojanasyaiva antaraṅgatvam tatrāpi ca viśeṣarūpatāpi parāmarśa vinā na kiṃcit
GSP30abhiprvu:3242: parāmarśadvāreṇa tu pramātari viśrāmyantī pramātuḥ saṃvedanaikarūpasya deśakālāyogena aikyāt abhyujjhatyeva viśeṣarūpatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3244: tathāpi tu yā viśeṣarūpatā bhāti tasyāṃ parameśvarasvātantryameva nimittaṃ yat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3246: tatra viśeṣasādhyārthakriyāviśeṣeṇa yo'rthī tasya yā svalakṣaṇe tasmin viśeṣarūpe arthe tatkālabhāvinī vāṅmanaḥ kāyapravṛttiḥ sā deśe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3247: ādigrahaṇāt kāle svarūpāntare tadanusandhānādau ca yāni adhyakṣāntarāṇi bahūni pratyakṣāṇi teṣāṃ bhinne bhede nimitte sati bhavati , na anyathā
GSP30abhiprvu:3248: naikaikataḥ pramāṇāt sā pravṛttiḥ api tu pramāṇasamūhādeva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3253: ityatra / iyameva ca sā pramāṇānāṃ yojanā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3258: antaḥ ---- pramātari abhinnaṃ yat svalakṣaṇaṃ tatra iti vā saṃgatiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3259: deśādikairadhyakṣāntaraiḥ pratyakṣībhūtairābhāsāntarairbhinne svalakṣaṇe nimitte sati pravṛttiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3261: atrāpi prameyavahutvanirūpaṇadiśā tadanuyāyitvena abhidhīyamānaḥ pramāṇasamūho nimittatvena ukto bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3262: nanu kiṃ prāttyakṣyāmeva pravṛttau pramāṇasamūha upayogī ? netyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3264: na kevala pratyakṣataḥ pravṛttiḥ deśādikādhyakṣāntarabhedarūpapramāṇasamūhanimittā yāvat anumānato 'pi tathaiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3265: dhūmābhāsamātre agnyābhāsamātre dhūmasyāgnyābhāsāvyabhicāritve parvatābhāse ca yāni
GSP30abhiprvu:3266: pratyakṣāntarāṇi yacca tadgṛhītātirikte ayogavyavacchede agniratra ityevaṃbhūte pṛthak
GSP30abhiprvu:3267: anumānaṃ pramāṇam tatsamūhādeva arthinaḥ tātkālikī pravṛttiḥ iti saṃbandhaḥ //9 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3269: tadeva hi parameśvarasya saṃvedanātmanaḥ śivanāthasya svātantryaśaktivijṛmbhitam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3270: tataśca paraiḥ yat ucyate dūrāntikādau arthasya abhedaḥ iti tadapi uappadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3280: satyam , tathāpi tu paro yo vimarśaḥ sa evāyaṃ padārthaḥ iti ekapratyavamarśarūpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3281: tena prāṇitakalpena ā samantāt khyānaṃ prathanaṃ yasya mukhyāvabhāsasya ekarūpabhāvābhāsasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3286: ---- ityatra pratyakṣaparokṣatārūpeṇātmanā svabhāvena bhinnā avabhāvacchāyā amukhyo'vabhāso yeṣāṃ teṣām ekatvaṃ mukhyāvabhāsata ekapratyavamarśānuprāṇitāt
GSP30abhiprvu:3288: bāhyāntaratayā bhināvabhāsānāmaikyaṃ yathā yadeva dṛṣṭaṃ tadevāntarahamullikhāmi , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3290: yadeva raktotpalaṃ dīpena nīlaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadeva sūryāṃśubhirlohitaṃ paśyāmi , iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3291: anyenāpi prakāreṇa indriyāpāṭavādinā ekapārśvasaṃmukhatvādinā vā yeṣāmavabhāsacchāyā bhinnā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3294: nanu dūrādūrādāvastu sa evārthaḥ pramātradhyavasitārthakriyāṃśe tathaivopayogāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3298: niyatā sā hi tenāsyā nākriyāto'nyatā bhavet // Ipk_2,3.12 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3302: tatkāritvaṃ hi yasmāt īśvarecchayā niyataṃ bhavane cābhavane ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:3303: yato naiṣā svarūpaṃ tena tasyā akaraṇāt hetorbhāvasyānyatvaṃ nāśaṅkanīyaṃ svarūpabhedāt hi saṃbhāvyetānyatvaṃ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3307: nanu vimarśabalādeva yadi vastūnāṃ bhedābhedavyavasthā tarhi idānīṃ trijagati nivṛttā bhrāntisaṃkathāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3308: śuktikāyāmapi satyarajatataiva āpatati idaṃ rajatam iti vimṛśyamānatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3310: vyabhicārābhāve hi avādhitā ityasya viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedyaṃ na labhyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3314: idaṃ rajataṃ sthiraṃ sarvapramātṛsādhāraṇam arthakriyāyogyam iti idamaṃśe rajatādyaṃśeṣu tatsaṃmelanāṃśe ca ābhāsavimarśanabalāt na tāvat kiṃcit mithyātvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3315: kiṃtu uttarakālaṃ yo bhaviṣyati vimarśo nedaṃ rajataṃ vastu sthiraṃ pramātrantaragamyamabhimatakāryakāri
GSP30abhiprvu:3316: iti tadvimarśavimarśanīyam yat tatpūrvavimarśakālasamucitameva rūpaṃ tat tasmin pūrvavimarśakāle naivāmṛśyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3318: tatraiva kāle nedaṃ rajataṃ abhūt iti hi uttaraḥ parāmarśo na tu uditapratyastamitāyāṃ śatahradāyāmiva idānīmeva idaṃ na iti vimarśaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3319: tato yāvatā pūrṇena rūpeṇa prakhyātavyaṃ vimarśaparyantaṃ tāvat na prakhyāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3328: tatrāpi tu svapne svapna iva gaṇḍe sphoṭa iva apareyaṃ bhrāntirucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3330: ataśca pṛthak idantādyābhāseṣu na kācana bhrāntiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3331: mekanāṃśe tu vimarśānuvṛttinirmūlanaṃ vimarśodayakālādeva ārabhya bādhakena kriyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3334: rajatasya śuktikayā saha yadyapi eko vimarśaḥ tathāpi śuktau rajatasya jñānena yā dattā sthitiḥ idaṃ rajatam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3336: yata upādhirūpo yo deśaḥ atra rajatam iti rajatacchāyām ātmanoparañjayan śuktideśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3341: dvicandrajñāne tu dvau candrau ityābhāse śuktikayeva melanaṃ na kenacitsākamābhāsate yatra bādhaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3344: ka etadāha --- melanaṃ na kenacitsaha iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3345: evaṃ hi sati svālakṣaṇyena niyatadeśakālatayā kathamābhāsaḥ , ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3346: taddeśakālābhyāṃ saha tatrāpi asti melanābhāso yadvimarśo'nuvivṛtsurnirudhyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3351: anyathā iti dvicandrāvaruddho yovimṛṣṭaḥ sa na tathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3362: abhāvasphuraṇameva ca pṛthivyābhāsasya vicitratayā cakāsat pṛthubudhnodarākāratā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3367: sarvathā tāvadatra prameye bhagavata eva bhedane ca abhedane ca svātantryaṃ ghaṭagatābhāsabhedābhedadṛṣṭireva ca paramārthādvayadṛṣṭipraveśe upāyaḥ samavalamvanīyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3370: etadeva sphuṭayan sakalaprameyasiddhiḥ parameśvara eva āyattā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3374: iha anuvṛttaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ ca cakāsadvastu katareṇa vapuṣā na satyamucyatām ubhayatrāpi bādhakābhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3375: satyato hi yadi bādhaka eva ekatarasya syāt tattadudaye sa eva bhāgaḥ punarunmajjanasahiṣṇutārahito vidyudvilāyaṃ vilīyeta ; na caivam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3377: aparaiśca ābhāsalagnatayā sāṃvṛtatvam abhidadhadbhiḥ ātmā paraśca vañcitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3378: saṃvedanaviśrāntaṃ tu dvayamapi bhāti saṃvedanasya svātantryaāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3379: sarvasya hi tiraśco'pi etat svasaṃvedanasiddhaṃ ---- yat saṃvidantarviśrāntamekatāmāpādyamānaṃ jalajvalanamapi aviruddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3382: iti / ataśca guṇairupādhirūpairupādhitayā vivakṣitaiḥ śabdādibhirvā daṇḍādibhirapi vā yo bhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3388: viśeṣaṇānyeva ca bhedakāni ---- iti kimantyairanyairviśeṣaiḥ ayaṃ sa paramāṇurya etaddeśādiviśiṣṭaghaṭārambhaṇakālasthitapaścāttanasaṃghaṭitadvyaṇukārambhakāle pūrvaṃ militaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3391: ---- iti iyataiva yogisarvajñādīnāṃ siddhaḥ paramāṇvātmādiṣu bhedāvabhāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3393: siddhaṃ tāvat bhedābhedarūpaṃ prameyatattvam ekapramātṛviśrāntyā niḥśaṅkatāṃ śrayati , iti //14//
GSP30abhiprvu:3394: nanvevaṃbhūto yadyayaṃ pramātā tatrava tarhi pramāṇopanyāse prayatanīyaṃ na prameye ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3395: yadāha pradhāne hi yatnaḥ phalavān iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3396: tadetadāśaṅkya prathamopakṣiptameva prameyaṃ smārayatyācāryaḥ / tathā hi /
GSP30abhiprvu:3397: {ajaḍātmā miṣedhaṃ vā siddhiṃ vā vidadhīta kaḥ /}(Ipk 1,1.2)
GSP30abhiprvu:3398: iti / yadvastu tadevedānīṃ jñāte pramāṇasvarūpe parameśvarasvarūpe ca nirvāhaṇārham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3399: evaṃ bhūtaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tadevaṃbhūte hi bhagavati kathaṃ kramatām , iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3406: tatra prakāśavauṣi prakāśamātrasvabhāve pūrvasiddhe kaḥ pramāṇasyopayogaḥ saṃbhāvanā vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3407: tathā ca pūrvasiddhe pramātari sati tallagnaprakāśāntarbhūtavimarśamayīm abhūtapūrvāṃ prameyasya siddhiṃ vitarati pramāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3409: viśvavaicitryaṃ hi tarta parameśvare prakāśaikātmani sati bhāti yathā citraṃ bhittau /
GSP30abhiprvu:3410: yadi hi nīlapītādikaṃ pṛthageva parāmṛśyate tadā svātmaviśrānteṣu teṣu tataiva anyonyaviṣaye jaḍāndhabadhirakalpāni jñānāni svaviṣayamātraniṣṭhitāni
GSP30abhiprvu:3412: iti citram idam iti kathaṃkāraṃ pratipattiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3413: ekatra tu nimnonnatādirahite bhittitale rekhāvibhaktanimnonnatā divibhāgajuṣi gambhīranābhirunnatastanīyam iti citrāvabhāso yuktaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3418: tarhi sa eva nāsti iti syāt prakāśamātrarūpatvāt tasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:3424: athocyate ---- īśvaratā tasyāpramitā pramāsyate tadapi na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3425: yato hi asau pramātṛtvena cet na cakāsyāt kasyāyamucyamaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3427: tadāha īśvare pramātari sarvadā bhātavigrahe iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3429: ata eva svatantraprakāśarūpatvāt abhāvasparśāyogenābhāvānupraveśanena yaḥ kālavyavahāraḥ so'tra nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3435: tatra ca kiṃ pramāṇam na kiñcit upapattyā ghaṭate ityarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3436: yataḥ pramāṇaṃ nāma navābhāsarūpaṃ pramātari pramitilakṣaṇāṃ viśrāntiṃ vidadhat pramāṇaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3437: pramātā cāvicchinnābhāsaḥ sarvāśca pramitīḥ svātmani antarmukharūpe bhajate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3438: tat tasmin kathamabhinavābhāsastatpramitiśca kutra viśrāmyatu tasmāt dehaprāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyaprāya eva pramātari pramāṇamucyatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:3441: tatrāpi viṣayonmukhe tata eva saṃkucitatvāt abhinavābhāse saṃkocavihīnasatyapramātṛlagnatāpekṣayā kathyatāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3442: saugatenāpi mamedaṃ jñānam iti kalpitapramātṛlagnameva tadupetyam na tu paramārthapramātari pramāṇena kiṃcit /
GSP30abhiprvu:3447: nanvevaṃ yadi bhagavati pramāṇamanupayogyanupapatti ca kimarthaṃ tadviṣayaṃ śāstram ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3452: ṣoḍaśasu hi padārtheṣu nirūpyamāṇeṣu samyak pratipādyaṃ paraḥ pratipādyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3458: tat paripūrṇaparapratipattikāri paramārthataḥ sakalameva śāstraṃ parārthānumānam āgamavyatiriktaṃ nyāyanirmāṇavedhasākṣapādena nirūpitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3463: iha parameśvarasyedameva paraṃ svātantryaṃ ---- yat asmādṛkprācyapaśudaśāviśeṣāsaṃbhāvyamānātiduṣkaravastusaṃpādanaṃ nāma /
GSP30abhiprvu:3465: ---- yatprakāśātmani akhaṇḍitatādrūpye eva prakāśamāne prakāśananiṣadhāvabhāsaḥ prakāśamānaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3466: tasmāt parameśvarasya tatparaṃ svātantryaṃ yat tathānavabhāsanaṃ paśurūpatāvabhāsanaṃ nāma grāhakāṃśasamutthāpanaṃ taddvāreṇa ca grāhyollāsanamapi
GSP30abhiprvu:3469: iti / tadevaṃbhūtānmāyāśaktirūpāt svātantryāt yā mūḍhatā vinaṣṭapūrṇacetanatā svātmavartina icchāspandodayasphuṭasphuritaviśvabhāvanirbharatātmanaḥ pūrṇatvasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3471: deśakālasaṃkocavaikalyāt ayatnasidhabaibhavanityatādharmasya ca prakāśamānasyāpi yadaprakāśamānatayā abhimananam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3473: pūrvaṃ yo na pravartitaḥ samanantaraślokadvayoktasvarūpe pramātari bhagavati īśvaratvādinā
GSP30abhiprvu:3474: uktenaiva pūrṇatādinā vyavahāro yaḥ khalu aham iti bhāti sa pūrṇaḥ vibhuḥ svatantro nityaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3477: etena śaktīnām icchājñānakriyāṇāṃ prakāśakena pratyabhijñārūpeṇa vyavahārasādhanaparārthānumānātmanā śāstreṇa taṃ vyavahāraṃ pravartayatāṃ tatsamarthācaraṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3481: prakāśamāna eva yat na prakāśate ityabhimananaṃ tadapasāryate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3486: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- yathā bhautasya bhāsamāne evātmani apahārito 'ham iti mohānmanyamānasya moho'pasāryate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3489: paśya tadasti bahvataḥ ---- iti punaḥ punarabhidadhatā na ca asya apūrvaṃ kiṃcana racitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3490: tathā paśulokasya bhāsamāna eva ātmani nāhamīśvaraḥ ityādi mohādabhimanvato moho 'pohyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3491: yo hi jñānakriyāsvātantryayuktaḥ sa īśvaro yathā siddhāntapurāṇādiṣu prasiddhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3493: yadi vā yasmin yadāyattaṃ sa tatreśvaro rājeva svamaṇḍale ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3497: yat khalu yallagnaṃ bhāti tattena pūrṇaṃ nidhānamiva maṇibhiḥ tvallagnaṃ ca viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3499: sa tāvati vyāpakaḥ samudga iva maṇiṣu ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3500: tvayi ca saṃvidrūpe dharādisadāśivāntaṃ śāstraprakriyoktaṃ viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3501: yasmin sthite yadudeti līyate ca tat tatpūrvāparabhāgavyāpi yathā bhūmāvaṅkuraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3502: tathā ca tvayi prakāśarūpe viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3503: evam anye 'pi dharmāḥ sahasraśo 'pi āgamādisiddhā yojyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3504: tadevaṃ vyapohite vyāmohe sthite'pi tatsaṃskāramātradhṛte śarīrādau anātmatābhimānapuraḥsara
GSP30abhiprvu:3505: evātmatābhimāne ghaṭādau ca prakāśamāna evānātmatābhimāne jñātendrajālatattvasya
GSP30abhiprvu:3506: paśyato'pi indrajālaṃ yathā na tattvato vyāmohaḥ tathā pratyabhijñātātmasvarūpasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:3508: abhyāsabhāvanābalena tu śiva śāsanopadiṣṭena dehaghaṭādāveva parameśvaratāsamāveśamabhiniviśya paśyata ihaiva śarīre pārameśvaryāṃśadharmodgamaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3515: tasyāpi karṇapathagamanāt saṃskārapakināvaśyaṃ kadācidbhaviṣyatyeva svarūpalābhaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3517: ityādiślokadvayena yaduktaṃ tadeva viśvavaocitrya ityādiślokatrayeṇopaskṛtya punarnirūpitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3518: evaṃ bhūtaṃ tāvat pramāṇam tadevaṃ bhūte bhagavati kathamupapadyatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:3519: tataśca yuktamuktaṃ śāstrādāviti maṅgyantareṇa idānīṃ tadeva nirvāhitam ---- iti śivam //17// āditaḥ 120//
GSP30abhiprvu:3520: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptācāryaviracitāyāṃ pratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ kriyādhikāre mānatatphalameyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyamāhnikam // 3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3523: kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ ca yaścitraṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:3526: ---- eṣa ca ityādi evamicchaiva hetutā kartṛtā kriyā ityantam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3527: tatra ślokena svamate kartṛkarmabhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3530: tataḥ ślokaṣaṭkena cetanasyaiva kartṛtārūpā kāraṇatā prasādhyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3542: evaṃ kriyāśaktimukhena pramātrekarūpatāṃ bhagavati vyavahartavyāṃ prasādhya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3548: eṣa eva purāṇaḥ pramātā amūn bhāvān ābhāsitapūrvān ābhāsān ābhāsayati avicchinnena prabandhena /
GSP30abhiprvu:3549: katham , icchāyā īśiturabhinnāyā avikalparūpāyā akramāyā vaśena sāmarthyena kutrāsya te bhāvāḥ sthitāḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3551: viśve hi bhāvāstasyaiva śaktirūpeṇa svarūpātmatvena sthitāḥ ; ityuktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3560: jaḍasya tu na sā śaktiḥ sattā yadasataḥ sataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3564: iti tu svavācaiva virudhyate tat kimanena /
GSP30abhiprvu:3566: tarhi tasyāsadrūpataiva paramārthaḥ iti kathaṃ svarūpaviruddhaṃ sattvamabhyupagacchet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3567: na hi pādapatanaśatairapi nīlamātmani pītimānaṃ mṛṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3568: atha sanneva ghaṭastarhi kimanyat upayācyate daṇḍacakrasūtrāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3577: kumbhakārahṛdaye antarmanogocaratvāt pūrvamapi svasaṃvidekātmatayā vicitratvena viśvasya
GSP30abhiprvu:3583: na ca kumbhakāre prāṇapuryaṣṭabuddhiśūnyadehaprāye tadetat sthitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3586: tasya kasyāpi iti pūrvamuktasya acintyāparyanuyojyamahimna ityarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3587: naca vācyam ubhayendriyavedyatvamapi sadasad vā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3588: yato'yamatra paramārthaḥ ---- yathā darpaṇāntaḥ kumbhakāranirvartyamānaghaṭādipratibimbe darpaṇasyaiva tathābhāsanamahimā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3590: tathāpi tanmahimnaiva etena idaṃ bahiḥ sphuṭarūpaṃ kriyata ityabhimāna ullasati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3591: evaṃ saṃvinmahimnā kumbhakṛti daṇḍacakrādau ghaṭe sthite tanmahimnaiva abhimāno jāyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3596: tatra jaḍasya mṛdāderdūrāpeto'bhimāna iti saṃvitsvabhāve kartṛtvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3597: nanu bhāvarūpameva itthaṃ bhāsyatāṃ kiṃ dvayendriyavedyatvenoktamatra ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3600: anena ca vicāreṇa prakṛtamapi kriyāsvarūpaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3602: evam ekā kriyā saiṣā sakramāntarbahiḥ sthitiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3604: saiṣeti , yasyāḥ svarūpata āśrayataśca nopapadyate iti upālambhaḥ kṛtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3606: yataḥ saṃvidrūpādāntarāt prabhṛti indriyagocaratayā bahiṣparyantatayā sthitirābhāsanārūpā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3609: sa caika āśrayaḥ saṃvidrūpatvena svacchatvasvatantratvābhyāmubhayamapyantarbahīrūpaṃ sahata iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:3611: yatra tu bījāṅjurādau cetanānupraveśo na dṛśyate tatra kathaṃ bījasyaivāṅkuraḥ kāryo na bhavati ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3618: tataśca yad vastu yamapekṣya antarityuktaṃ tad vastu tasyaiva āntararūpaviparivṛttimātrasya bahiṣkāryaṃ bahiṣkaraṇārhaṃ bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3619: saṃvidrūpaṃ ca pramātāramapekṣya antarābhāsino bhāvāstadapekṣayaiva bāhyābhāsā iti tenaiva eteṣāṃ bahiṣkaraṇābhāsanaṃ yuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3620: tataśca pramātaiva kāraṇaṃ bhavati na jaḍaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3622: yasmāt sa pramātā kāryasyāntarbahirābhāsanadvayanimittatayā sthitastena vinā tadapekṣasyābhāsadvayasyānupapatteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3623: tasmādekasya pramātureva na tu kathaṃcit jaḍasya uditā prasādhitarūpā kriyā nirmātṛtā bhavatīti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:3628: ata eva naiyāyikādibhiraṅkurādau buddimāneva parameśvaro hetutvena iṣṭaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3630: samavāyikāraṇanijāvayavārambhaparamparayā tu tata īśvarādanyasyāpi bījabhūmijalāderhetutā kathitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3636: nanuparidṛṣṭabījādivyatiriktabuddhimatkāraṇakalpanena vinā kimuparudhyata iti parasya bhrāntiṃ bhindannāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3639: tathā hi iti nidarśanopakrameṇa vyāptirevaṃbhūtaiva dṛṣṭā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3642: mṛdādayo yadi hi sannidhānamātreṇa vidadhyuḥ kumbhakāreṇa kimatra kṛtyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3644: sā ca kumbhakārāyattā iti cet siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyam ---- śivikasaṃpādane 'pi te cetanapreraṇāmapekṣante iti /
